Cause them to be so enraptured by the sweetness of Thy divine melodies that they will rid themselves of all attachment to any one except Thee, and will turn wholly towards Thee, and extol Thee under all conditions, saying: “Praised be Thou, O Lord our God, inasmuch as Thou hast enabled us to recognize Thy most exalted and all-glorious Self. We will, by Thy mercy, cleave to Thee, and will detach ourselves from any one but Thee. We have realized that Thou art the Beloved of the worlds and the Creator of earth and heaven!”
我恳求你，你这是谁的艺术的所有名称的主，你的守护与仇敌的亲人，并加强他们在为你和你的满足快乐的爱情。做你保护他们，他们的脚步可能不会打滑，他们的心可能不会拒之门外通过从你的面纱，他们的眼睛能不看什么，是不是祢限制。因为他们通过你的神圣的旋律，他们将摆脱自己的所有附件，除了祢的任何一个，而会变成完全走向你，并颂扬祢所有条件下，说了甜头如此眉飞色舞：“赞美归于你，主啊！我们的上帝，因为你怎样使我们认识到你的最崇高和全光荣自我。我们将通过你的怜悯，忠于你，并且将自己脱离任何一个，但你。我们已经意识到，你是在敬爱的世界和天地的创造者！“
Glorified be God, the Lord of all creation!
荣耀上帝，所有的创造之主！

Lauded and glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Thou art He Who from...

Lauded and glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Thou art He Who from everlasting hath been clothed with majesty, with authority and power, and will continue unto everlasting to be arrayed with honor, with strength and glory. The learned, one and all, stand aghast before the signs and tokens of Thy handiwork, while the wise find themselves, without exception, impotent to unravel the mystery of Them Who are the Manifestations of Thy might and power. Every man of insight hath confessed his powerlessness to scale the heights of Thy knowledge, and every man of learning hath acknowledged his failure to fathom the nature of Thine Essence.
赞美和荣耀的艺术你，主啊，我的上帝！你是谁，他从亘古历代以来穿着威严，权威和权力，并将继续对永恒与荣誉排列，以实力和荣耀。了解到，一个个都，站在你的手艺的标志和标记前惊得目瞪口呆，而聪明的发现自己，无一例外，无能解开其中的谜团谁是你的表现可能和力量。有识之士各人要照供认他无能为力规模​​祢知识的高度，学习岂有的每个人都承认，他未能捉摸祢本质的本质。
Having barred the way that leadeth unto Thee, Thou hast, by virtue of Thine authority and through the potency of Thy will, called into being Them Who are the Manifestations of Thy Self, and hast entrusted Them with Thy message unto Thy people, and caused Them to become the Daysprings of Thine inspiration, the Exponents of Thy Revelation, the Treasuries of Thy Knowledge and the Repositories of Thy Faith, that all men may, through Them, turn their faces towards Thee, and may draw nigh unto the kingdom of Thy Revelation and the heaven of Thy grace.
已经禁止了对领祢，祢，凭借祢的权威，并通过你的的效力会叫成是他们谁是你的自我的表现方式，也曾委托他们与你的消息对你的百姓，并造成他们成为祢灵感Daysprings，你的启示录的指数，你的知识的国债和你的信仰的仓库，所有的人可以通过他们，把他们的脸对你，并可能亲近祢的国度启示和你的恩典的天堂。
I beseech Thee, therefore, by Thyself and by Them, to send down, from the right hand of the throne of Thy grace, upon all that dwell on earth, that which shall wash them from the stain of their trespasses against Thee, and cause them to become wholly devoted to Thy Self, O Thou in Whose hand is the source of all gifts, that they may all arise to serve Thy Cause, and may detach themselves entirely from all except Thee. Thou art the Almighty, the All-Glorious, the Unrestrained.
我恳求你，因此，你自己通过和他们，送下来，从你的恩典宝座的右边，在所有住在地球上，那它应该从他们的过犯的污渍攻击你，而导致它们洗干净他们成为完全致力于自我你的，呵，你在谁的手中是所有礼物的来源，他们都可能出现的服务你的原因，并可能完全脱离自己所有，除了你。你是全能，全光荣，山野。
O my God, my Master, my Best-Beloved! I am Thy servant and the son of Thy servant. I have held fast the cord of Thy grace, and clung to the hem of the garment of Thy loving providence. I entreat Thee, by Thy Most Great Name, Whom Thou hast appointed as the unerring Balance among the nations, and Thine infallible Proof unto all men, not to forsake me, nor to abandon me to my corrupt desires. Do Thou preserve me beneath the shadow of Thy Supreme Sinlessness, and enable me to magnify Thine own Self amidst the concourse of Thy creatures. Withhold not from me the Divine fragrance of Thy days, and deprive me not of the sweet savors wafting from the Dayspring of Thy Revelation. Bestow on me the good of this world and of the next, through the power of Thy grace that hath encompassed all created things and Thy mercy that hath surpassed the entire creation. Thou art He Who holdeth in His grasp the kingdom of all things. Thou doest what Thou willest through Thy decree, and choosest, through the power of Thy might, whatsoever Thou desirest. None can resist Thy will; naught can exhaust the impelling force of Thy command. There is no God but Thee, the Almighty, the All-Glorious, the Most Bountiful.
哦，我的上帝，我的主人，我的最佳宠儿！我是你的仆人，仆人的儿子。我谨守你的恩典的线，紧紧抓住你的爱天意的衣裳。我求求你，用你最伟大的名字，就是你所任命为国家之间的平衡无误，你的万无一失证明对所有的人，不要离弃我，也不放弃我到我的腐败欲望。难道你保佑我你的最高无罪的阴影之下，而让我放大你自己的自我之中你的生物的广场。从我扣压没有你的日子神圣的香味，并剥夺了我的不馨香从你的启示启端飘出的。赐给我的下一个这个世界的美好，通过你的恩典，是因耶和华涵盖了祂所超过了整个创造一切创造物和你的慈悲的力量。你是谁，他在他的掌握holdeth万物的王国。你所做的是什么你通过你的法令willest和拣选，通过你的权力可能，凡你所喜爱。没有人能抗拒你的意志;化为乌有可能会耗尽你的命令的推动力量。有没有上帝，但你，全能，全悠久，最尊严。

Thou beholdest, O my God, Thy servant who dwelleth in this...

Thou beholdest, O my God, Thy servant who dwelleth in this prison-house, wholly detached from any one but Thee, his eyes turned in the direction of the Dayspring of Thy mercy, his heart longing for the wondrous manifestations of Thy grace. Thou, O my Lord, hast reckoned up the ills that have afflicted him in Thy path. Thou seest him compassed about with such of Thy creatures as have transgressed and rebelled against Thee, who have come in between him and Thy loved ones, who have fixed his abode in this land and wronged Thee, and who have hindered Thy servants from turning towards Thee.
你眼看着我的神啊，你仆人谁在这个监狱的房子住，完全从任何一个，但祢沾边，他的目光转向你的慈爱，他的心脏渴望你的恩典的奇妙表现的启端的方向。你，我的主啊，竟忽视了那些折磨他在你的路径中的弊病。你看见他围住这样你的生物为有罪和背叛了你，谁拥有他与你的之间进来的亲人，谁都有固定他的住宅在这片土地和委屈你，和谁从他转身对阻碍你的仆人你。
For all these things I offer thanksgiving unto Thee, O my Lord! I implore Thee to assist me and them that love me to magnify Thy Word, and to endow us with such strength that the ills of this world and its tribulations will be powerless to hinder us from remembering Thee and from extolling Thy virtues. Powerful art Thou to do all things; resplendent art Thou above all things.
对于所有这些东西，我献感谢告诉你，我的主啊！我恳求祢帮助我，他们爱我放大你的道，并赋予我们这样的实力，这个世界和它的磨难的顽疾将无力从记住你和颂扬祢的美德妨碍我们。强大的艺术你做的所有的事情;金碧辉煌的艺术你最重要的东西。
Every conqueror is but a serf whom Thy hand hath subjected, and the richest of the rich is as destitute before the immensity of Thy wealth. The noblest of nobles is humbled when faced with the manifestations of Thy glory, and the mightiest of potentates is a mere abject one when confronted with the compelling evidences of Thine authority.
每一个征服者是谁，但你的手已经遭受农奴，而最富有的富豪就是你的财富的无限面前的贫困。贵族的高贵是谦卑的时候面临着你的荣耀的表现，和最强大的统治者是一个单纯的赤贫之一，当与祢权威的令人信服的证据面对。
Tear asunder, O my God, the veil of vain imaginings that hath obscured the vision of Thy people, that all may haste towards Thee, may tread the path of Thy pleasure, and walk in the ways of Thy Faith. We are, O my God, Thy servants and Thy bondsmen. Thou art sufficient unto us so that we can dispense with the world and all that is therein. We are wholly satisfied with all that hath befallen us in Thy path, and exclaim: “Praised be Thou, in Whose hand are the realms of revelation and of creation, and all the kingdoms of earth and heaven!”
撕裂成碎片，我的神啊，虚妄的幻想的面纱遮蔽祂所你的人的眼光，所有可能急速向着你，可能你的踏快感的道路，走在你的信念的方式。现在好了，我的神啊，你的仆人，你的农奴。你是足够给我们，以便我们能够与世界免除和其中所有的都。我们完全满意，所有我们所遭遇的你的路径，并惊呼：“赞美归于你，在谁的手中都创造启示和的境界，和天地万国！”

Praise be to Thee, O Lord my God, my Master! Thou hearest the sighing...

Praise be to Thee, O Lord my God, my Master! Thou hearest the sighing of those who, though they long to behold Thy face, are yet separated from Thee and far distant from Thy court. Thou testifiest to the lamentations which those who have recognized Thee pour forth because of their exile from Thee and their yearning to meet Thee. I beseech Thee by those hearts which contain naught except the treasures of Thy remembrance and praise, and which show forth only the testimonies of Thy greatness and the evidences of Thy might, to bestow on Thy servants who desire Thee power to approach the seat of the revelation of the splendor of Thy glory and to assist them whose hopes are set on Thee to enter into the tabernacle of Thy transcendent favor and mercy.
赞美是你，主啊，我的上帝，我的主人！你听见那些谁，虽然他们渴望看见你的脸，都没有分开，你和你的，从法院遥远的叹息。你testifiest来，因为从你自己的流亡和他们渴望迎接你的这些那些谁认识祢滔滔不绝的悲叹。我恳求你用那些含有化为乌有，除了你的怀念和赞美的珍品心，这显示出你的伟大只有证词和你的的证据可能，要赐给你的仆人谁愿意祢功率接近的座位祢荣耀的辉煌和启示，以协助他们的希望寄托在祢设置进入祢的超然青睐和怜悯的帐幕。
Naked am I, O my God! Clothe me with the robe of Thy tender mercies. I am sore athirst; give me to drink of the oceans of Thy bountiful favor. I am a stranger; draw me nearer unto the source of Thy gifts. I am sick; sprinkle upon me the healing waters of Thy grace. I am a captive; rid me of my bondage, by the power of Thy might and through the force of Thy will, that I may soar on the wings of detachment towards the loftiest summits of Thy creation. Thou, verily, doest what Thou choosest. There is no God but Thee, the Help in Peril, the All-Glorious, the Unconstrained.
裸体是我，我的神啊！给我穿用你的慈悲的长袍。我甚渴望着;给我喝你的富饶青睐的海洋。我是一个陌生人;我画更接近对祢礼品的来源。我生病了;洒在我你的恩典的愈合水域。我是一个俘虏;摆脱了我的束缚，用你的实力的力量，并通过你的的力，使我可以翱翔在对你的创作的崇高峰会支队的翅膀。你，众志成城，所行的是什么。你选用。有没有上帝，但你，是救苦救难，全光荣的约束。

Glorified art Thou, O my God! Thou knowest that my sole aim in...

Glorified art Thou, O my God! Thou knowest that my sole aim in revealing Thy Cause hath been to reveal Thee and not my self, and to manifest Thy glory rather than my glory. In Thy path, and to attain Thy pleasure, I have scorned rest, joy, delight. At all times and under all conditions my gaze hath been fixed on Thy precepts, and mine eyes bent upon the things Thou hast bidden me observe in Thy Tablets. I have wakened every morning to the light of Thy praise and Thy remembrance, and reached every evening inhaling the fragrances of Thy mercy.
荣耀的艺术你，哦，我的上帝！你知道，我在你的揭示原因唯一的目标向来揭示你和我没有自我，彰显你的荣耀，而不是我的荣耀。在你的路径，以达到你的快乐，我也鄙视休息，喜悦，喜悦。在任何时候，所有的条件我的目光hath被固定在你的训词，和我的眼睛对的事情你已经吩咐我观察你的片弯曲下。我每天早晨都唤醒对你的赞美和怀念你的光，达到每天晚上吸入你的仁慈的香水。
And when the entire creation was stirred up, and the whole earth was convulsed, and the sweet savors of Thy name, the All-Praised, had almost ceased to breathe over Thy realms, and the winds of Thy mercy had well-nigh been stilled throughout Thy dominions, Thou didst, through the power of Thy might, raise me up among Thy servants, and bid me to show forth Thy sovereignty amidst Thy people. Thereupon I arose before all Thy creatures, strengthened by Thy help and Thy power, and summoned all the multitudes unto Thee, and announced unto all Thy servants Thy favors and Thy gifts, and invited them to turn towards this Ocean, every drop of the waters of which crieth out, proclaiming unto all that are in heaven and on earth that He is, in truth, the Fountain of all life, and the Quickener of the entire creation, and the Object of the adoration of all worlds, and the Best-Beloved of every understanding heart, and the Desire of all them that are nigh unto Thee.
而当整个创造搅拌起来，整个地球被震撼，和你的名字的甜蜜品味，全好评，已经几乎停止呼吸了你的境界，你的怜悯之风已经得到较为已平息在整个你的领地，你谤，通过你的权力可能，鼓舞了我你的仆人之间，并叫我展现出你的主权之中你的人。于是我起来你的一切生灵，用你的帮助，你的权力加强面前，召集所有的众人见你，就对所有的仆人你的青睐和你的礼物公布，并邀请他们把对这个大洋，每一滴水域其中喊叫，宣布对所有在天堂和地球上他，说实话，所有生命的喷泉，整个创作Quickener，大千世界的崇拜的对象，最有名敬爱的每一个了解心脏，和所有他们的欲望是亲近你的。
Though the fierce winds of the hatred of the wicked doers blew and beat on this Lamp, He was, at no time, in His love for Thy beauty, hindered from shedding the fragrance of His light. As the transgressions committed against Thee waxed greater and greater, my eagerness to reveal Thy Cause correspondingly increased, and as the tribulations deepened—and to this Thy glory beareth me witness—a fuller measure of Thy sovereignty and of Thy power was vouchsafed by me unto Thy creatures.
虽然作孽的仇恨的狂风吹起，并击败在这盏灯，他，在任何时候，在他对你的爱情的美，从他的脱落光的清香阻碍。作为一个致力于攻击你的过犯日见强盛，我渴望你的透露原因也相应地增加，而作为磨难加深，并为此你的​​荣耀，也是为我见证，一个你的主权和你的力量更充分的措施是赐予了我对你的生物。
And finally, I was cast by the transgressors into the prison-city of ‘Akká, and my kindred were made captives in Baghdád. The power of Thy might beareth me witness, O my God! Every trouble that hath touched me in Thy path hath added to my joy and increased my gladness. I swear by Thee, O Thou Who art the King of Kings! None of the kings of the earth hath power to hinder me from remembering Thee or from extolling Thy virtues. Were they to be leagued—as they have been leagued—against me, and to brandish their sharpest swords and most afflictive spears against me, I would not hesitate to magnify Thy name before all them that are in Thy heaven and on Thy earth. Nay rather, I would cry out and say: “This, O my Beloved, is my face which I have offered up for Thy face, and this is my spirit which I have sacrificed for Thy spirit, and this is my blood that seetheth in my veins, in its longing to be shed for love of Thee and in Thy path.”
最后，我投在罪犯入监，城市阿卡和我的亲属都取得了巴GH爸爸的俘虏。祢的力量可能也是为我见证，我的神啊！那摸了我在你的路径中的每个麻烦祂所添加到我的喜悦和增加了我的欢乐。我发誓祢，你这万王之王！无地上的君王权柄从记忆祢或歌颂你的美德妨碍我。难道他们要结成同盟，因为他们已经结成同盟，反对我，和他们挥舞刀剑幅度最大的，最难受的长矛攻击我，我会毫不犹豫地前，所有的都在你的天上人间你的放大你的名字。不仅如此相反，我会哭出来，说：“这个，啊，我亲爱的，是我的脸，我已经提供了对你的脸，这是我的精神，我牺牲了你的精神，这是我的血seetheth在我的血管，在其渴望棚为爱你的。因为你的道路。“
Though—as Thou beholdest me, O my God—I be dwelling in a place within whose walls no voice can be heard except the sound of the echo, though all the gates of ease and comfort be shut against us, and thick darkness appear to have compassed us on every side, yet my soul hath been so inflamed by its love for Thee, that nothing whatsoever can either quench the fire of its love or abate the consuming flame of its desire. Lifting up its voice, it crieth aloud amidst Thy servants, and calleth them, at all times and under all conditions, unto Thee.
虽然，因为你眼看着我，我的神啊，我是居住在其围墙内没有任何声音可以听到，除了回声的声音，虽然安逸的所有大门对我们被关的地方，幽暗出现围着我们的每一个方面，但我心里一直由它为你的爱如此发炎，没有什么任何可以熄灭它的爱火，或减轻其欲望的消费火焰。提起它的声音，她发声朗读之中仆人，并一一称，在任何时候，任何条件下，你的。
I beseech Thee, by Thy Most Great Name, to open the eyes of Thy servants, that they may behold Thee shining above the horizon of Thy majesty and glory, and that they may not be hindered by the croaking of the raven from hearkening to the voice of the Dove of Thy sublime oneness, nor be prevented by the corrupt waters from partaking of the pure wine of Thy bounty and the everlasting streams of Thy gifts.
我恳求你，用你最伟大的名字，打开仆人的眼里，他们能看见祢闪耀你的威严和荣耀的地平线上，他们可能不会被乌鸦的叫声从倾听着受阻祢崇高合一鸽子的声音，也不是由腐败的水从单打独斗祢恩惠的纯正葡萄酒和你的礼物永恒的流预防。
Gather them, then, together around this Divine Law, the covenant of which Thou hast established with all Thy Prophets and Thy Messengers, and Whose ordinances Thou hast written down in Thy Tablets and Thy Scriptures. Raise them up, moreover, to such heights as will enable them to perceive Thy Call.
拾起来，然后一起解决这个神圣的法律，其中祢建立与所有你的先知，你使者，和谁条例祢在你的片和你的圣经写下来的约。养起来，而且，以这样的高度，这将让他们感觉到你的召唤。
Potent art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee. Thou art, verily, the Inaccessible, the All-Glorious.
强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。祢，众志成城，人迹罕至，全光荣。

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Thou seest me dwelling in this...

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Thou seest me dwelling in this prison-house that lieth behind the seas and the mountains, and knowest full well what I have endured for love of Thee and for the sake of Thy Cause. Thou art He, O my God, Who hath raised me up at Thy behest, and bidden me to occupy Thy seat, and to summon all men to the court of Thy mercy. It is Thou Who hast commanded me to tell out the things Thou didst destine for them in the Tablet of Thy decree and didst inscribe with the pen of Thy Revelation, and Who hast enjoined on me the duty of kindling the fire of Thy love in the hearts of Thy servants, and of drawing all the peoples of the earth nearer to the habitation of Thy throne.
荣耀的艺术你，主啊，我的上帝！你看见我住在这所监狱内部卧海洋和山脉的背后，却不知道完全清楚我所经历的爱你，并为你的缘故原因的。你是他，哦，我的上帝，他已经养了我抱在你的遗志，并吩咐我占有你的座位，并召集所有的人来你的怜悯法院。这是你是谁竟吩咐我告诉了事情祢注定他们在平板祢的法令和复活，与题祢启示的笔，和谁竟吩咐给我点燃了你的爱火中的责任心中仆人和绘图大地各族人民更接近你的宝座的居住，对。
And when, as bidden by Thee, I arose and called out, by Thy leave, all Thy creatures, the wayward among Thy servants opposed me. Some turned away from me, others disowned my claim, a few hesitated, while others were sore perplexed, notwithstanding that Thy testimony was set forth before the followers of all religions, and Thy proof demonstrated unto all the peoples of the earth, and the signs of Thy might so powerfully manifested as to encompass the entire creation.
当作为吩咐由你，我站起来，叫了一声，用你的离开，你的一切生灵，仆人之间的任性反对我。从我有些转身离开，其他人六亲不认我的说法，一些犹豫，而另一些则痛困惑，尽管你的证词提出所有宗教的信徒面前，你的证据证明对地球上所​​有的人民，和标志你的可能，以便有力地表现为涵盖整个创作。
I was, moreover, opposed by mine own kindred, although, as Thou knowest, they were dear to me and I had desired for them that which I had desired for mine own self. These are the ones who, when learning that I had been cast into prison, perpetrated against me what no man else on earth had perpetrated.
我是，而且，我的反对自己的骨肉，虽然，因为你晓得，他们是我亲爱的和我所希望的他们，我曾渴望为我自己。这是谁，当得知我被投入监狱时，生恐我什么没有人否则地球上已经犯下。
I entreat Thee, therefore, O my God, by Thy name by which Thou hast separated between truth and denial, to purify their hearts of all evil suggestions, and to enable them to draw nigh unto Him Who is the Dayspring of Thy names and Thine attributes.
我求求你，所以，我的神啊，你名下的由祢真理与否认之间的分离，净化一切罪恶的建议他们的心，并让他们亲近祂谁是你的名字和启端祢属性。
Thou knowest, O my God, that I have severed every tie that bindeth me to any of Thy creatures except that most exalted tie that uniteth me with whosoever cleaveth unto Thee, in this the day of the revelation of Thy most august Self, that hath appeared in Thy name, the All-Glorious. Thou knowest that I have dissolved every bond that knitteth me to any one of my kindred except such as have enjoyed near access to Thy most effulgent face.
你知道，我的神啊，我已经断绝一切束缚了裹好我任何你的生物，除了最崇高领带uniteth我，凡几乎归于你，在这你的最威严的自我启示的日子，那hath出现在你的名字，全光荣。你知道我已经解散的每纽带，knitteth我到我的那株但不包括任何一个作为有着近访问你的最灿烂的脸。
I have no will but Thy will, O my Lord, and cherish no desire except Thy desire. From my pen floweth only the summons which Thine own exalted pen hath voiced, and my tongue uttereth naught save what the Most Great Spirit hath itself proclaimed in the kingdom of Thine eternity. I am stirred by nothing else except the winds of Thy will, and breathe no word except the words which, by Thy leave and Thine inspiration, I am led to pronounce.
我没有意愿，但你的意志，我的主啊，珍惜除了你的愿望没有欲望。从我的笔floweth其中只有你自己崇高的笔祂所表示uttereth化为乌有保存最伟大的精神祂所本身是什么在你永恒的国度宣布传票，我的舌头。我被闲来无事，除了你的意志的风搅拌，呼吸无字，除了它，用你的离开和你灵感的话，我带领发音。
Praise be to Thee, O Thou Who art the Well-Beloved of all that have known Thee, and the Desire of the hearts of such as are devoted to Thee, inasmuch as Thou hast made me a target for the ills that I suffer in my love for Thee, and the object of the assaults launched against me in Thy path. Thy glory beareth me witness! I can, on no account, feel impatient of the adversities that I have borne in my love for Thee. From the very day Thou didst reveal Thyself unto me, I have accepted for myself every manner of tribulation. Every moment of my life my head crieth out to Thee and saith: “Would, O my Lord, that I could be raised on the spear-point in Thy path!” while my blood entreateth Thee saying: “Dye the earth with me, O my God, for the sake of Thy love and Thy pleasure!” Thou knowest that I have, at no time, sought to guard my body against any affliction, nay rather I have continually anticipated the things Thou didst ordain for me in the Tablet of Thy decree.
赞美是你，呵，你是谁的艺术嘛，亲爱的一切都认识你的，以及如心的欲望都投入到你，因为是你使我目标，我挨在我的弊病为你的爱，并在你的路径展开了对我的攻击对象。你的荣耀，也是为我见证！我可以，就没有考虑，觉得不耐烦，我紧我的爱为你逆境的。从当天祢显露你自己对我说，我已经接受了自己苦难的每一个方式。我生命中的每一刻我的头喊叫。就你就说：“会的，我的主啊，我可以对矛点在你的路径得到提升！”而我的血液entreateth祢说：“染大地与我，哦，我的上帝，为了你的爱，你的快乐！“你知道我有，在任何时候，试图保护我的身体对任何苦难，不然不如说我不断在平板预料的事情祢注定我祢法令。
Behold, then, O my God, my loneliness among Thy servants and my remoteness from Thy friends and Thy chosen ones. I beseech Thee, by the showers of the clouds of Thy mercy, whereby Thou hast caused the blossoms of Thy praise and utterance and the flowers of Thy wisdom and testimony to spring forth in the hearts of all them that have recognized Thy oneness, to supply Thy servants and my kindred with the fruits of the tree of Thy unity, in these days when Thou hast been established upon the throne of Thy mercy. Hinder them not, O my Lord, from attaining unto the things Thou dost possess, and write down for them that which will aid them to scale the heights of Thy grace and favor. Give them, moreover, to drink of the living waters of Thy knowledge, and ordain for them the good of this world and of the world to come.
看哪，那么，我的神啊，我的仆人之间的孤独和你的朋友和你的选择我的那些遥远。我恳求你，用你的怜悯，对云的阵雨即祢造成你的赞美和话语的花朵和你的智慧和证词的鲜花涌现出在所有的心中已经认可你的统一性，供应当你已经被建立在你怜悯的宝座你的仆人和我的亲属与你的团结之树的果实，在这些日子里。阻碍他们不要，我的主啊，从那里获得的东西你又具备，并记下了他们将帮助他们扩展你的风度和青睐的高度。给他们，而且，喝你的知识活水，并注定了他们在世界的这个世界的好来。
Thou art, verily, the Lord of Bahá, and the Beloved of his heart, and the Object of his desire, and the Inspirer of his tongue, and the Source of his soul. No God is there but Thee, the Inaccessible, the Most High. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Exalted, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
祢，众志成城，巴哈的主，和心爱的他的心脏，他的欲望的对象，他的舌头的鼓动，而他的灵魂的来源。没有上帝是存在的，但你，人迹罕至，至高。你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最尊贵，永远地赦的，最仁慈。

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I yield Thee thanks for having...

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I yield Thee thanks for having enabled me to recognize the Manifestation of Thyself, and for having severed me from Thine enemies, and laid bare before mine eyes their misdeeds and wicked works in Thy days, and for having rid me of all attachment to them, and caused me to turn wholly towards Thy grace and bountiful favors. I give Thee thanks, also, for having sent down upon me from the clouds of Thy will that which hath so sanctified me from the hints of the infidels and the allusions of the misbelievers that I have fixed my heart firmly on Thee, and fled from such as have denied the light of Thy countenance. Again I thank Thee for having empowered me to be steadfast in Thy love, and to speak forth Thy praise and to extol Thy virtues, and for having given me to drink of the cup of Thy mercy that hath surpassed all things visible and invisible.
荣耀的艺术你，主啊，我的上帝！我屈服你为有使我认识到你自己的表现，并为被从你的敌人切断了我的感谢，并戳穿在我眼前自己的丑行，并在你的天恶行，并已经摆脱我所有的依恋他们，造成我把全对你的优雅和丰富的青睐。我给你的感谢，同时，对于已经发下来后，我从你的的云将是是应当如此圣洁我从异教徒的提示和我在祢固定我的心脏紧紧的misbelievers的典故，并逃离如否认你脸上的光。我再次感谢你为被授权我成为坚定你的爱，并讲出你的赞美和歌颂你的美德，并已经给我喝那杯你的怜���，是因耶和华超越了所有的东西有形和无形的。
Thou art the Almighty, the Most Exalted, the All-Glorious, the All-Loving.
你是万能的，最尊贵，全光荣，全爱。

Praised be Thou, O my God! Thou seest me shut up in this Prison, and...

Praised be Thou, O my God! Thou seest me shut up in this Prison, and art well aware that I have entered it solely for Thy sake and for the sake of the glorification of Thy word and the proclamation of Thy Cause. I cry out to Thee, this very moment, O Thou Who art the Lord of all worlds, beseeching Thee, by Thine undoubted Name, to attract the hearts of Thy servants unto the Dayspring of Thy most excellent titles and the Dawning-Place of Thy most resplendent signs.
称赞是你，我的神啊！你看见我关在这所监狱，和艺术清楚地知道，我已经进入它完全是为了你的缘故，并为了你的话的荣耀和你的事业的宣布的。我哭出来你，此时此刻，你这是谁的艺术了整个宇宙的主，恳求你，因你的名字毋庸置疑，吸引仆人的心归向祢最优秀的职称黎明号和你的的曙光广场最辉煌的迹象。
But for the troubles that touch me in Thy path, O my God, how else could my heart rejoice in Thy days; and were it not for the blood which is shed for love of Thee, what else could tinge the faces of Thy chosen ones before the eyes of Thy creatures? I swear by Thy might! The ornament that adorneth the countenance of Thy dear ones is the blood which, in their love for Thee, floweth out of their foreheads over their faces.
但让我感动于你的路径中的烦恼，我的神啊，怎么还能在你的日子我的心脏欢欣鼓舞;而如果不是因为这是大棚为爱你的血，你的生灵面前还能有什么色彩祢选民的面貌吗？我发誓，你的实力！这adorneth祢亲人的面容装饰品是血，在他们为你的爱，floweth他们的额头在他们的脸上。
Thou beholdest, O my God, how every bone in my body soundeth like a pipe with the music of Thine inspiration, revealing the signs of Thy oneness and the clear tokens of Thy unity. I entreat Thee, O my God, by Thy Name which irradiateth all things, to raise up such servants as shall incline their ears to the voice of the melodies that hath ascended from the right hand of the throne of Thy glory. Make them, then, to quaff from the hand of Thy grace the wine of Thy mercy, that it may assure their hearts, and cause them to turn away from the left hand of idle fancies and vain imaginings to the right hand of confidence and certitude.
你眼看着我的神啊，怎么在我的身上每根骨头soundeth像祢灵感的音乐管，露出你的合一的标志和你的统一的清晰的标记。我求求你，我的神啊，你名下的这irradiateth所有的东西，提高了公务员等作为应倾向于自己的耳朵来了叫他从祢荣耀的宝座的右手登上了旋律的声音。让他们的话，从你的恩典你的怜悯之酒的手畅饮，它可能保证他们的心，使他们转离闲置幻想和虚妄的幻想的左手的信心和确定性的右手。
Now that Thou hast guided them unto the door of Thy grace, O my Lord, cast them not away, by Thy bounty; and now that Thou hast summoned them unto the horizon of Thy Cause, keep them not back from Thee, by Thy graciousness and favor. Powerful art Thou to do as Thou pleasest. No God is there but Thee, the Omniscient, the All-Informed.
现在，你已经引导他们到你的恩典的门，我的主啊，投下他们不要走，用你的奖金;现在祢召唤他们到你的事业的视野，让他们从你不回来，用你的恩和青睐。强大的艺术你做的你pleasest。没有上帝是存在的，但你，无所不知，全知情。

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! My tongue, both the tongue of my...

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! My tongue, both the tongue of my body and the tongue of my heart, my limbs and members, every pulsating vein within me, every hair of my head, all proclaim that Thou art God, and that there is none other God beside Thee. From everlasting Thou hast been immeasurably exalted above all similitudes and comparisons, and sanctified from whatsoever pertaineth to the creation Thou hast created and fashioned. From eternity Thou hast been alone, with none to share the majesty of Thy singleness, and hast remained far above the changes and chances to which all Thy creatures are subjected.
荣耀的艺术你，主啊，我的上帝！我的舌头，我的身体双方的舌头和我的心脏，我的四肢和成员，在我每一个脉动静脉舌头，我的头每根头发，都宣称你是神，以及有没有其他可比你的。从亘古祢以上所有similitudes和比较没法比高举，并从任何本属成圣的创建你所创造和塑造。从永恒你曾独自一人，有没有人来分享你的单一的威严，竟仍远高于这是所有你的生物受到的变化和机会。
And when Thou didst purpose to demonstrate the power of Thy sovereign might, and to glorify Thy word, and to guide the steps of Thy people, Thou didst raise up from among Thy creatures One of Thy servants, Whom Thou didst send forth with the signs of Thy sovereignty, and Whom Thou didst endue with the clear tokens of Thy oneness, that He might fulfill Thy testimony unto all created things, and perfect Thy proof before all men.
而当你谤目的来证明你的主权威力的力量，美化你的话，并指导你的人的步骤，祢从你的生物之一仆人，谁祢的迹象发出之间兴起你的主权，其中祢赋予与祢合一的清晰标记，那他可能会满足你的证词对所有创造物，在众人面前完善你的证明。
As soon as He revealed Himself, as bidden by Thee, and called Thy servants to turn in the direction of Thy gifts, and to set their faces towards the horizon of Thy knowledge, the signs of dissension appeared amongst them. Some responded to Thy call and, without the least hesitation, obeyed Thy summons. Others turned their backs to Thee, and followed the desires of a corrupt inclination.
只要他透露自己，吩咐了你，叫你的仆人把在你的礼物的方向，并设置他们的脸朝着你的知识视野，纠纷的迹象出现在他们中间。一些回应你的电话，并没有丝毫的犹豫，听从你的召唤。别人把他们背对着你，跟着腐败倾向的愿望。
I implore Thee, O my God, by Thy Most Great Name, to enrapture the nations through the potency of the Word which Thou didst ordain to be the king of all words, the Word whereby the goodly pearls of Thy hidden wisdom were uncovered, and the gem-like mysteries which were wrapped up within Thee were unraveled. Deprive them not, by Thy grace and bounty, of the things Thou didst desire for them, and suffer them not to be far removed from the shores of the ocean of Thy presence.
我恳求你，哦，我的上帝，用你最伟大的名字，通过话语的效力称叹的国家而祢ordain含是所有单词王，话语由此你所隐藏的智慧可遇不可求的珍珠被发现，并它被包裹起来在祢的宝石般的奥秘被揭开。剥夺他们不要，用你的恩典和恩惠，的事祢渴望他们，不容他们远离了你的存在海洋的岸边删除。
Every existence, whether seen or unseen, O my Lord, testifieth that Thy mercy hath surpassed all created things, and Thy loving-kindness embraced the entire creation. Look upon them, I entreat Thee, with the eyes of Thy mercy. Thou art the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Compassionate. Do with them as beseemeth Thy glory, and Thy majesty, and Thy greatness, and Thy bounteousness and Thy grace. Deal not with them according to the limitations imposed upon them, or the manifold vicissitudes of their earthly life.
每一个存在，是否看到或看不到的，我的主啊，当面见证了你的怜悯祂所超越了所有创造的东西，你的慈爱拥抱整个创作。看他们，我求求你，与你的怜悯的目光。你是在曾经赦，最值得同情。与他们无关的beseemeth你的荣耀，你的威严，和你的伟大，你的bounteousness和你的恩典。根据对他们施加的限制，或他们的尘世生活的沧桑歧管处理它们不是。
Thou knowest, O my Lord, that I am but one of Thy servants. I have tasted of the sweetness of Thy speech, and acknowledged Thy unity and Thy singleness, and set my face towards the Source of Thy most excellent names and the Dayspring of Thy transcendent attributes, and wished to be enabled by Thee to immerse myself beneath the ocean of Thy oneness and to be submerged by the mighty waters of Thy unity.
你知道，我的主啊，我是，但你的仆人之一。我尝到你的演讲了甜头，并承认你的团结，你​​的单一性，并设置我的脸朝着你的最优秀的名字的来源和你的的启端超然属性，并希望通过祢启用沉浸在自己之下的你的统一性和汪洋用你的统一的大水中被淹没。
Assist me, by Thy strengthening grace, O my Lord, to do what Thou didst will, and withhold not from me the things Thou dost possess. So enravish me with the wonders of Thine utterances that the noise and distraction of this world may be powerless to deter me from turning unto Thee, and may fail to shake my constancy in Thy Cause, or to distract my gaze from the horizon of Thy grace. Aid me, then, O my God, to do what pleaseth Thee, and to carry out Thy will. Write down for me, moreover, the good of this world and of the world which is to come, and ordain for me a seat of truth in Thy presence. Potent art Thou to do what Thou willest, and to rule as Thou pleasest. No God is there but Thee, the Inaccessible, the All-Glorious, the Most Great.
帮助我，用你的恩典加强，我的主啊，做什么祢会，并没有隐瞒从我的事情你又具备。所以enravish我同你话语的奇迹，这个世界的噪音和分心可能无力从转身对祢阻止我，可能无法动摇我的坚贞在你的原因，或者从你的恩典的地平线分散我的目光。帮助我，那么，我的神啊，做什么pleaseth你，并开展愿你的旨意。写下来给我，而且，这个世界和世界的良好这是来了，注定我真是在你面前一个座位。强大的艺术你做什么，你willest，并排除为你pleasest。没有上帝是存在的，但你，人迹罕至，全光荣，最伟���的。
All-praise to Thee, O Lord of the worlds and the Object of the adoration of the entire creation!
所有赞美你，主啊世界和整个创作崇拜的对象！

Faded now is all that erstwhile flourished in the Paradise of Thy...

Faded now is all that erstwhile flourished in the Paradise of Thy transcendent oneness, O my God! Where are the rain-giving clouds of Thy mercy? Shorn are the branches of the Tree of Thy unity of the vesture of Thy majesty and wisdom; where is the springtime of Thy gifts and bounties? Motionless lies the Ark of Thy Cause on the sea of Thy creation; where are the winds of Thy grace and favors? Encompassed on every side is Thy Lamp by the tempests of discord blowing from every land; where is the globe of Thy graciousness and protection?
褪色现在在你的超然一体的天堂，我的神啊所有昔日的繁荣！在哪里雨水给云祢怜悯？剪是你的威严和智慧的笼罩祢团结之树的树枝;哪里是祢礼品和奖金的春天？动不动就在于你的对你的创作的海事业的方舟;哪里都是你的恩典和恩惠之风？包含在每边为你的灯被不和谐的每一块土地吹来的暴风雨;哪里是你的贤淑和保护地球？
Thou seest, O my God, how the eyes of these poor creatures are bent upon the horizon of Thy riches, how the hearts of these helpless ones are set in the direction of Thy might. I beseech Thee, O Thou Who art the sole Desire of them that have recognized Thee, and the Object of the adoration of the entire creation, not to suffer them, now that Thou hast attracted them by Thy most exalted Word, to be far removed from the Tabernacle which Thou hast reared up by Thy name, the All-Glorious.
ああ，我的神啊，怎么这些可怜的动物的目光都注视着你的财富的视野，如何对这些无助的人的心在你的力量的方向设置弯曲。我恳求你，你这是谁的艺术他们的唯一愿望已经认识你，和整个创作崇拜的对象，而不是受他们，现在祢吸引他们通过你的最崇高的Word，被相去甚远从你所立起了你的名字，全光荣会幕。
They are sore pressed with cares, O my Lord, and are encompassed about by the wicked. Send down, therefore, from the heaven of Thy behest Thine invisible hosts, that, holding aloft the ensigns of Thy victory, they may help them in Thy land, and may shield them against Thine adversaries.
它们与烦恼压疮，我的主啊，而且是由邪恶的涵盖约。发下来，因此，从你的的天堂遗志祢无形的主机，即，高举你的胜利的少尉，他们可能会帮助他们在你的土地，并可能保护他们对你的敌人。
I entreat Thee, O my God, by Thy name through which the clouds have rained down their rain, and the streams have flowed, and the fire of Thy love hath been kindled throughout Thy dominion, to assist Thy servant who hath turned towards Thee, and hath spoken forth Thy praise, and determined to help Thee. Fortify, then, his heart, O my God, in Thy love and in Thy Faith. Better is this for him than all that hath been created on Thine earth, for the world and whatsoever is therein must perish, and what pertaineth unto Thee must endure as long as Thy most excellent names endure. By Thy Glory! Were the world to last as long as Thine own kingdom will last, to set their affections upon it would still be unseemly for such as have quaffed, from the hands of Thy mercy, the wine of Thy presence; how much more when they recognize its fleetingness and are persuaded of its transience. The chances that overtake it, and the changes to which all things pertaining unto it are continually subjected, attest its impermanence.
我求求你，我的神啊，你名下的通过云层已经雨点般落下的雨水，并流有流，和你的爱因为火烧了整个燃起你的权柄，以帮助你仆人谁曾转向你，和已经说出来你的赞美，并决心帮助你。巩固，那么，他的心脏，我的神啊，你的爱和你的信仰。更好的是这对他比所有历代以来创建于祢地球，面向世界，任何在其中必须灭亡，本属什么对祢必须只要你的最优秀的名字挨挨。通过你的荣耀！是世界上最后只要你自己的王国将持续，设置自己的感情后，它仍然是不体面的，如已一饮而尽，从你的怜悯，对你的存在酒的手中;如何当他们认识到它的fleetingness并说服其短暂得多。这超越它而归这属于所有的东西不断受到的机会，和变化，证明其无常。
Whosoever hath recognized Thee will turn to none save Thee, and will seek from Thee naught else except Thyself. Thou art the sole Desire of the heart of him whose thoughts are fixed on Thee, and the highest Aspiration of whosoever is wholly devoted unto Thee.
因为凡有的认祢会变成没有拯救你，并会从你前功尽弃别人寻求除了你自己。你是他的心脏，其心思都固定在祢的唯一欲望，最高吸入的是凡对祢完全致力于。
No God is there beside Thee, the Almighty, the Help in Peril, the All-Glorious, the Most Powerful.
没有上帝有你以外，全能的，是救苦救难，全光荣，最强大的。

Magnified be Thy name, O my God, for that Thou hast manifested the...

Magnified be Thy name, O my God, for that Thou hast manifested the Day which is the King of Days, the Day which Thou didst announce unto Thy chosen Ones and Thy Prophets in Thy most excellent Tablets, the Day whereon Thou didst shed the splendor of the glory of all Thy names upon all created things. Great is his blessedness whosoever hath set himself towards Thee, and entered Thy presence, and caught the accents of Thy voice.
放大的是你的名字，哦，我的上帝，祢体现了日是天之王，这祢宣布对你的选民和你的先知在你的最优秀的牌子，其上祢流下了辉煌的日日的对所有创造物的所有你的名字的荣耀。伟大的是他的福气因为凡有的给自己走向你，并进入你面前，一把抓住了你的声音的口音。
I beseech Thee, O my Lord, by the name of Him round Whom circleth in adoration the kingdom of Thy names, that Thou wilt graciously assist them that are dear to Thee to glorify Thy word among Thy servants, and to shed abroad Thy praise amidst Thy creatures, so that the ecstasies of Thy revelation may fill the souls of all the dwellers of Thine earth.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，由他全面谁在崇拜circleth你的名字的国度，你必慷慨地帮助他们，是亲爱的祢荣耀仆人之间你的话，并浇灌你的赞美之中的名字你的动物，让你的启示的狂喜可以祢补地球上所有的居民的灵魂。
Since Thou hast guided them, O my Lord, unto the living waters of Thy grace, grant, by Thy bounty, that they may not be kept back from Thee; and since Thou hast summoned them to the habitation of Thy throne, drive them not out from Thy presence, through Thy loving-kindness. Send down upon them what shall wholly detach them from aught else except Thee, and make them able to soar in the atmosphere of Thy nearness, in such wise that neither the ascendancy of the oppressor nor the suggestions of them that have disbelieved in Thy most august and most mighty Self shall be capable of keeping them back from Thee.
既然你已经引导他们，我的主啊，求你的恩典，补助，生活水域你的赏金，他们可能无法保持回来从你。既然祢把她们叫到你的宝座的根基，推动他们不要从你面前，求祢慈爱。发送看不起他们什么应该从其他任何事物完全分离他们除了你，使他们能够在天上翱翔你的亲近的氛围，在这种明智的压迫者既没有优势，也没有人认为有不信的你的最威严的建议最强大的自我应能保持他们回来从你的。

Lauded be Thy name, O Thou in Whose hands is the kingdom of all...

Lauded be Thy name, O Thou in Whose hands is the kingdom of all names, and in the grasp of Whose might are all that are in heaven and all that are on earth! I entreat Thee, by Him Who is Thy Most Effulgent Name Whom Thou hast made a target for the darts of Thy decree in Thy path, O Thou the King of eternity, to rend asunder the veils that have shut off Thy creatures from the horizon of Thy glory, that haply they may turn their faces in the direction of Thy mercy, and draw nigh unto the Dayspring of Thy loving-kindness.
赞美是你的名字，你这在谁的手里是所有名的王国，并在抓谁的实力是所有在天堂和所有在地球上！我求求你，由他谁是你的最灿烂的名称你所造的目标为你的法令，在你的路径中的飞镖，你这永恒的国王，以裂开了口，已经关闭你的生物从地平线的面纱你的荣耀，这大致上也可以找他们的脸上你的慈爱的方向，亲近祢慈爱的地方自治。
Leave not Thy servants to themselves, O my Lord! Draw them through the influence of Thine utterances unto the Dawning-Place of Thine inspiration, and to the Fountain of Thy Revelation, and to the Treasury of Thy wisdom. Thou art He to Whose strength and power all things have testified, Whose Purpose nothing whatsoever of all that hath been created in Thy heaven and on Thy earth hath been able to frustrate.
不要离开你的仆人自己，我的主啊！通过祢话语起誓灵感的曙光广场的影响力吸引他们和你启示的喷泉，并以你的智慧库房。你是他对谁的力量和权力的所有东西都有作证，其目的没有任何所有的hath被在你的天堂创建和你的地球向来能够挫败。
Render, then, victorious, O my God, Thy servants who have set their faces towards Thee, and directed their steps to the seat of Thy grace. Send down, then, upon them what will keep them safe from the danger of turning to any one but Thee, and from fixing their eyes upon aught else except Thyself.
渲染，那么，谁设置自己的脸对你，并指示他们的步骤，你的恩典的胜利的座位，我的神啊，你的仆人。发下来，那么，在他们身上究竟会保证他们的安全，从转向任何一个，但祢的危险，并在其他任何事物固定自己的眼睛，除了你自己。
Potent art Thou to do what Thou willest, and to rule as Thou pleasest. There is no God but Thee, the God of glory and wisdom.
强大的艺术你做什么，你willest，并排除为你pleasest。有没有上帝，但你，荣耀和智慧的神。

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Thy Name, the...

Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Thy Name, the Restrainer, to withhold from us the maleficence of Thine adversaries who have disbelieved in Thy testimony, and caviled at Thy beauty. Overpower by Thy Name, the All-Subduing, such as have wronged Thy Previous Manifestation Who hath now appeared invested with Thy title, the All-Glorious. Lay hold, by Thy name, the Chastiser, on them that have treated Thy Cause with scorn, have jested at Thy most mighty utterances, and were hindered from attaining this most exalted station. Enable Thy loved ones, by Thy Name, the Victorious, to prevail against Thine enemies and the infidels among Thy creatures. Rend asunder, by Thy Name, the Cleaver, the veil that hideth the doings of them that have besmirched Thine honor and undermined Thy Faith among Thy people. Bind, by Thy Name, the Restorer, the broken hearts of them that love Thee, and graciously bless them in their affairs. Teach them, by Thy Name, the All-Knowing, the wonders of Thy wisdom, that they may cleave steadfastly to Thy Faith and walk in the ways of Thy pleasure. Keep them safe, by Thy Name, the Withholder, from the tyranny of the oppressor and the wickedness of the evil-doers and the malice of the stirrers of mischief. Shield them, by Thy Name, the Preserver, within the stronghold of Thy might and power, that haply they may be protected from the darts of doubt that are hurled by such as have rebelled against Thee. Sanctify for Thy servants, by Thy Name which Thou hast blessed above all other names, which Thou hast singled out for Thy favor, and by which Thou didst reveal Thy beauty, these days of which the Pen of Thy decree hath distinctly written, and which, according to Thy will and wisdom, have been preordained in Thine irrevocable Tablet. Subject to Thy rule, by Thy Name, the Conqueror, the people of Thy realm, that all may turn towards Thy face and forsake their all for love of Thee and for the sake of Thy pleasure.
荣耀的艺术你，主啊，我的上帝！我恳求你用你的名字，限制器，从我们隐瞒你敌人谁不信已在你的证词，并在caviled你的美丽的maleficence。用你的名字，全制胜击败，如冤枉你的上一个表现，现在谁已经现投资与你的标题，全光荣。拉住，用你的名，惩罚者，对他们对待你的原因有嘲讽，有jested在你最强大的话语，并实现这一崇高的大多数人站阻碍。让你的亲人，你名下的胜利，以战胜你的敌人和你的动物中的异教徒。撕裂成碎片，用你的名字，砍肉刀，那拦阻他们已经玷污你的尊荣，破坏你的信仰民中的所作所为的面纱。绑定，你名下的恢复，在破碎的心他们爱你，亲切地和祝福他们自己的事务。教他们，用你的名字，全知，祢智慧的奇迹，使他们可以坚定地忠于你的信仰和走在你的快感的方法。保证他们的安全，你名下的扣缴义务人，从压迫者的暴政和恶人的恶行，淘气的搅拌器的恶意。保护他们，你名下的保护者，你的实力和权力的据点，这大致上他们可能保护的疑问，被投掷等作为背叛了你的飞镖之内。圣为你的仆人，你名下的你所上述所有其他名称有福了，你所挑出你的青睐，并通过它祢露出你的美，这几天这祢法令的笔祂所明显写的，这按照你的意愿和智慧，已经注定在你不可撤销的平板电脑。受到你的规则，你名下的，征服者，你的境界的人，那都可以把对你的脸和放弃自己的所有爱你和为了你的快感。
Abase Thou, O my Lord, Thine enemies, and lay hold on them with Thy power and might, and let them be stricken by the blast of Thy wrath. Make them taste, O my God, of Thine awful majesty and vengeance, for they have repudiated the truth of the One in Whom they had believed, Who came unto them with Thy signs and Thy clear tokens and the evidences of Thy power and the manifold revelations of Thy might. Gather, then, together Thy loved ones beneath the shadow of the Tree of Thy oneness, and of the Manifestation of the effulgent light of Thy unity.
ABASE你，我的主啊，你的敌人，并拉住他们与你的力量和可能，并让他们通过你的忿怒的爆炸遭致。让他们尝尝我的神啊，祢可怕的威严和报复的，因为他们否认的一个在其中他们认为，谁对他们带着你的症状和你的清晰标记和你的权力和多方面的证据的真相你的实力的启示。收集，那么，你的一起祢合一的树的阴影下爱的灿烂光明里的团结的表现的那些，和。
Thou art, verily, the One Whose power is immense, Whose vengeance is terrible. No God is there beside Thee, the Almighty, the Most Powerful.
你的艺术，众志成城，一个其力量是巨大的，谁的报复是可怕的。没有上帝是存在的你，全能，最强大的旁边。

Magnified be Thy name, O Lord my God, inasmuch as Thou hast inclined...

Magnified be Thy name, O Lord my God, inasmuch as Thou hast inclined mine ear to Thy voice, and called me to Thyself, and opened mine eyes to gaze on Thy beauty, and illumined my heart with Thy knowledge, and sanctified my breast from the doubts of the infidels in Thy days. I am the one, O my God, who lay fast asleep on his couch, when lo, the messengers of Thy manifold mercies were sent down upon me by Thee, and the gentle winds of Thy loving-kindness blew over me, and roused me up, and caused me to set my face towards the sanctuary of Thy knowledge, and to fix mine eyes upon the splendors of the light of Thy face.
放大的是你的名字，主啊，我的上帝，因为作为祢侧耳到你的声音，叫我到你自己，开了我的眼睛，凝视你的美丽，并与你的知识照亮了我的心脏，从圣洁我的乳房在你的日子异教徒的疑虑。我一个，我的神啊，谁躺在熟睡在他的沙发上，卤味时，对你的大怜悯的使者被送往看不起我了你，和祢慈爱吹过我的温柔的风，和我惊醒起来，并引起了我的设置我的脸朝着你的知识圣殿，并在你的脸上的光的辉煌来解决我的眼睛。
I am but a poor creature, O my Lord! Behold me clinging to the hem of Thy riches. I have fled from darkness and from waywardness unto the brightness of the light of Thy countenance. Were I—and to this Thy glory beareth me witness—to render thanksgiving unto Thee, through the whole continuance of Thy kingdom and the duration of the heaven of Thine omnipotence, I would still have failed to repay Thy manifold bestowals.
我只是一个可怜的人，我的主啊！看哪，我紧紧地抱住你的财富的下摆。我从黑暗和从任性对你脸上的光的亮度逃离。被I-并为此你的​​荣耀，也是为我见证，来呈现称谢你，通过你的王国全连续性和祢无所不能的天堂的时间，我仍然未能偿还你的多方面的恩赐。
I implore Thee, O my Lord, by Thy name, the Ever-Abiding, and by Thy name which Thou didst ordain to be the most great Instrument binding Thee to Thy servants, to grant that I may flee for shelter to Thy door, and speak forth Thy praise. Write down, then, for me, in every world of Thine, that which will enable me to enter beneath Thy shadow and within the borders of Thy court.
我恳求你，我的主啊，用你的名字，永远地遵纪守法，凭你的名字而祢ordain含是最伟大的仪器结合祢仆人，给予我可以逃离住所，你的门，你的赞美讲出来。写下来的话，对我来说，在你的每一个世界里，这将使我下你的影子和你的法庭境内进入。
Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Bountiful, the Most Exalted, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Generous.
你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最尊严，最尊贵，永远地赦，最慷慨的。

All praise be to Thee, O Lord, my God! I know not how to sing Thy...

All praise be to Thee, O Lord, my God! I know not how to sing Thy praise, how to describe Thy glory, how to call upon Thy Name. If I call upon Thee by Thy Name, the All-Possessing, I am compelled to recognize that He Who holdeth in His hand the immediate destinies of all created things is but a vassal dependent upon Thee, and is the creation of but a word proceeding from Thy mouth. And if I proclaim Thee by the name of Him Who is the All-Compelling, I readily discover that He is but a suppliant fallen upon the dust, awe-stricken by Thy dreadful might, Thy sovereignty and power. And if I attempt to describe Thee by glorifying the oneness of Thy Being, I soon realize that such a conception is but a notion which mine own fancy hath woven, and that Thou hast ever been immeasurably exalted above the vain imaginations which the hearts of men have devised.
所有赞美是你，主啊，我的上帝！我不知道怎么唱你的赞美，怎么形容你的荣耀，如何求告你的名。如果我呼吁祢由你的名字，全拥有，我不得不承认，他在他的手holdeth的所有创造物的直接命运只是一个附庸依赖于你，是创造，但一个字诉讼从你的嘴里。如果我宣告祢由他的名字谁是全引人注目，我随手发现，他只是在尘土一个恳求下降，敬畏用你的可怕的力量，你的主权和权力。如果我试图通过美化你的存在的唯一性来形容你，我很快就意识到，这样的观念是但我自己看中的一个概念，祂所编​​织，那祢曾经被没法比以上徒劳的想象力高举这男人的心已制定。
The glory of Thy might beareth me witness! Whoso claimeth to have known Thee hath, by virtue of such a claim, testified to his own ignorance; and whoso believeth himself to have attained unto Thee, all the atoms of the earth would attest his powerlessness and proclaim his failure. Thou hast, however, by virtue of Thy mercy that hath surpassed the kingdoms of earth and heaven, deigned to accept from Thy servants the laud and honor they pay to Thine own exalted Self, and hast bidden them celebrate Thy glory, that the ensigns of Thy guidance may be unfurled in Thy cities and the tokens of Thy mercy be spread abroad among Thy nations, and that each and all may be enabled to attain unto that which Thou hast destined for them by Thy decree, and ordained unto them through Thine irrevocable will and purpose.
你的荣耀可能也是为我见证！但凡claimeth已经知道你的那人，凭借这样的索赔，证明了他自己的无知;而无论谁信自己已经达到的告诉你，地球上所有的原子会证明他的无能，并宣布他的失败。你所有的，但是，凭借你的怜悯是因耶和华超越天地的王国，屈尊从仆人接受他们支付给你自己的自我崇高的赞美和荣誉，也曾吩咐他们庆祝你的荣耀，这的少尉你的指导，可在白布你的城市和你的慈悲的令牌在国外传播你的国家之间，而且每个及所有可能被启用，以实现对，你既然注定他们通过你的法令，并通过祢既定受戒对他们意志和目的。
Having testified, therefore, unto mine own impotence and the impotence of Thy servants, I beseech Thee, by the brightness of the light of Thy beauty, not to refuse Thy creatures attainment to the shores of Thy most holy ocean. Draw them, then, O my God, through the Divine sweetness of Thy melodies, towards the throne of Thy glory and the seat of Thine eternal holiness. Thou art, verily, the Most Powerful, the Supreme Ruler, the Great Giver, the Most Exalted, the Ever-Desired.
其作证，因此，对我自己的无能和仆人的阳痿，我求求你，由你的美光的亮度，不拒绝你的生物要实现祢最圣洁的海洋海岸。吸引他们的话，我的神啊，求祢旋律的神圣甜头，朝着你的荣耀宝座和你永恒的圣洁的座位。你的艺术，众志成城，功能最强大，最高统治者，伟大的赐予者，最尊贵，永远地 - 期望。
Grant, then, O my God, that Thy servant who hath turned towards Thee, hath fixed his gaze upon Thee, and clung to the cord of Thy mercifulness and favor, may be enabled to partake of the living waters of Thy mercy and grace. Cause him, then, to ascend unto the heights to which he aspireth, and withhold him not from that which Thou dost possess. Thou art, verily, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Bountiful.
格兰特的话，我的神啊，那仆人谁曾转向祢，便叫固定他的目光在你身上，并紧紧抓住你的慈悲和青睐的线，可用于将参加祢的怜悯和恩典的活水。因为他，那么，提升到那里，他aspireth的高度，并隐瞒了他不是从哪个你竟拥有。你的艺术，众志成城，将永远赦，最丰富多样。

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Every time I attempt to make mention...

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Every time I attempt to make mention of Thee, I am hindered by the sublimity of Thy station and the overpowering greatness of Thy might. For were I to praise Thee throughout the length of Thy dominion and the duration of Thy sovereignty, I would find that my praise of Thee can befit only such as are like unto me, who are themselves Thy creatures, and who have been generated through the power of Thy decree and been fashioned through the potency of Thy will. And at whatever time my pen ascribeth glory to any one of Thy names, methinks I can hear the voice of its lamentation in its remoteness from Thee, and can recognize its cry because of its separation from Thy Self. I testify that everything other than Thee is but Thy creation and is held in the hollow of Thy hand. To have accepted any act or praise from Thy creatures is but an evidence of the wonders of Thy grace and bountiful favors, and a manifestation of Thy generosity and providence.
赞美归于你，主啊，我的上帝！每次我试图把祢提到的，我对你的站的崇高和你的力量的压倒性伟大的阻碍。对于被我赞美你你的整个统治的长度和你的主权的时间，我会发现我祢的赞美也仅BEFIT如像对我，谁是你的自己的动物，并已通过生成的谁你的法令的权力，并通过你的意志的效​​力被塑造。并在任何时候我的笔ascribeth荣耀你的名字中的任何一个，我以为我可以听到它的悲叹的声音从你的遥远，而且可以识别，因为从你的自我的分离，其叫声。我作证，一切比祢另一种是你的，但创造和你的手空心举行。已接受的任何行为或赞扬你的动物只是你的优雅和丰富的恩惠，你的慷慨和天意的表现的奇迹的证据。
I entreat Thee, O my Lord, by Thy Most Great Name whereby Thou didst separate light from fire, and truth from denial, to send down upon me and upon such of my loved ones as are in my company the good of this world and of the next. Supply us, then, with Thy wondrous gifts that are hid from the eyes of men. Thou art, verily, the Fashioner of all creation. No God is there but Thee, the Almighty, the All-Glorious, the Most High.
我求求你，我的主啊，用你最伟大的名字，由此祢火灾独立光明，从否定真理，因为是在我公司的这个世界的美好在我身上，一经发出这样的我的亲人下来下。提供给我们，然后，与从人的眼睛躲在你的奇妙礼物。你的艺术，众志成城，所有创造的Fashioner。没有上帝是存在的，但你，全能，全光荣，至高。

O Thou, at Whose dreadful majesty all things have trembled, in Whose...

O Thou, at Whose dreadful majesty all things have trembled, in Whose grasp are the affairs of all men, towards Whose grace and mercy are set the faces of all Thy creatures! I entreat Thee, by Thy Name which Thou hast ordained to be the spirit of all names that are in the kingdom of names, to shield us from the whisperings of those who have turned away from Thee, and have repudiated the truth of Thy most august and most exalted Self, in this Revelation that hath caused the kingdom of Thy names to tremble.
呵，在谁的可怕的威严所有的东西都在颤抖，在他们的把握是所有男人的事情，对谁的恩典和怜悯设置你一切生灵的面孔！我求求你，用你的名字你所命定是那些在名称中的王国，从那些谁已经从你转身离去的低语保护我们的所有名称的精神，并否认祢的真理最威严最崇高的自我，在这个启示，怎样使你的名字王国颤抖。
I am one of Thy handmaidens, O my Lord! I have turned my face towards the sanctuary of Thy gracious favors and the adored tabernacle of Thy glory. Purify me of all that is not of Thee, and strengthen me to love Thee and to fulfill Thy pleasure, that I may delight myself in the contemplation of Thy beauty, and be rid of all attachment to any of Thy creatures, and may, at every moment, proclaim: “Magnified be God, the Lord of the worlds!”
我是你的侍女之一，我的主啊！我已经把我的脸朝着你的殷勤有利于保护区和你的荣耀的崇拜帐幕。净化所有的我都在你的不是，并加强我爱你，并履行你的快乐，我可以高兴自己在你的美的沉思，并摆脱所有附件的任何你的生物，并且可以在每一刻，宣告：“增大平面是上帝，全世界的主！”
Let my food, O my Lord, be Thy beauty, and my drink the light of Thy presence, and my hope Thy pleasure, and my work Thy praise, and my companion Thy remembrance, and my aid Thy sovereignty, and my dwelling-place Thy habitation, and my home the seat which Thou hast exalted above the limitations of them that are shut out as by a veil from Thee.
让我的菜，我的主啊，是你的美，我喝你面前的光，我希望你的快乐，我的工作你的赞美，和我的同伴你的记忆，我的帮助你的主权，我的居所当你的居所，和我的家就是你竟高于他们被拒之门外由从你的面纱限制崇高的座位。
Thou art, in truth, the God of power, of strength and glory.
你是，事实上，神的力量，力量和荣耀。

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Every time I am reminded of Thee and...

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Every time I am reminded of Thee and muse on Thy virtues, I am seized with such ecstasies and am so enravished by Thee that I find myself unable to make mention of Thy name and to extol Thee. I am carried back to such heights that I recognize my self to be the same as the remembrance of Thee in Thy realm, and the essence of Thy praise among Thy servants. As long as that self endureth, so long will Thy praise continue to be shed abroad among Thy creatures and Thy remembrance glorified by Thy people.
赞美归于你，主啊，我的上帝！每次我想起你和缪斯在你的美德的时候，我抓住这样的狂喜和我等了祢enravished，我发现自己无法再提到你的名字和赞美你。我抬回这样的高度，我承认我自己是一样祢在你的领域的怀念，和你的赞美你的仆人之间的本质。只要是自存，只要将你的赞美继续浇灌你的生物和你的记忆被你的人荣耀之中。
Every man endued with insight among Thy servants is persuaded that my self liveth eternally and can never perish, inasmuch as remembrance of Thee is eternal and will endure so long as Thine own Self endureth, and Thy praise is everlasting and will last as long as Thine own sovereignty will last. By its means Thou art glorified by such of Thy chosen ones as call upon Thee and by the sincere among Thy servants. Nay, the praise wherewith any one, in the entire creation, praiseth Thee proceedeth from this exalted self and returneth unto it, even as the sun which, while it shineth, sheddeth its splendor upon whatsoever may be exposed to its rays. From this sun is generated, and unto it must return, the light which is shed over all things.
每个人都赋予了洞察你的仆人之间被说服了我自己活着，并永远不会灭亡，因为是祢的记忆是永恒的，只要忍为你自己的自存，和你的赞美是永恒的，并且只要将持续为祢自己的主权将持续。其手段2:16你通过这样的你的选择的人是在你身上的呼叫和仆人之间的真诚的赞美。不仅如此，赞美用那个的任何一个，在整个创作，祢称赞从proceedeth这个崇高的自我和对归回它，即使在阳光下它，而它照耀，流人它的辉煌后，任何可能会接触到它的光线。从这个太阳产生，对必须返回，这是大棚万物的光。
Exalted, immeasurably exalted art Thou above any attempt to measure the greatness of Thy Cause, above any comparison that one may seek to make, above the efforts of the human tongue to utter its import! From everlasting Thou hast existed, alone with no one else beside Thee, and wilt, to everlasting, continue to remain the same, in the sublimity of Thine essence and the inaccessible heights of Thy glory.
崇高，崇高没法比祢上述任何试图测量你的事业的伟大，上述任何比较，一个可以寻求使，上面人舌头说出其进口的努力！从亘古祢存在，单独与旁若无人祢身旁，病，到永远，继续保持不变，在祢的本质和你的荣耀人迹罕至的高度的崇高。
And when Thou didst purpose to make Thyself known unto men, Thou didst successively reveal the Manifestations of Thy Cause, and ordained each to be a sign of Thy Revelation among Thy people, and the Dayspring of Thine invisible Self amidst Thy creatures, until the time when, as decreed by Thee, all Thy previous Revelations culminated in Him Whom Thou hast appointed as the Lord of all who are in the heaven of revelation and the kingdom of creation, Him Whom Thou hast established as the Sovereign Lord of all who are in the heavens and all who are on the earth. He it was Whom Thou hast determined to be the Herald of Thy Most Great Revelation and the Announcer of Thy Most Ancient Splendor. In this Thou hadst no other purpose except to try them who have manifested Thy most excellent titles unto all who are in heaven and on earth. He it was Whom Thou hast commanded to establish His covenant with all created things.
而当你谤目的要建立自己知道是对人说，祢先后揭示你的事业的表现，和每个受戒成为你的启示民中的标志，你的自我无形之中你的生物的启端，直到时间时，由于颁布了你，你的所有以前的启示终于在他就是你所任命为所有的主谁是启示的天堂和创造的王国，他就是你所建立的所有的主耶和华谁在谁是地球上的天堂和所有。他是就是你所确定是你的最伟大启示的先驱和你的最古老辉煌的播音员。在此你hadst除了试戴没有别的目的谁也表现你的最优秀的游戏对所有谁是天上地下。他是谁你所吩咐的建立他的约与所有创造物。
And when Thy promise came to pass and the set time was fulfilled, He Who is the Possessor of all Names and Attributes was made manifest unto men. Thereupon all that were in the heavens and all that were on the earth were terror-stricken save those whom Thou didst keep under Thy protection and preserve within the shelter of Thy power and gracious providence. There befell Him, at the hands of such of Thy creatures as have transgressed against Thee, that which the tongue of no one of Thy servants can recount.
而当你的承诺来传递，并在设定的时间应验，他是谁所有的名称和属性的拥有者是显明赐给人。于是那名在天上一切，一切都在地球上被闻风丧胆拯救那些人祢不断你的保护，你的权力和亲切的天意的庇护所内保存。还有降临他，在你的这种生物的手中已经违背你，那其中没有一个仆人的舌头可以各显神通。
Look down, then, upon Him, O my God, with the eye of Thy tender mercy, and send down upon Him and upon those that love Him all the good Thou didst ordain in the heaven of Thy will and the Tablet of Thy decree. Aid them, then, with Thy succor, for Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Exalted, the All-Glorious, the All-Compelling.
往下看，然后，在他身上，我的神啊，与你的慈悲的眼睛，在他身上的，对那些爱他的你的的天地意志和平板祢的法令，所有的好祢ordain含发下来。帮助他们，然后，用你的救援，为你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最尊贵，全光荣，全引人注目。

All glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! I bear witness for Thee to that...

All glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! I bear witness for Thee to that whereto Thou Thyself didst bear witness for Thine own Self, ere the day Thou hadst created the creation or made mention thereof, that Thou art God, and that there is none other God beside Thee. From eternity Thou hast, in Thy transcendent oneness, been immeasurably exalted above Thy servants’ conception of Thy unity, and wilt to eternity remain, in Thine unapproachable singleness, far above the praise of Thy creatures. No words that any one beside Thee may utter can ever beseem Thee, and no man’s description except Thine own description can befit Thy nature. All who adore Thy unity have been sore perplexed to fathom the mystery of Thy oneness, and all have confessed their powerlessness to attain unto the comprehension of Thine essence and to scale the pinnacle of Thy knowledge. The mighty have all acknowledged their weakness, and the learned recognized their ignorance. They that are possessed of influence are as nothing when compared with the revelations of Thy stupendous sovereignty, and they who are exalted sink into oblivion when brought before the manifestations of Thy great glory. The radiance of the brightest luminaries is eclipsed by the effulgent splendors of Thy face, and the tongues of the most eloquent of speakers falter under the unrestrained effusions of Thy holy utterance, and the foundations of the mightiest structures tremble before the onrushing force of Thy compelling power.
所有的荣耀都归给你，主啊，我的上帝！我作证，让你来这向其中你自己说谤见证了你自己的自我，埃雷未曾造成创建创建或其提及，那你是神，再没有别的神祢旁边的一天你。从永恒祢，在你的超然一体，已经没法比上面你的团结你的仆人，崇高的概念，并枯萎永恒依然存在，在你难以接近单一，远远高于你的生物的一致好评。没有的话那你以外的任何一个可能叫不出都不能beseem你，没有人的描述，除了你自己的描述可以BEFIT你的本性。所有谁爱你的团结一直痛困惑捉摸祢合一的奥秘，并且都已经承认自己的无能，以达到对的祢本质的理解和扩展祢知识的顶峰。威猛都承认自己的软弱，和教训认可他们的无知。当与你的惊人主权的启示相比，他们所拥有的影响是微不足道的，他们谁是高举片被遗忘的时候，你的大荣耀表现审理。各路名人的光芒由你的脸上的灿烂辉煌黯然失色，而其中最雄辩的发言者的舌头下你神圣的话语奔放积液动摇，而最强���的结构的基础祢引人注目的突进的力量面前发抖电源。
Who is there, O my God, that can be deemed worthy to be remembered when Thou art remembered, and where is he to be found who can be regarded as capable of hinting at Thy nature or worthy of mention in the court of Thy transcendent oneness? From everlasting Thou hast been alone with no one else beside Thee, and to everlasting Thou wilt continue to be one and the same. No God is there beside Thee, the God of power, of glory and wisdom.
谁在那里，哦，我的上帝，这可以被视为值得你若想起该记住的，哪里是他被发现谁可以被视为能暗示你的自然的或值得一提的在你的超然合一法庭？从亘古祢一直独自带旁若无人祢身旁，到永远你若继续同一个。没有上帝是存在的祢身旁，权力的荣耀和智慧的神。
Glorified be Thy name, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Him Who is Thine exalted and supreme Remembrance, Whom Thou hast sent down unto all Thy creatures and invested with Thy name, the All-Glorious, Whose will Thou hast ordained to be Thine own will, Whose self Thou hast decreed to be the revealer of Thine own Self, and His essence the Dayspring of Thy wisdom, and His heart the treasury of Thine inspiration, and His breast the dawning-place of Thy most excellent attributes and most exalted titles, and His tongue the fountainhead of the waters of Thy praise and the wellspring of the soft-flowing streams of Thy wisdom, to send down upon us that which will enable us to dispense with all else except Thee, and will cause us to direct our steps towards the sanctuary of Thy pleasure and to aspire after the things Thou didst ordain for us according to Thine irrevocable decree. Empower us, then, O my God, to forsake ourselves and cleave steadfastly to Him Who is the Manifestation of Thy Self, the Most Exalted, the Most High. Supply us also with that which is best for us, and write us down with such of Thy servants as have repudiated the Idol (Mírzá Yaḥyá), and firmly believed in Thee, and been so established on the throne of certitude that the whisperings of the Evil One have been powerless to hinder them from turning their faces towards Thy name, the All-Merciful.
荣耀是你的名字，主啊，我的上帝！我恳求你通过他的人都是你的尊贵和至高无上的追忆，就是你所发下来告诉你的一切生灵，投资与你的名字，全光荣，谁的将你派定是你自己的意志，谁的自我祢下旨是你自己的自我，和他的本质的你的智慧启端，和他的心脏祢灵感的宝库，而他的乳房曙光的地方你的最优秀的属性，最崇高的头衔，而他的舌头的源泉的启示对你的赞美和你的智慧软溪流的源泉水，以向我们发下来了，这将使我们能够免除一切，除了你，必使我们指导我们的步骤，你的快乐的避难所和之后的事情祢照你不可撤销法令，注定让我们向往。授权我们，那么，我的神啊，抛弃自己，坚定不移地忠于他的人就是你的自我，最尊贵，最高级的表现形式。供应美国还与哪些是最适合我们，给我们下这样的仆人，作为已经否定了偶像（米尔扎叶海亚），并坚定地相信你，并一直等确定性的宝座证实的窃窃私语恶者已经无力转动他们的面孔对你的名字，全仁慈阻碍了他们。
Powerful art Thou to do what Thou pleasest and to ordain what Thou willest. No God is there but Thee, the All-Possessing, the All-Highest, the Almighty, the All-Bountiful, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
强大的艺术你做什么，你pleasest和阿拉维什么你willest。没有上帝是存在的，但你，全拥有，全最高，全能，全丰年祭，全知，全明智的。

O Thou Whose remembrance is the delight of the souls of all them that...

O Thou Whose remembrance is the delight of the souls of all them that yearn after Thee, Whose name is the exultation of the hearts of all who are wholly devoted to Thy will, Whose praise is cherished by such as have drawn nigh unto Thy court, Whose face is the ardent desire of all them that have recognized Thy truth, Whose trial is the healer of the sicknesses of them who have embraced Thy Cause, Whose calamity is the highest aspiration of such as are rid of all attachment to any one but Thyself!
呵，你是谁的记忆是一切的灵魂的喜悦他们渴望祢后，他的名字是所有谁是完全致力于你的心中的狂喜意志，人的称赞此类珍惜的都抽将近那你的球场，他的脸是所有的人的殷切期盼已认识你的真理，谁的审判是其中的谁已经接受了你的事业的的疾病的治疗者，谁的灾难是，如最高愿望是摆脱所有附件的任何一个，但你自己！
Glorified, immeasurably glorified art Thou, in Whose hands is the empire of whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is on earth, Thou, Who through but one word of Thy mouth, caused all things to expire and dissolve asunder, and Who, by yet another word, caused whatever had been separated to be combined and reunited! Magnified be Thy name, O Thou Who hast power over all that are in the heavens and all that are on earth, Whose dominion embraceth whatsoever is in the heaven of Thy Revelation and the kingdom of Thy creation. None can equal Thee in Thy created realms; none can compare with Thee in the universe Thou hast fashioned. The mind of no one hath comprehended Thee, and the aspiration of no soul hath reached Thee. I swear by Thy might! Were any one to soar, on whatever wings, as long as Thine own Being endureth, throughout the immensity of Thy knowledge, he would still be powerless to transgress the bounds which the contingent world hath set for him. How can, then, such a man aspire to wing his flight into the atmosphere of Thy most exalted presence?
荣耀，荣耀没法比，你是在谁的手里是任何帝国是在天上所当地球上，你，谁通过但有你的口口相传，造成万物到期，溶解四分五裂，和谁，但由换句话说，造成任何已分离的要被组合和团聚！放大的是你的名字，你这因你权力，一切都在天上，所有那些在地球上，谁统治embraceth任何在你的启示录的天堂，你的创作的王国。没有人可以等于祢在你的领域建立;没有人可以与你同去祢老式宇宙进行比较。没有人的心灵祂所理解你，并没有灵魂的愿望祂所达到你。我发誓，你的实力！是任何一个飙升，在任何翅膀，只要你自己的存在永远长存，贯穿你的知识浩瀚，他仍然是无力违背其队伍的世界已经给他设定的界限。如何才能，那么，这样的男人向往的机翼他的飞行到你的最崇高的存在大气？
He, indeed, is endued with understanding who acknowledgeth his powerlessness and confesseth his sinfulness, for should any created thing lay claim to any existence, when confronted with the infinite wonders of Thy Revelation, so blasphemous a pretension would be more heinous than any other crime in all the domains of Thine invention and creation. Who is there, O my Lord, that, when Thou revealest the first glimmerings of the signs of Thy transcendent sovereignty and might, hath the power to claim for himself any existence whatever? Existence itself is as nothing when brought face to face with the mighty and manifold wonders of Thine incomparable Self.
他，事实上，被赋予了认识谁acknowledgeth他的无能和他。承认有罪，应为任何创造出来的东西宣称对任何存在的，与你的启示录的无限奇迹面对，所以亵渎的预紧会比任何其他犯罪更令人发指在你的发明和创造的所有领域。谁在那里，我的主啊，是，当你revealest的祢超越主权的标志第一glimmerings和可能的，就有权利要求对自己的任何存在什么权力？存在本身就是因为没事的时候带来面对面与祢无比自我的强大的和多方面的奇迹。
Far, immeasurably far, art Thou exalted above all things, O Thou Who art the King of Kings! I entreat Thee by Thy Self and by Them Who are the Manifestations of Thy Cause and the Daysprings of Thine authority to write down for us that which Thou hast written down for Thy chosen ones. Withhold not from us that which Thou didst ordain for Thy loved ones, who, as soon as Thy call reached them, hastened unto Thee, and when the splendors of the light of Thy countenance were shed upon them, instantly prostrated themselves in adoration before Thy face.
远远的，远远没法比，你的艺术崇高的上述所有的东西，哦你这万王之王！我求求祢由你的自我和他们谁是你事业的表现和你的权力的Daysprings写下了我们，你所写下的你的选择的。从我们这祢注定了你的亲人，扣压不是谁，只要你的召唤达到他们，对祢赶紧，当你脸上的光的辉煌后，他们流下，立即拜倒在自己崇拜你的前脸。
We are Thy servants, O my Lord, and in the grasp of Thy power. If Thou chastisest us with the chastisement inflicted upon the former and the latter generations, Thy verdict would be assuredly just and Thine act praiseworthy. Powerful art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee. None other God is there beside Thee, the Almighty, the All-Glorious, the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting.
我们是你的仆人，我的主啊，在你的权力的把握。如果你chastisest我们对前者和后者几代造成的惩罚，你的判决将无疑只是和你的行为值得称道。强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。没有其他的神是有祢身旁，全能，全光荣，是救苦救难，自我存续。

Unto Thee be praise, O Thou Who inclinest Thine ear to the sighing of...

Unto Thee be praise, O Thou Who inclinest Thine ear to the sighing of them that have rid themselves of all attachment to any one but Thee, and Who hearest the voice of the lamentation of those who are wholly devoted to Thy Self! Thou beholdest all that hath befallen them at the hands of such of Thy creatures as have transgressed and rebelled against Thee. Thy might beareth me witness, O Thou Who art the King of the realms of justice and the Ruler of the cities of mercy! The tribulations they have been made to suffer are such as no pen, in the entire creation, can reckon. Should any one attempt to make mention of them, he would find himself powerless to describe them.
对你是赞美，呵，你是谁inclinest侧耳他们的已摆脱所有附件的自己的任何一个，但祢的叹息，和谁听见那些谁是完全致力于你的自我的哀叹的声音！你眼看着一切所遭遇他们在你的这种生物的手中都犯竟背叛你。你可能也是为我作证，你这是谁的艺术正义领域的国王和怜悯的城市统治者！他们已遭受磨难是这样，因为没有笔，在整个创作，可以算。如果任何一个企图使他们提到的，他会发现自己无能为力来形容他们。
As these tribulations, however, were sustained in Thy path and for love of Thee, they who were afflicted by them render thanks, under all conditions, unto Thee, and say: “O Thou Who art the Delight of our hearts and the Object of our adoration! Were the clouds of Thy decree to rain down upon us the darts of affliction, we would, in our love for Thee, refuse to be impatient. We would yield Thee praise and thanksgiving, for we have recognized and are persuaded that Thou hast ordained only that which will be best for us. If our bodies be, at times, weighed down by our troubles, yet our souls rejoice with exceeding gladness. We swear by Thy might, O Thou Who art the Desire of our hearts and the Exultation of our souls! Every trouble that toucheth us in our love for Thee is an evidence of Thy tender mercy, every fiery ordeal a sign of the brightness of Thy light, every woeful tribulation a cooling draught, every toil a blissful repose, every anguish a fountain of gladness.”
由于这些磨难，然而，是持续在你的路径和爱你的，他们谁被他们折磨渲染的感谢，在所有情况下，告诉你，说：“啊，你这我们心中的喜悦和对象我们的崇拜！是你的法令的云在我们身上雨点般落下的痛苦的飞镖，我们会在我们为你的爱，拒绝心急。我们将产生祢赞美和感恩，因为我们已经认识到，并说服你竟只有这将是对我们最好的受戒。如果我们的身体是，有时，拖累了我们的麻烦，但我们的灵魂欣喜与欢乐超出。我们发誓你的可能，你这是谁是我们的心中的欲望和我们的灵魂的狂喜！摸我们，我们爱你每次麻烦的是证据，你的慈悲，每一个火热的考验你的光的亮度的标志，每一个前景堪忧患难冷却草案，每次挥汗如雨一个幸福的休息，每一个痛苦快乐的泉源。 “
Whosoever, O my Lord, is impatient in the tribulations befalling him in Thy path, hath not drunk of the cup of Thy love nor tasted of the sweetness of Thy remembrance. I implore Thee, by Him Who is the King of all names and their Sovereign, Who is the Revealer of all attributes and their Creator, and by them who have soared aloft and drawn nigh unto Thee and winged their flight into the atmosphere of Thy presence, and have endured the galling of chains for Thy sake, to grant that all Thy people may be graciously aided to recognize Him Who is the Manifestation of Thine own Self, Who, because He summoned mankind unto Thee, hath been exiled and cast into prison.
凡，我的主啊，是个急性子的降临他你的路径中的磨难，就没有醉杯你的爱，也没有尝过你的记忆的甜头。我恳求你，由他谁是所有名的国王和他们的君主，谁是所有属性的启示和他们的创造者，并通过他们谁飙升高高举起，并制定将近那你和他们翅飞入你的存在气氛和忍受链的磨损为你的缘故，给予所有你的人可能会慷慨地资助认识他的人，是你自己的自我的表现，是谁，因为他召唤人类的告诉你，hath被流放和监里。
The tenderness of Thy mercy, O my Lord, surpasseth the fury of Thy wrath, and Thy loving-kindness exceedeth Thy hot displeasure, and Thy grace excelleth Thy justice. Hold Thou, through Thy wondrous favors and mercies, the hands of Thy creatures, and suffer them not to be separated from the grace which Thou hast ordained as the means whereby they can recognize Thee. The glory of Thy might beareth me witness! Were such a thing to happen, every soul would be sore shaken, every man endued with understanding would be bewildered, and every possessor of knowledge would be dumbfounded, except those who have been succored through the hands of Thy Cause, and have been made the recipients of the revelations of Thy grace and of the tokens of Thy favors.
你的怜​​悯的柔情，我的主啊，你的surpasseth愤怒的愤怒，你的慈爱exceedeth你的热不悦，和你的风度胜过你的正义。抱你，通过你奇妙的恩惠和怜悯，你的生物的手，不容他们从你所命定的途径，使他们能够认识祢恩典分开。你的荣耀可能也是为我见证！是这样的事情发生，每一个灵魂会痛动摇，每个人都赋予了理解会迷惑，和知识的每一个养着就傻眼了，除了那些谁通过你的事业之手被救济的穷人，并已取得了你的恩惠的标记你的恩典和启示的接受者。
I swear by Thy might, O my God! Wert Thou to regard Thy servants according to their deserts in Thy days, they would assuredly merit naught except Thy chastisement and torment. Thou art, however, the One Who is of great bounteousness, Whose grace is immense. Look not down upon them, O my God, with the glance of Thy justice, but rather with the eyes of Thy tender compassions and mercies. Do, then, with them according to what beseemeth Thy generosity and bountiful favor. Potent art Thou to do whatsoever may please Thee. Incomparable art Thou. No God is there beside Thee, the Lord of the throne on high and of earth below, the Ruler of this world and of the world to come. Thou art the God of Bounty, the Ever-Forgiving, the Great Giver, the Most Generous.
我发誓，你的可能，我的神啊！邂逅相遇，你要根据自己的在你的天沙漠把你的仆人，他们将无疑值得前功尽弃，除了你的惩罚和折磨。你的艺术，但是，谁是伟大的bounteousness，谁的恩典是巨大的。不下来的眼光来看待他们，哦，我的上帝，与你的正义之一目了然，而是用你的温柔的怜悯，怜悯的目光。这样做的话，他们根据什么beseemeth你的慷慨和丰富的青睐。强大的艺术你做任何可能取悦你。无与伦比的艺术你。没有上帝是存在的祢身旁，宝座的主地球上低于高，这个世界的统治者和世界的到来���你是赏金的上帝，永远赦的，伟大的赐予者，最慷慨的。
Do Thou bless, O Lord my God, the One through Whom the mysteries of Thine omnipotence have been disclosed, through Whom the revelations of Thy divinity have been glorified, through Whom the goodly pearls of Thy knowledge and wisdom have been uncovered, through Whom Thy signs and tokens have been noised abroad, through Whom Thy word hath been set forth with clearness, through Whom the light of Thy countenance hath shone forth and the power of Thy sovereignty been established. Bless Thou all those also who, wholly for Thy sake, have turned towards Thee. Send down, moreover, upon Him and them such of Thy wondrous mercies as may well beseem Thy highness. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Help in Peril, the All-Glorious, the Self-Subsisting.
难道你祝福，主啊，我的上帝，在经过一个谁祢无所不能的神秘面纱已经被披露，通过他们你的神的启示已经荣耀，借着他的你的知识和智慧的好珠子已经发现，通过你的谁标志和标记已经在国外传扬遍地，通过他们你的话落被规定得很清晰，便叫你脸上的光祂所焕发出来和你的主权权力得以确立。祝福你所有那些还谁，完全为你的缘故，已转向你。发下来，而且，在他和他们这样的你奇妙的慈爱的可能beseem你的高度。你的艺术，众志成城，全能的，是救苦救难，全光荣，自我存续。

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Thou art He Who hath created all...

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Thou art He Who hath created all things through a word uttered by Thy behest, and fashioned the entire creation through the power of Thy sovereignty and might. The mightiest of men are abased before the revelations of Thy glory, and they who are endued with strength tremble when faced with the evidences of Thy might. Every man of insight is bereft of vision when confronted with the effulgence of the glory of Thy face, and he who is possessed of riches is poor and desolate when beholding the plenteousness of Thy wealth.
赞美归于你，主啊，我的上帝！你是他是谁定通过你的遗志说出一个字创造了万物，并且通过你的主权和力量的力量塑造了整个创作。人的最强大的是自卑的你的荣耀的启示之前，当面对你的力量的证据，他们谁是赋予了力量颤抖。洞察每个人都是丧失视力时，与你的脸上的荣耀的光辉面对，并瞻仰你的财富plenteousness时，他是谁拥有财富是穷人和荒凉。
I implore Thee by Thine All-Glorious Name, wherewith Thou didst adorn all the denizens of the kingdom of Thy revelation and the inmates of the heaven of Thy will, to grant that my soul may be attracted by the sweetness of the melody of the Bird of Heaven that chanteth amidst the branches of the tree of Thy decree that Thou art God, that there is none other God beside Thee.
我恳求祢通过祢全光辉的名字，怎能叫祢装饰你的启示的王国，你的的天堂的囚犯所有的居民会给予我的灵魂可以由鸟类的旋律的甜头吸引天堂是chanteth之中你的法令的树你是神的分支，有没有其他可比你的。
Cleanse me with the waters of Thy mercy, O my Lord, and make me wholly Thine, and cause me to approach the Tabernacle of Thy Cause and the adored Sanctuary of Thy Presence. Ordain, then, for me all the things Thou didst ordain for the chosen ones among Thy handmaidens, and rain down upon me that which will illuminate my face and enlighten my heart.
洁净我用你的怜悯，我的主啊水域，并让我完全你的，使我接近你的原因的帐幕和你面前的崇拜保护区。阿拉维的话，​​对我来说所有的事情祢注定了你的侍女之间的选民，并在我身上雨点般落下的，将照亮我的脸和启发我的心脏。
Thou hast power to do what Thou willest, and Thou ordainest what Thou pleasest.
祢权力做什么你willest，和你ordainest什么你pleasest。

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Thou seest my poverty and my misery,...

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Thou seest my poverty and my misery, my troubles and my needs, my utter helplessness and my extreme lowliness, my lamentations and my bitter wailing, the anguish of my soul and the afflictions which beset me. The power of Thy might beareth me witness! Such is the depth of mine abasement that Thy servants who have strayed far from Thy path deride me. Thou knowest that I am recognized as the bearer of Thy name among Thy creatures. Thou knowest that my station is but an image of Thy station, that my virtues recount Thy virtues, that within mine inmost being naught can be found except the revelations of Thy signs, and that my very essence is but a reflection of the evidences of Thy unity.
赞美归于你，主啊，我的上帝！你看见我的贫穷，我的痛苦，我的烦恼，我的需求，我彻底无奈和我极度谦卑，我哀叹，我的苦哭，我的灵魂的痛苦和困扰而我痛苦。祢的力量可能也是为我见证！这就是我的屈辱是你的仆人谁从你的路径偏离​​远嘲笑我的深度。你知道，我认为是你的名字你的动物之间的承载。你知道，我的站，但是你的站的​​形象，我的美德讲述你的美德，这在我的内心深处是徒劳的，除非能够祢迹象揭露被发现，而我的本质不过是你的的证据的反映统一。
All these things Thou hast noised abroad among Thy creatures, in such wise that none can recognize me, except as one who beareth Thy name. I swear by Thy glory! My lamentations are not for the things which have befallen me in Thy path, but are due to my recognition that by reason of mine abasement the hearts of them that love Thee have been sore shaken, and the souls of Thine adversaries have been so filled with joy that they rejoice over those who have detached themselves from all except Thee and have hastened towards the river of Thy remembrance and praise. So great is their waywardness that when meeting Thy loved ones, they shake their heads in derision of Thy Cause and say: “Where is your Lord Whom ye mention in the daytime and in the night season? Where is He to be found Whom ye call your Sovereign, to Whom ye summon all men to turn?” Their pride and haughtiness waxed greater and greater until they denied the power of Thy might and rejected Thy sovereignty and dominion.
所有这些事情你已经在国外传扬遍地你的动物中，在这样的聪明，没有能够认出我，但作为一个谁也是为你的名。我发誓，你的荣耀！我悲叹不是为这你的路径已经降临了我的事，但由于我认识到，因我的屈辱他们心中的爱祢已经痛动摇，和你的对手的灵魂已如此充满喜悦，他们欣喜那些谁脱​​离自己所有，除了你和催生对你的怀念和赞美的河流。如此之大是他们的任性，当你的会议所爱的人，他们大摇其头在你的事业嘲笑说：“哪里是你的主，就是你们所提到在白天和夜晚的季节？他在哪���可以找到你们谁打电话给你的主权，为你们谁召集所有的人把？“他们的骄傲和傲慢日见强盛，直到他们否认你的权力，并可能会拒绝你的主权和统治。
Thy glory beareth me witness! I delight in mine own afflictions and in the afflictions which they who love me suffer in Thy path. Neither I nor they, however, are able to bear such affronts and reproaches as are uttered by Thine enemies against Thy Self, the Unrestrained. How long shalt Thou remain seated, O my God, on the throne of Thy forbearance and patience? Speak Thou Thy word of wrath, O Thou Whom no eyes can see! Well-beloved is Thy mercy unto the sincere among Thy servants, and well-beseeming Thy chastisement of the infidels among Thine enemies. Send down upon them, therefore, O my Lord, that which will unmistakably reveal unto them the fury of Thy wrath and the ascendancy of Thy power, and will enable them to recognize the weight of Thy might and the greatness of Thy strength. If Thou refusest, O my God, to aid them that love Thee, assist Thou, then, Thine own Self and Him Who is Thy Remembrance.
你的荣耀，也是为我见证！我高兴在我自己的苦难和他们谁爱我挨你的路径中的苦难。无论是我还是他们的，却是能够承受这样的侮辱和指责的是由你的敌人对你的自我，山野一声。你保持多久必坐下，我的神啊，你的上忍和耐心的宝座？你说你的忿怒的话，你这没有谁的眼睛可以看到！良好的良人你的怜悯真诚的仆人之间，以及良好的beseeming你的敌人之间的异教徒你的惩罚。发送看不起他们，所以，我的主啊，那这将明白无误地揭示给他们你的忿怒的愤怒和你的权力的优势，并将使他们认识到你���实力的体重和你的力量的伟大。如果你不愿接受，我的神啊，以帮助他们爱你，你帮助的话，你自己的自我和他谁是你的追忆。
I entreat Thee by Thy name, that hath caused the ocean of Thy wrath to surge, to chastise them who have repudiated Thy truth and disowned Thine utterances. Abase them, then, by Thy might and power, and exalt such as have, wholly for Thy sake, set their faces towards Thee, that through them the ensigns of Thy glorification may be unfurled among all nations, and Thy tokens be spread abroad among all peoples, and that all may testify that Thou art God, that there is none other God beside Thee, the God of power, of majesty and glory.
我央求你用你的名字，那怎样使你的忿怒的海洋激增，以惩罚他们谁也否定了你的真相，并否认祢的话语。 ABASE他们，然后，用你的实力和力量，发扬如已，完全为你的缘故，设置他们的脸对你，通过你的这些荣耀的少尉可能所有国家之间的白布，和你的令牌在国外传播之中所有人民和所有可以证明，你是神，有没有其他可比你的，权力的神的威严和荣耀。

Magnified art Thou, O Lord my God! I ask Thee by Thy Name which Thou...

Magnified art Thou, O Lord my God! I ask Thee by Thy Name which Thou hast set up above all other names, through which the veil of heaven hath been split asunder and the Daystar of Thy beauty hath risen above the horizon, shining with the brightness of Thy Name, the Exalted, the Most High, to succor me with Thy wondrous help and to preserve me in the shelter of Thy care and protection.
放大的艺术你，主啊，我的上帝！我问你用你的名字就是你所立上述所有其他名称，通过这些天的面纱hath被分裂成碎片和你的美的启明星在地平线以上祂所上升，随着你的名字，上人的亮度闪耀最High，搭救我，你奇妙的帮助和保护我，你的照顾和保护的栖身之所。
I am one of Thy handmaidens, O my Lord! Unto Thee have I turned, and in Thee have I placed my trust. Grant that I may be so confirmed in my love for Thee, and in fulfilling that which is well-pleasing unto Thee, that neither the defection of the infidels among Thy people, nor the clamor of the hypocrites among Thy creatures, may avail to keep me back from Thee.
我是你的侍女之一，我的主啊！告诉你，我转过身来，在你，我把我的信任。格兰特，我可以这样确认了我的爱为你，在履行了其良好的讨好告诉你，无论你的人与人之间的异教徒的叛逃，也不是你的动物之间的伪君子的喧嚣，可以利用保持我从你回来。
Purge Thou mine ear, O my Lord, that I may hearken unto the verses sent down unto Thee, and illuminate my heart with the light of Thy knowledge, and loose my tongue that it may make mention of Thee and sing Thy praise. By Thy might, O my God! My soul is wedded to none beside Thee, and my heart seeketh none except Thine own Self.
清除你我的耳朵，我的主啊，我也就听你们的诗句发下来给你，并与祢知识之光照亮我的心脏，并失去我的舌头，它可能使提祢唱你的赞美。用你的可能，我的神啊！我的灵魂是拘泥于没有祢身旁，我的心脏没有叩门，除了你自己的自我。
No God is there beside Thee, the All-Glorious, the Great Giver, the Forgiving, the Compassionate.
没有上帝是存在的祢旁，全光荣，伟大的赐予者的宽恕，慈悲的。

These are, O my God, the days whereon Thou didst enjoin Thy servants...

These are, O my God, the days whereon Thou didst enjoin Thy servants to observe the Fast. With it Thou didst adorn the preamble of the Book of Thy Laws revealed unto Thy creatures, and didst deck forth the Repositories of Thy commandments in the sight of all who are in Thy heaven and all who are on Thy earth. Thou hast endowed every hour of these days with a special virtue, inscrutable to all except Thee, Whose knowledge embraceth all created things. Thou hast, also, assigned unto every soul a portion of this virtue in accordance with the Tablet of Thy decree and the Scriptures of Thine irrevocable judgment. Every leaf of these Books and Scriptures Thou hast, moreover, allotted to each one of the peoples and kindreds of the earth.
这些都是我的神啊，天其上祢嘱咐仆人观察快速。有了它祢点缀你的法律书的序言中透露对你的生物，和复活，甲板出你的命令，在所有谁在你的天堂，所有谁是你的地球景象的存储库。祢赋予每一个小时，这些天有一个特殊的美德，高深莫测的所有，除了你，谁的知识embraceth所有创造物。你所有的，也对分配给每一个灵魂，这种美德的一部分，按照你的命令的平板和祢不可撤销的判决圣经。这些书籍和经文祢的每一片叶子，而且，分配给人民和世界各族的每一个。
For Thine ardent lovers Thou hast, according to Thy decree, reserved, at each daybreak, the cup of Thy remembrance, O Thou Who art the Ruler of rulers! These are they who have been so inebriated with the wine of Thy manifold wisdom that they forsake their couches in their longing to celebrate Thy praise and extol Thy virtues, and flee from sleep in their eagerness to approach Thy presence and partake of Thy bounty. Their eyes have, at all times, been bent upon the Dayspring of Thy loving-kindness, and their faces set towards the Fountainhead of Thine inspiration. Rain down, then, upon us and upon them from the clouds of Thy mercy what beseemeth the heaven of Thy bounteousness and grace.
因为你的热心爱好者祢，根据你的法令，保留，在每个黎明，杯子你的怀念，你这是谁的艺术统治者的统治者！这是他们谁一直这么醉醺醺的与你的百般的智慧酒，他们放弃自己的沙发在他们的向往，庆祝你的赞美和歌颂你的美德，并睡在他们急于逃离接近你的存在和分享你的恩惠。他们的眼睛都，在任何时候，执意在你慈爱的启端，和他们脸上设置对祢的灵感源泉。从你的怜悯的云是什么beseemeth你的bounteousness和优雅的天堂雨下来，那么，在我们身上，并在他们身上。
Lauded be Thy name, O my God! This is the hour when Thou hast unlocked the doors of Thy bounty before the faces of Thy creatures, and opened wide the portals of Thy tender mercy unto all the dwellers of Thine earth. I beseech Thee, by all them whose blood was shed in Thy path, who, in their yearning over Thee, rid themselves from all attachment to any of Thy creatures, and who were so carried away by the sweet savors of Thine inspiration that every single member of their bodies intoned Thy praise and vibrated to Thy remembrance, not to withhold from us the things Thou hast irrevocably ordained in this Revelation—a Revelation the potency of which hath caused every tree to cry out what the Burning Bush had aforetime proclaimed unto Moses, Who conversed with Thee, a Revelation that hath enabled every least pebble to resound again with Thy praise, as the stones glorified Thee in the days of Muḥammad, Thy Friend.
赞美是你的名字，我的神啊！这是小时，当你使你的解锁赏金的门你的生物的面孔面前，睁大祢怜悯的门户起誓世上所有的居民。我恳求你，用一切被流血在你的路，谁，在他们向往过你，所有依恋摆脱自己，你的任何生物，谁是如此因你的灵感品味甜蜜冲昏头脑，每一个他们的身体成员吟诵你的赞美和振动，以你的回忆，而不是从我们隐瞒的事情你已经无可挽回地注定在这个启示，一个启示效力，其中怎样使每棵树哭什么燃烧布什吐唾沫宣布对摩西，谁与你交谈，是因耶和华使每一个至少鹅卵石与你的赞美再次​​响起，因为石头荣耀你，穆罕默德，你的朋友的天启示。
These are the ones, O my God, whom Thou hast graciously enabled to have fellowship with Thee and to commune with Him Who is the Revealer of Thyself. The winds of Thy will have scattered them abroad until Thou didst gather them together beneath Thy shadow, and didst cause them to enter into the precincts of Thy court. Now that Thou hast made them to abide under the shade of the canopy of Thy mercy, do Thou assist them to attain what must befit so august a station.
