Thou hast from eternity been powerful to do what Thou hast willed, and to ordain what Thou hast pleased.
往哪里去转，我的神啊，无能为力，因为我发现，除了祢你的选民之前设置的方式以外的任何方式？地球上所有的原子宣布你为神，作证说，再没有别的神，除了你。你从永恒是强大的做什么，祢任性，并注定将你所欣慰。
Do Thou destine for me, O my God, what will set me, at all times, towards Thee, and enable me to cleave continually to the cord of Thy grace, and to proclaim Thy name, and to look for whatsoever may flow down from Thy pen. I am poor and desolate, O my Lord, and Thou art the All-Possessing, the Most High. Have pity, then, upon me through the wonders of Thy mercy, and send down upon me, every moment of my life, the things wherewith Thou hast recreated the hearts of all Thy creatures who have recognized Thy unity, and of all Thy people who are wholly devoted to Thee.
难道你注定对我来说，我的神啊，什么都会让我，在任何时候，对你，并让我继续贴住恩典的线，并宣布你的名字，并寻找任何可能的流了下来你的笔。我可怜的荒凉，我的主啊，和你是全拥有，至高。可怜的话，在我通过你的怜悯的奇迹，向我发下来，我生命中的每一刻，这个事情使你所重新创建你所有的人你一切生灵谁认识你的团结心，和谁被全部投入到你。
Thou, verily, art the Almighty, the Most Exalted, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
你，众志成城，艺术全能，最尊贵，全知，全明智的。

Glorified art Thou, O my Lord! Thou beholdest my tribulations and all...

Glorified art Thou, O my Lord! Thou beholdest my tribulations and all that hath befallen me at the hands of such of Thy servants as keep company with me, who have disbelieved in Thy most resplendent signs, and turned back from Thy most effulgent Beauty. I swear by Thy glory! Such are the troubles that vex me, that no pen in the entire creation can either reckon or describe them.
荣耀的艺术你，我的主啊！你眼看着我的磨难和一切所遭遇我在等你的仆人的陪伴我，谁不信已在你的最辉煌的标志的手，转身从你的最灿烂的美背。我发誓，你的荣耀！这样是我烦恼的烦恼，在整个​​创造无笔可以算或描述它们。
I implore Thee, O Thou Who art the King of names and the Creator of earth and heaven, so to assist me by Thy strengthening grace that nothing whatsoever will have the power to hinder me from remembering Thee, or celebrating Thy praise, or to keep me back from observing what Thou hast prescribed unto me in Thy Tablets, that I may so arise to serve Thee that with bared head I will hasten forth from my habitation, cry out in Thy name amidst Thy creatures, and proclaim Thy virtues among Thy servants. Having accomplished what Thou hadst decreed, and delivered the thing Thou hadst written down, the wicked doers among Thy people would, then, compass me about and would do with me in Thy path as would please them.
我恳求你，呵，你是谁的艺术名的国王和天地的创造者，所以要通过你的帮助我加强恩典，没有任何必须从记住你，或者庆祝你的赞美妨碍我的力量，或保留我从后面观察，你作了什么规定对我在你的片，我可能会因此出现以服事你与露出的头，我会赶紧出来，从我的住处，哭出来奉你的名之中你的生物，并宣布你的美德，你的仆人之间。已经完成了哪些你未曾下旨，并发表你未曾写下来的东西，你的人与人之间的作孽会，那么，围困我的人，并会跟我做你的路径会取悦他们。
In the love I bear to Thee, O my Lord, my heart longeth for Thee with a longing such as no heart hath known. Here am I with my body between Thy hands, and my spirit before Thy face. Do with them as it may please Thee, for the exaltation of Thy word, and the revelation of what hath been enshrined within the treasuries of Thy knowledge.
在爱，我舍不得你，我的主啊，我为你心脏恋慕与向往，如没有心脏曾知道。我在这里跟我你的手之间的身体，我的你的面前的精神。与他们无关，因为它可能会请你，对你的话的提高，以及什么长处祢知识的宝库中被供奉的启示。
Potent art Thou to do what Thou willest, and able to ordain what Thou pleasest.
强大的艺术你做什么，你willest，并能够出家是什么你pleasest。

Lauded be Thy name, O my God! I can discover no one in Thy realm who...

Lauded be Thy name, O my God! I can discover no one in Thy realm who can befittingly turn unto Thee, or is able to adequately hearken unto what hath gone out of the mouth of Thy will. I beseech Thee, therefore, O Thou Who art the Possessor of the entire creation and the King of the realm of Thine invention, graciously to aid Thy creatures to accomplish that which is pleasing and acceptable unto Thee, that they may arise to serve Thy Cause amidst Thy creatures, and to speak forth Thy praise before all who are in heaven and on earth.
赞美是你的名字，我的神啊！我发现没有人在你的领域谁可以befittingly归向你，或者是能够充分对如此说出去了你的意志口中听。我恳求你，因此，你这是谁的艺术在整个创作的拥有和你发明的境界王，慷慨地帮助你的生物来实现这一目标是赏心悦目且对你可以接受的，他们可能出现的服务你的原因祢之中的生物，以及之前的所有谁在天上和地上讲出你的赞美。
Thou art He, O my Lord, Whose bounty hath surpassed all things, and Whose power hath transcended all things, and Whose mercy hath encompassed all things. Look, then, upon Thy people with the eyes of Thy tender mercies, and leave them not to themselves and to their corrupt desires in Thy days. How farsoever they may have strayed from Thee, and however grievously they have turned back from Thy face, yet Thou, in Thine essence, art the All-Bountiful, and, in Thine inmost spirit, art the Most Merciful. Deal with them according to the unrevealed tokens of Thy bounty and Thy gifts. Thou art, verily, the One to the power of Whose might all things have testified, and to Whose majesty and omnipotence the whole creation hath borne witness.
你是他，我的主啊，是谁的赏金祂所超越了所有的东西，谁能已经超越了所有的东西，谁的怜悯祂所涵盖所有的东西。你看，那么，在你的人与你的慈悲的眼睛，让他们不要把自己和祢天他们腐败的欲望。如何farsoever他们可能从你偏离，但是和他们悲伤地从你的脸上回头，然而你，在你的本质，艺术全丰年祭，并在你内心深处的精神，艺术的最仁慈的。根据你的恩惠，你的礼品未揭露令牌处理它们。祢，众志成城，一到谁可能所有事情都证明，以及谁的威严，无所不能，整个创造界已经见证的力量。
No God is there but Thee, the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting.
没有上帝是存在的，但你，是救苦救难，自我存续。

My God, Thou Whom I adore and worship, Who art Most Powerful! I...

My God, Thou Whom I adore and worship, Who art Most Powerful! I testify that no description by any created thing can ever reveal Thee, and no praise which any being is able to utter can express Thee. Neither the comprehension of any one in the whole world, nor the intelligence of any of its peoples, can, as it befitteth Thee, gain admittance into the court of Thy holiness, or unravel Thy mystery. What sin hath kept the inmates of the city of Thy names so far from Thine all-glorious Horizon, and deprived them of access to Thy most great Ocean? One single letter of Thy Book is the mother of all utterances, and a word therefrom the begetter of all creation. What ingratitude have Thy servants shown forth that Thou hast withheld them, one and all, from recognizing Thee? A drop out of the ocean of Thy mercy sufficeth to quench the flames of hell, and a spark of the fire of Thy love is enough to set ablaze a whole world.
哎呀，你谁我喜欢和崇拜，谁的艺术最强大的！我作证，任何创造出来的东西没有任何说明都不能露出你，也没有赞美任何存在能够说出能表达你。无论是任何一个在整个世界上，也没有任何其人民的智慧的理解，可以，因为它befitteth你，才能进你的神圣的法庭，或者解开你的谜。什么罪作保持全市你的名字的囚犯到目前为止，从祢全光荣地平线，剥夺获得他们祢的大洋？祢书一个单一的字母是所有话语的母亲，一个字都由其创造的begetter。表明什么忘恩负义仆人出来祢扣留他们，一个个都，从认识你？一滴出你的仁慈的海洋知足解渴地狱的火焰，和你的爱火的火花就足以纵火整个世界。
O Thou Who art the All-Knowing! Wayward though we be, we still cling to Thy bounty; and though ignorant, we still set our faces toward the ocean of Thy wisdom. Thou art that All-Bountiful Who art not deterred by a multitude of sins from vouchsafing Thy bounty, and the flow of Whose gifts is not arrested by the withdrawal of the peoples of the world. From eternity the door of Thy grace hath remained wide open. A dewdrop out of the ocean of Thy mercy is able to adorn all things with the ornament of sanctity, and a sprinkling of the waters of Thy bounty can cause the entire creation to attain unto true wealth.
呵，你是谁的艺术全知！任性虽然我们是，我们仍坚持你的奖金;虽然无知，我们还是设置我们的脸朝着你的智慧的海洋。你是说全丰年祭人艺不是由众多来自vouchsafing你的赏金罪，且其对礼物的流动逡巡不被世界各国人民的撤离逮捕。从永恒你的恩典之门祂所依然敞开。露珠出你的仁慈的海洋能来装饰所有的东西与神圣的装饰品，和你的赏金水域洒可能导致整个创作实现对真正的财富。
Lift not the veil, O Thou Who art the Concealer! From eternity the tokens of Thy bounty have encompassed the universe, and the splendors of Thy Most Great Name have been shed over all created things. Deny not Thy servants the wonders of Thy grace. Cause them to be made aware of Thee, that they may bear witness to Thy unity, and enable them to recognize Thee, that they may hasten towards Thee. Thy mercy hath embraced the whole creation, and Thy grace hath pervaded all things. From the billows of the ocean of Thy generosity the seas of eagerness and enthusiasm were revealed. Thou art what Thou art. Aught except Thee is unworthy of any mention unless it entereth beneath Thy shadow, and gaineth admittance into Thy court.
提起不面纱，呵，你是谁的艺术的遮瑕！从永恒你的赏金令牌都包含了宇宙，和你的最伟大的名字辉煌已经摆脱了所有创造物。不否认你的仆人你的恩典的奇迹。因为他们能够意识到祢，使他们见证你的团结，使他们认识你，他们会加速走向你。你的慈爱祂所拥抱整个创作，你的恩典祂所弥漫着万物。从你慷慨的海洋巨浪渴望和热情的海洋被揭露。祢是何许人。任何事物，除了祢是不配任何提及，除非所进下你的影子，而gaineth准入你的法庭。
Whatever betide us, we beseech Thine ancient forgiveness, and seek Thine all-pervasive grace. Our hope is that Thou wilt deny no one Thy grace, and wilt deprive no soul of the ornament of fairness and justice. Thou art the King of all bounty, and the Lord of all favors, and supreme over all who are in heaven and on earth.
无论发生于我们，我们恳求祢古宽恕，并寻求祢无孔不入的宽限期。我们的希望是，你若拒绝任何人你的恩惠，必剥夺没有灵魂的公平和正义的装饰品。你是所有赏金的国王，和所有主张的主，至尊在所有谁是天上地下。

Dispel my grief by Thy bounty and Thy generosity, O God, my God, and...

Dispel my grief by Thy bounty and Thy generosity, O God, my God, and banish mine anguish through Thy sovereignty and Thy might. Thou seest me, O my God, with my face set towards Thee at a time when sorrows have compassed me on every side. I implore Thee, O Thou Who art the Lord of all being, and overshadowest all things visible and invisible, by Thy Name whereby Thou hast subdued the hearts and the souls of men, and by the billows of the Ocean of Thy mercy and the splendors of the Daystar of Thy bounty, to number me with them whom nothing whatsoever hath deterred from setting their faces toward Thee, O Thou Lord of all names and Maker of the heavens!
消除我的忧伤了你的恩惠，你的慷慨，上帝啊，我的上帝，并通过你的主权，你的力量驱逐我的痛苦。你看见了我，哦，我的上帝，我的脸朝着设定祢的时候悲伤围着我在每边。我恳求祢，你这一切存在的主，overshadowest所有的东西有形和无形的，通过你的名字即祢制服的心和人的灵魂，和你的慈悲的海洋和辉煌的巨浪你的赏金的启明星，给我的编号与他们的人两手空空叫他从设定他们的脸向你却步，天上的所有名称和制造商的啊，你的主！
Thou beholdest, O my Lord, the things which have befallen me in Thy days. I entreat Thee, by Him Who is the Dayspring of Thy names and the Dawning-Place of Thine attributes, to ordain for me what will enable me to arise to serve Thee and to extol Thy virtues. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Powerful, Who art wont to answer the prayers of all men!
你眼看着，哦，我的上帝，这在你的日子已经降临了我的事情。我求求你，由他谁是你的名字的黎明号和你的属性的曙光地方，注定了我是什么使我出现的事奉你和你的赞美美德。你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最强大的，谁不会艺术来回答众人的祈祷！
And, finally, I beg of Thee by the light of Thy countenance to bless my affairs, and redeem my debts, and satisfy my needs. Thou art He to Whose power and to Whose dominion every tongue hath testified, and Whose majesty and Whose sovereignty every understanding heart hath acknowledged. No God is there but Thee, Who hearest and art ready to answer.
最后，我求求祢由你脸上的光来祝福我的事，和我赎回债务，并满足我的需求。你是他给他的权力和统治谁万口作见证，并谁的威严和谁主权每一个了解心脏祂所承认。没有上帝是存在的，但你，谁听见和艺术准备好回答。

Create in me a pure heart, O my God, and renew a tranquil conscience...

Create in me a pure heart, O my God, and renew a tranquil conscience within me, O my Hope! Through the spirit of power confirm Thou me in Thy Cause, O my Best-Beloved, and by the light of Thy glory reveal unto me Thy path, O Thou the Goal of my desire! Through the power of Thy transcendent might lift me up unto the heaven of Thy holiness, O Source of my being, and by the breezes of Thine eternity gladden me, O Thou Who art my God! Let Thine everlasting melodies breathe tranquility on me, O my Companion, and let the riches of Thine ancient countenance deliver me from all except Thee, O my Master, and let the tidings of the revelation of Thine incorruptible Essence bring me joy, O Thou Who art the most manifest of the manifest and the most hidden of the hidden!
在我创建一个纯净的心脏，哦，我的上帝，我里面重新安静的良心，我的希望！通过电力确认的精神你我在你的事业，我的最佳宠儿，并通过你的荣耀之光向我你的路，你这我的愿望的目标！用祢​​的超凡威力提升了我对你的圣洁的天堂，哦来源我的存在，并因你的永恒格拉登我的微风，你这是谁是我的神！让你永远的旋律呼吸平静对我，我的同伴，让祢古脸上的财富来自救我，除了你，哦，我的主人，让祢清廉本质的启示福音带给我的快乐，你这是谁艺术的最明显的体现和最隐蔽的隐藏的！

I give praise to Thee, O my God, that Thou hast awakened me out of my...

I give praise to Thee, O my God, that Thou hast awakened me out of my sleep, and brought me forth after my disappearance, and raised me up from my slumber. I have wakened this morning with my face set toward the splendors of the Daystar of Thy Revelation, through Which the heavens of Thy power and Thy majesty have been illumined, acknowledging Thy signs, believing in Thy Book, and holding fast unto Thy Cord.
我赞美你，我的神啊，你竟惊醒了我的睡眠，我消失后给我带来了出来，从我的沉睡中提出了我。我今天上午醒来我的脸朝着设置你的启示，通过它，你的权力和威严的天已经照亮的启明星的辉煌，承认你的迹象，相信你的书，和坚守对你的线。
I beseech Thee, by the potency of Thy will and the compelling power of Thy purpose, to make of what Thou didst reveal unto me in my sleep the surest foundation for the mansions of Thy love that are within the hearts of Thy loved ones, and the best instrument for the revelation of the tokens of Thy grace and Thy loving-kindness.
我恳求你，由你的意志的效​​力和你的目的引人注目的力量，使什么祢显露对我在我的睡眠对你的爱是你的心内的亲人的豪宅最可靠的基础，因为你的恩典和你的慈爱的令牌的启示的最佳工具。
Do Thou ordain for me through Thy most exalted Pen, O my Lord, the good of this world and of the next. I testify that within Thy grasp are held the reins of all things. Thou changest them as Thou pleasest. No God is there save Thee, the Strong, the Faithful.
难道你注定让我通过你的最崇高的笔，我的主啊，下一个这个世界的美好。我作证，你的内抓举行万物的生杀大权。你改变他们作为你pleasest。没有神的存在拯救你，强，忠实。
Thou art He Who changeth through His bidding abasement into glory, and weakness into strength, and powerlessness into might, and fear into calm, and doubt into certainty. No God is there but Thee, the Mighty, the Beneficent.
你是谁，他通过他的竞标屈辱到辉煌，而无力为力量，和无力感成威力changeth和恐惧到平静，并怀疑到肯定。没有上帝是存在的，但你，万能的，仁慈。
Thou disappointest no one who hath sought Thee, nor dost Thou keep back from Thee anyone who hath desired Thee. Ordain Thou for me what becometh the heaven of Thy generosity, and the ocean of Thy bounty. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Powerful.
你disappointest没有人谁曾来找你，也不是你还将继续从你后面的人谁曾羡慕你。注定你对我有什么为人慷慨祢的天，你的恩惠的海洋。你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最强大的。

My God, Whom I worship and adore! I bear witness unto Thy unity and...

My God, Whom I worship and adore! I bear witness unto Thy unity and Thy oneness, and acknowledge Thy gifts, both in the past and in the present. Thou art the All-Bountiful, the overflowing showers of Whose mercy have rained down upon high and low alike, and the splendors of Whose grace have been shed over both the obedient and the rebellious.
我的上帝，就是我所敬仰与崇拜！我见证祢团结你的统一性，并承认你的礼物，无论在过去和现在。你是全丰年祭中，谁的怜悯高与低都已经雨点般落下的阵雨四溢，和谁的恩典已经流下了两个听话，叛逆的辉煌。
O God of mercy, before Whose door the quintessence of mercy hath bowed down, and round the sanctuary of Whose Cause loving-kindness, in its inmost spirit, hath circled, we beseech Thee, entreating Thine ancient grace, and seeking Thy present favor, that Thou mayest have mercy upon all who are the manifestations of the world of being, and to deny them not the outpourings of Thy grace in Thy days.
神啊怜悯，谁家门前怜悯的精髓祂所叩拜，而圆谁的原因慈爱，在其内心深处的精神，祂所盘旋的避难所，我们恳求你，恳求祢古恩典，求祢目前青睐，使你可以怜悯所有谁是作为世界的表现，并否认他们在你的你的天宽限期的不是澎湃。
All are but poor and needy, and Thou, verily, art the All-Possessing, the All-Subduing, the All-Powerful.
一切都只不过是穷人和有需要的，而你，众志成城，艺术全拥有，全制胜，无所不能。

I have wakened in Thy shelter, O my God, and it becometh him that...

I have wakened in Thy shelter, O my God, and it becometh him that seeketh that shelter to abide within the Sanctuary of Thy protection and the Stronghold of Thy defense. Illumine my inner being, O my Lord, with the splendors of the Dayspring of Thy Revelation, even as Thou didst illumine my outer being with the morning light of Thy favor.
我醒来在你的住所，哦，我的上帝，行事为人他叩门，住房祢保护的保护区和要塞你的防御范围内遵守。照亮我的内心，我的主啊，带着你的启示的黎明号的辉煌，甚至祢照亮我的外表是用你的青睐的晨光。

O my God, the God of bounty and mercy! Thou art that King by Whose...

O my God, the God of bounty and mercy! Thou art that King by Whose commanding word the whole creation hath been called into being; and Thou art that All-Bountiful One the doings of Whose servants have never hindered Him from showing forth His grace, nor have they frustrated the revelations of His bounty.
我的神啊，奖金和仁慈的上帝！你是国王了谁的指挥字的整个创作hath被称为应运而生;和你的艺术，全丰年祭之一的公务员谁的所作所为从来没有妨碍他从显示出来他的恩典，也没有他们挫败他的恩惠的启示。
Suffer this servant, I beseech Thee, to attain unto that which is the cause of his salvation in every world of Thy worlds. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Powerful, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
受此仆人，我恳求你，实现问那是他的救赎在你的世界的每一个世界的原因。你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最强大的，全知，全明智的。

My God, the Object of my adoration, the Goal of my desire, the...

My God, the Object of my adoration, the Goal of my desire, the All-Bountiful, the Most Compassionate! All life is of Thee and all power lieth within the grasp of Thine omnipotence. Whosoever Thou exaltest is raised above the angels, and attaineth the station: “Verily, We uplifted him to a place on high!”; and whosoever Thou dost abase is made lower than dust, nay, less than nothing.
我的上帝，我崇拜的对象，我的欲望的目标，全丰年祭，最值得同情！所有的生命都在你的和你无所不能的掌握之内的所有电源卧。无论你是谁exaltest提高上述天使，attaineth站：“诚然，我们高举他的地方高”;凡你又降卑做得比灰尘更低，不仅如此，不到什么。
O Divine Providence! Though wicked, sinful, and intemperate, we still seek from Thee a “seat of truth,” and long to behold the countenance of the Omnipotent King. It is Thine to command, and all sovereignty belongeth to Thee, and the realm of might boweth before Thy behest. Everything Thou doest is pure justice, nay, the very essence of grace. One gleam from the splendors of Thy Name, the All-Merciful, sufficeth to banish and blot out every trace of sinfulness from the world, and a single breath from the breezes of the Day of Thy Revelation is enough to adorn all mankind with a fresh attire.
Ø天意！虽然邪恶，罪恶和过激，我们还是从你寻求一个“座位道理，”和长脱俗的全能王者尊容。这都是你的指挥，所有主权都属祢，和你的授意下才可能boweth的境界。你所做的一切是纯粹的正义，不仅如此，恩典的本质。从你的名字的辉煌之一一线，全仁慈，知足放逐和涂抹罪恶的每一丝来自世界各地，并从你的启示日的微风一次呼吸就足以装点全人类与新鲜装束。
Vouchsafe Thy strength, O Almighty One, unto Thy weak creatures, and quicken them who are as dead, that haply they may find Thee, and may be led unto the ocean of Thy guidance, and may remain steadfast in Thy Cause. Should the fragrance of Thy praise be shed abroad by any of the divers tongues of the world, out of the East or out of the West, it would, verily, be prized and greatly cherished. If such tongues, however, be deprived of that fragrance, they assuredly would be unworthy of any mention, be they words or thoughts.
赐予你的力量，哦全能的一个，直到你的弱小，加快他们谁是死，是偶然，他们可能会发现你，并可能对你的指导海洋主导，并可能在你的事业保持坚定。应该对你的赞美的香味被任何世界的潜水员舌头浇灌，开出东或西出的，它会，众志成城，被撬，大大珍惜。如果这样的舌头，但被剥夺的清香，他们无疑将是不值得任何提及，无论是文字或想法。
We beg of Thee, O Providence, to show Thy way unto all men, and to guide them aright. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Powerful, the All-Knowing, the All-Seeing.
我们求祢，普罗维登斯，展现你的方式告诉所有的人，并引导他们端正。你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最强大的，全知，全明的。

Praise be to Thee, O my God, inasmuch as Thou hast turned the faces...

Praise be to Thee, O my God, inasmuch as Thou hast turned the faces of Thy servants towards the right hand of the throne of Thy gifts, and hast caused them to be detached from all else besides Thee, that they may recognize Thy sovereignty and acknowledge Thy glory. I testify to the potency of Thy Cause, the pervasive influence of Thy decree, the immutability of Thy will, the endlessness of Thy purpose. All things lie prisoned within the grasp of Thy might, and the whole creation is destitute when brought face to face with the evidences of Thy wealth.
赞美是你，哦，我的上帝，因为你怎样变成仆人的面孔朝着你的礼物宝座的右手，竟使他们从一切祢之外超脱，他们可以识别你的主权，承认你的荣耀。我证明你的事业，你的法令广泛影响的效力，祢的不变性会，你的目的的无穷无尽。所有的事情你的谎言可能的掌握之中囚禁，而当把面对面与你的财富的证据的整个创作是一贫如洗。
Deal Thou, therefore, O my God, my Beloved, my supreme Desire, with Thy servants and with all that were created by Thee as would beseem Thy beauty and Thy greatness, and would be worthy of Thy generosity and gifts. Thou art, in truth, He Whose mercy hath encompassed all the worlds, and Whose grace hath embraced all that dwell on earth and in heaven. Who is there that hath cried after Thee, and whose prayer hath remained unanswered? Where is he to be found who hath reached forth towards Thee, and whom Thou hast failed to approach? Who is he that can claim to have fixed his gaze upon Thee, and toward whom the eye of Thy loving-kindness hath not been directed? I bear witness that Thou hadst turned toward Thy servants ere they had turned toward Thee, and hadst remembered them ere they had remembered Thee. All grace is Thine, O Thou in Whose hand is the kingdom of Divine gifts and the source of every irrevocable decree.
对付你，所以，我的神啊，我亲爱的，我最大的愿望，你的仆人，并与所有祢创建为将beseem你的美丽和你的伟大，是值得你的慷慨和礼品的。你的艺术，说实话，因为他的仁慈祂所涵盖所有的世界，和谁的恩典祂所拥抱地球上的天堂所有的住。谁在那里那hath后祢哭泣和祈祷的祂所仍然没有答案？他在哪里可以找到谁曾达到规定对你，和谁祢没有办法？他是谁，可以声称已经固定他的目光在你身上，而对谁你的慈爱的眼睛也没有被导演？我作证，你对你的仆人未曾造成转向ERE他们转向你，和未曾造成想起他们ERE他们想起你。所有的恩典是啊，你说你在谁的手是神的礼物国度，每一个不可撤销法令的来源。
Send down, therefore, O my God, upon all that seek Thee that which will entirely strip them of all that pertaineth not unto Thee, and will draw them nigh unto Thy Self. Assist them, by Thy grace, to love Thee and to conform unto that which shall please Thee. Grant, then, that they may go straight on in the path of Thy Cause, the path wherein have slipped the footsteps of the doubters among Thy people and the froward among Thy servants. Thou art, verily, the All-Powerful, the Almighty, the Most Great.
发下来，所以，我的神啊，在一切寻求你认为这将完全去除所有本属这不是对你，而且会吸引他们挨近你的自我他们。帮助他们，用你的恩典，爱你和符合你们说这将取悦你。格兰特的话，他们可能会在你的事业之路直去，路径，其中已经下滑民中的怀疑者和仆人之间乖谬的脚步。你的艺术，众志成城，全能的，万能的，最伟大的。

Lauded and glorified art Thou, O my God! I entreat Thee by the...

Lauded and glorified art Thou, O my God! I entreat Thee by the sighing of Thy lovers and by the tears shed by them that long to behold Thee, not to withhold from me Thy tender mercies in Thy Day, nor to deprive me of the melodies of the Dove that extolleth Thy oneness before the light that shineth from Thy face. I am the one who is in misery, O God! Behold me cleaving fast to Thy Name, the All-Possessing. I am the one who is sure to perish; behold me clinging to Thy Name, the Imperishable. I implore Thee, therefore, by Thy Self, the Exalted, the Most High, not to abandon me unto mine own self and unto the desires of a corrupt inclination. Hold Thou my hand with the hand of Thy power, and deliver me from the depths of my fancies and idle imaginings, and cleanse me of all that is abhorrent unto Thee.
赞美和荣耀的艺术你，哦，我的上帝！我求求祢由你的恋人的叹息，并通过他们流下眼泪这么长时间注视你，不​​要从我隐瞒你的中日你的慈悲，也剥夺了鸽子前的extolleth祢合一的旋律我光照耀在你的脸上。我是一个谁是在苦难中，上帝啊！看哪，我劈开快你的名字，全藏有。我是一个谁是一定要灭亡;谁知我抱住你的名字，不朽的。我恳求你，因此，用你的自我，上人，至高，不要抛弃我对我自己的自我和对腐败倾向的愿望。你握住我的手与你的权力之手，并从我的幻想和想象闲置深处救我���洁净我的一切是可恶的交给你。
Cause me, then, to turn wholly unto Thee, to put my whole trust in Thee, to seek Thee as my Refuge, and to flee unto Thy face. Thou art, verily, He Who, through the power of His might, doeth whatsoever He desireth, and commandeth, through the potency of His will, whatsoever He chooseth. None can withstand the operation of Thy decree; none can divert the course of Thine appointment. Thou art, in truth, the Almighty, the All-Glorious, the Most Bountiful.
因为我的话，把全告诉你，把我的你了信任，寻求你是我的避难所，并逃离对你的脸。你是，实实在在的，他是谁，通过他的威力的力量，行善任何他所愿，并吩咐，通过他的旨意效力，任何他chooseth。没有人能够承受你的法令的操作;没有人可以转移祢任命的过程。你的艺术，说实话，全能，全悠久，最尊严。

Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God! Thou seest how I have turned...

Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God! Thou seest how I have turned myself toward Thee, and set my face in the direction of Thy grace and Thy gifts. I implore Thee, by Thy name through which Thou didst enable all them that have recognized Thy unity to partake of the wine of Thy mercy, and all such as have drawn nigh unto Thee to quaff the living waters of Thy loving-kindness, to rid me entirely of all vain imaginings, and to incline me in the direction of Thy grace, O Thou Who art the Lord of all men!
赞美是你的名字，主啊，我的上帝！你看见我怎么变成我自己向你，并把我的脸在你的恩典和你的礼物的方向。我恳求你，用你的名字，通过它祢使所有他们已经认识到你的单位来分享你的怜悯的葡萄酒，所有如已制定亲近要对你畅饮祢慈爱的活水，以摆脱我完全所有虚妄的幻想，而倾斜我你的恩典，你这方向是谁的艺术众人的主！
Graciously assist me, O my God, in the days of the Manifestation of Thy Cause and of the Dayspring of Thy Revelation, to tear asunder the veils which have hindered me from recognizing Thee, and from immersing myself beneath the ocean of Thy knowledge. Hold Thou me with the hands of Thy power, and grant that I may be so carried away by the sweet melodies of the Dove of Thy oneness, that I will cease to regard in all creation any face except Thy face, O Thou the Goal of my desire, and will recognize in the visible world naught else save the evidences of Thy might, O Thou Who art the God of mercy!
慷慨地帮助我，我的神啊，你在事业和你的启示启端的表现的天，再把他们拆散这阻碍了我从认识你，和自己浸泡祢知识的海洋之下的面纱。你抱我，你的权力之手，并授予我可能会因此受到你的合一的鸽子的甜蜜旋律冲昏头脑，我将停止在所有创作方面，除了你的脸，你这的目标任何脸型我的愿望，并将在可见的世界认识到化为乌有别人救你的可能的证据，你这是谁的艺术仁慈的上帝！
I am but a wretched creature, O my Lord, and Thou art the All-Possessing, the Most High; and I am all weakness, and Thou art the Almighty, and the Supreme Ordainer in both the beginning and the end. Withhold not from me the fragrances of Thy Revelation, and shatter not my hopes in the outpourings which have been sent down out of the heaven of Thy gifts. Ordain Thou for me, O my God, the good of this world and the world to come, and grant me what will profit me in every world of Thy worlds, for I know not what will help or harm me. Thou, in truth, art the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
我只是一个可怜的人，我的主啊，和你是全拥有，至高;而我所有的弱点，和你是全能的，至高无上的命定中的开始和结束。从我扣压不祢启示的香水，而不是粉碎我的希望寄托在已经下达出你的礼物天堂的澎湃。注定你对我来说，我的神啊，这世界和世界来的好，并授予我什么将受益我在你的世界的每一个世界，因为我不知道怎样才能帮助或伤害我。你，说实话，艺术全知，全明智的。
Have mercy, then, O my God, upon Thy servants who are drowned in the midst of the ocean of evil suggestions, and deliver them by the power of Thy sovereignty, O Thou Who art the Lord of all names and attributes! Thou art He Who from everlasting hath ordained what hath pleased Thee, and will unto everlasting abide the same. No God is there but Thee, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
怜悯，那么，我的神啊，在仆人谁是淹没在邪恶的建议的海洋之中，并通过你的主权权力拯救他们，哦你这所有的名字和属性的主！你是谁，他从亘古命谕是什么意思，给你，必归永恒遵守相同的。没有上帝是存在的，但祢，永远地赦的，最仁慈。

O God, my God! I have set out from my home, holding fast unto the...

O God, my God! I have set out from my home, holding fast unto the cord of Thy love, and I have committed myself wholly to Thy care and Thy protection. I entreat Thee by Thy power through which Thou didst protect Thy loved ones from the wayward and the perverse, and from every contumacious oppressor, and every wicked doer who hath strayed far from Thee, to keep me safe by Thy bounty and Thy grace. Enable me, then, to return to my home by Thy power and Thy might. Thou art, truly, the Almighty, the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting.
上帝啊，我的上帝！我订了离我家，坚守对祢爱的线，我已经承诺自己完全给你的关怀和你的保护。我央求你用你的力量，通过它祢保护你的爱从任性与乖张的人，并从每一个contumacious压迫者，每一个邪恶的实干家谁曾远离祢误入，让我用你的恩惠，你的恩典安全。使我的话，回我家了你的能力和你的威力。你的艺术，真正的全能，是救苦救难，自我存续。

From the sweet-scented streams of Thine eternity give me to drink, O...

From the sweet-scented streams of Thine eternity give me to drink, O my God, and of the fruits of the tree of Thy being enable me to taste, O my Hope! From the crystal springs of Thy love suffer me to quaff, O my Glory, and beneath the shadow of Thine everlasting providence let me abide, O my Light! Within the meadows of Thy nearness, before Thy presence, make me able to roam, O my Beloved, and at the right hand of the throne of Thy mercy, seat me, O my Desire! From the fragrant breezes of Thy joy let a breath pass over me, O my Goal, and into the heights of the paradise of Thy reality let me gain admission, O my Adored One! To the melodies of the dove of Thy oneness suffer me to hearken, O Resplendent One, and through the spirit of Thy power and Thy might quicken me, O my Provider! In the spirit of Thy love keep me steadfast, O my Succorer, and in the path of Thy good pleasure set firm my steps, O my Maker! Within the garden of Thine immortality, before Thy countenance, let me abide for ever, O Thou Who art merciful unto me, and upon the seat of Thy glory stablish me, O Thou Who art my Possessor! To the heaven of Thy loving-kindness lift me up, O my Quickener, and unto the Daystar of Thy guidance lead me, O Thou my Attractor! Before the revelations of Thine invisible spirit summon me to be present, O Thou Who art my Origin and my Highest Wish, and unto the essence of the fragrance of Thy beauty, which Thou wilt manifest, cause me to return, O Thou Who art my God!
从祢永恒的桂花流给我喝啊，我的上帝，祢是让我的树的果实，品尝，我的希望！从你的爱情的结晶弹簧挨我一饮而尽，我的荣耀，和你永远眷顾的阴影之下让我遵守，我的光！在你的亲近的草地，你的面前，让我能够漫游，我的亲爱的，和你的慈悲宝座的右边，我坐，我的愿望！从你的喜悦香的微风让人一口气通了我，哦，我的目标，到你的现实天堂的高度让我获得录取，哦，我只崇拜一个！为了你的鸽的旋律合一容许我听，哦金碧辉煌一，并通过你的权力和你的精神可能会加快我，哦，我的供应商！在你的爱的精神，让我坚定，我的Succorer，并在你的美意公司集路径我的脚步，我的壶！在祢不朽的花园，你的面容前，让我恪守永远，你这是谁的艺术怜悯我，向祢荣耀的座位stablish我，你这是谁是我养着！祢的天堂慈爱解除了我，哦，我的Quickener，对你的指导的启明星，引导我，呵，你我的吸引！前祢无形的精神启示召唤我在场，你这是谁是我���原点，我的最高愿望，对了你的美的清香，这你愿意表现，使我回的本质，你这是谁是我的上帝！
Potent art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee. Thou art, verily, the Most Exalted, the All-Glorious, the All-Highest.
强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。你的艺术，众志成城，最尊贵，全光荣，全最高。

O Thou Whose face is the object of my adoration, Whose beauty is my...

O Thou Whose face is the object of my adoration, Whose beauty is my sanctuary, Whose habitation is my goal, Whose praise is my hope, Whose providence is my companion, Whose love is the cause of my being, Whose mention is my solace, Whose nearness is my desire, Whose presence is my dearest wish and highest aspiration, I entreat Thee not to withhold from me the things Thou didst ordain for the chosen ones among Thy servants. Supply me, then, with the good of this world and of the next.
呵，你的脸是我崇拜的对象，其美是我的避难所，谁的居住地是我的目标，谁的赞美是我的希望，谁的普罗维登斯是我的伴侣，他们的爱是我生命的事业，谁提的是我的安慰，谁亲近是我的愿望，它的存在是我最亲爱的愿望和最高愿望，我求求祢不要从我隐瞒的事情祢注定了你的仆人之间的选择的。供应我，那么，与下一这个世界的好。
Thou, truly, art the King of all men. There is no God but Thee, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Generous.
你，真正的，艺术的所有的人的国王。有没有上帝，但祢，永远地赦，最慷慨的。

O my God! This is Thy servant and the son of Thy servant who hath...

O my God! This is Thy servant and the son of Thy servant who hath believed in Thee and in Thy signs, and set his face towards Thee, wholly detached from all except Thee. Thou art, verily, of those who show mercy the most merciful.
哦，我的上帝！这是你的仆人，仆人谁曾相信你和你的中标牌，并设置自己的脸对你，一切全分离，除了祢的儿子。你是那些谁手下留情最仁慈的，实实在在。
Deal with him, O Thou Who forgivest the sins of men and concealest their faults, as beseemeth the heaven of Thy bounty and the ocean of Thy grace. Grant him admission within the precincts of Thy transcendent mercy that was before the foundation of earth and heaven. There is no God but Thee, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Generous.
对付他，你这是谁forgivest人的罪，concealest他们的缺点，因为beseemeth你的赏金的天堂，你的恩典的海洋。授予他的你的超然仁慈的选区，这是天地的根基之日前入院。有没有上帝，但祢，永远地赦，最慷慨的。
Let him, then, repeat six times the greeting “Alláh-u-Abhá,” and then repeat nineteen times each of the following verses:
让他，然后，重复六次问候“阿拉-U-艾卜哈”，然后重复19次，每次下列诗句：
We all, verily, worship God.
We all, verily, bow down before God.
We all, verily, are devoted unto God.
We all, verily, give praise unto God.
We all, verily, yield thanks unto God.
We all, verily, are patient in God.
我们所有的，实实在在的，敬拜上帝。
我们所有的，实实在在的，在上帝面前跪拜。
我们所有的，实实在在的，是专门献给神。
我们所有的，实实在在的，给予赞美神。
我们所有的，实实在在的，收益率对神的感谢。
我们所有的，实实在在的，有耐心的上帝。
(If the dead be a woman, let him say: This is Thy handmaiden and the daughter of Thy handmaiden, etc.…)
（如果死者是一名女子，让他说：这是你的侍女和你的使女的女儿，等...）
Prayer for the Dead.
为死者祈祷。

O my Lord! Make Thy beauty to be my food, and Thy presence my drink,...

O my Lord! Make Thy beauty to be my food, and Thy presence my drink, and Thy pleasure my hope, and praise of Thee my action, and remembrance of Thee my companion, and the power of Thy sovereignty my succorer, and Thy habitation my home, and my dwelling-place the seat Thou hast sanctified from the limitations imposed upon them who are shut out as by a veil from Thee.
我的主啊！让你的美丽是我的食物，你的存在我喝多了，你的快乐我希望，与你的赞美我的行为，以及祢我的同伴回忆，你的主权，我succorer的力量，你的居住我家，我的居所所在地你从谁被拒之门外由从你的面纱给他们施加的限制圣洁。
Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the All-Glorious, the Most Powerful.
你的艺术，众志成城，全能，全光荣，最强大的。

Glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! Abase not him whom Thou hast exalted...

Glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! Abase not him whom Thou hast exalted through the power of Thine everlasting sovereignty, and remove not far from Thee him whom Thou hast caused to enter the tabernacle of Thine eternity. Wilt Thou cast away, O my God, him whom Thou hast overshadowed with Thy Lordship, and wilt Thou turn away from Thee, O my Desire, him to whom Thou hast been a refuge? Canst Thou degrade him whom Thou hast uplifted, or forget him whom Thou didst enable to remember Thee?
荣耀归于你，主啊，我的上帝！ ABASE他不认识你，通过你永远的主权权力竟高举，并删除从你他不远处就是你所造成的进入祢永恒的帐幕。祢抛弃，哦，我的上帝，他就是你所掩盖与你的贵族身份，而你愿意就离开你，我的欲望，他就是你所得到的避难所？你能用降低他就是你所抬升，或忘了他的人，你实在让记住你？
Glorified, immensely glorified art Thou! Thou art He Who from everlasting hath been the King of the entire creation and its Prime Mover, and Thou wilt to everlasting remain the Lord of all created things and their Ordainer. Glorified art Thou, O my God! If Thou ceasest to be merciful unto Thy servants, who, then, will show mercy unto them; and if Thou refusest to succor Thy loved ones, who is there that can succor them?
荣耀，荣耀无比的艺术你！你是谁，他从亘古向来整个创作的国王及其原动机，以及你愿意到永远保持对所有创造物的主，他们的命定。荣耀的艺术你，哦，我的上帝！如果你ceasest是怜悯你的仆人，谁的话，会显示怜悯他们。如果你要不愿接受救助你的亲人，谁在那里，可以搭救？
Glorified, immeasurably glorified art Thou! Thou art adored in Thy truth, and Thee do we all, verily, worship; and Thou art manifest in Thy justice, and to Thee do we all, verily, bear witness. Thou art, in truth, beloved in Thy grace. No God is there but Thee, the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting.
荣耀，荣耀没法比祢！你被崇拜在你的真理，与你做的我们都，众志成城，崇拜;和你的艺术表现在你的正义，就你这样做我们都，众志成城，见证。你是，说实话，心爱你的恩典。没有上帝是存在的，但你，是救苦救难，自我存续。

Thy name is my healing, O my God, and remembrance of Thee is my...

Thy name is my healing, O my God, and remembrance of Thee is my remedy. Nearness to Thee is my hope, and love for Thee is my companion. Thy mercy to me is my healing and my succor in both this world and the world to come. Thou, verily, art the All-Bountiful, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
你的名字是我疗伤，我的神啊，与你的记忆是我的补救措施。亲近祢是我的希望，为你的爱是我的伴侣。你的慈爱对我来说是我的愈合和我在这两个世界和世界来救援。你，众志成城，艺术全丰年祭，全知，全明智的。

O my God, my Master, the Goal of my desire! This, Thy servant,...

O my God, my Master, the Goal of my desire! This, Thy servant, seeketh to sleep in the shelter of Thy mercy, and to repose beneath the canopy of Thy grace, imploring Thy care and Thy protection.
哦，我的上帝，我的主人，我的愿望的目标！这仆人，叩门睡你的慈爱的庇护，并寄托你的恩典的树冠下，恳求你的照顾和你的保护。
I beg of Thee, O my Lord, by Thine eye that sleepeth not, to guard mine eyes from beholding aught beside Thee. Strengthen, then, their vision that they may discern Thy signs, and behold the Horizon of Thy Revelation. Thou art He before the revelations of Whose omnipotence the quintessence of power hath trembled.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，因你的眼睛是沉睡不行，看守我的眼睛不看任何事物祢旁边。加强的话，他们的视野，他们可能会辨别你的迹象，看你的启示的地平线。你是他的谁的全能力量的精髓祂所颤抖的启示之前。
No God is there but Thee, the Almighty, the All-Subduing, the Unconditioned.
没有上帝是存在的，但你，全能，全制胜，无条件的。

How can I choose to sleep, O God, my God, when the eyes of them that...

How can I choose to sleep, O God, my God, when the eyes of them that long for Thee are wakeful because of their separation from Thee; and how can I lie down to rest whilst the souls of Thy lovers are sore vexed in their remoteness from Thy presence?
如何选择睡觉，上帝啊，我的上帝，当他们的眼睛长时间为你的，因为从你自己的分离清醒;我怎么能躺下来休息，而你的恋人的灵魂从你面前地处偏远疼烦？
I have committed, O my Lord, my spirit and my entire being into the right hand of Thy might and Thy protection, and I lay my head on my pillow through Thy power, and lift it up according to Thy will and Thy good pleasure. Thou art, in truth, the Preserver, the Keeper, the Almighty, the Most Powerful.
我犯了，我的主啊，我的精神，我的整个状态进入你的右手可能和你的保护，我把我的头放在我的枕头通过你的权力，并根据你的意志，你的美意抬不起来。你的艺术，说实话，保护者，守护者，全能，最强大的。
By Thy might! I ask not, whether sleeping or waking, but that which Thou dost desire. I am Thy servant and in Thy hands. Do Thou graciously aid me to do what will shed forth the fragrance of Thy good pleasure. This, truly, is my hope and the hope of them that enjoy near access to Thee. Praised be Thou, O Lord of the worlds!
凭你的实力！我不问，不管是睡觉还是醒着，但是这你又渴望。我是你的仆人，在你的手中。难道你殷勤地帮我做什么都会流下提出了你的美意的清香。这确实是我的希望，他们的希望，享受近访问你。赞扬了世界的是你，主啊！

My God, my Adored One, my King, my Desire! What tongue can voice my...

My God, my Adored One, my King, my Desire! What tongue can voice my thanks to Thee? I was heedless, Thou didst awaken me. I had turned back from Thee, Thou didst graciously aid me to turn towards Thee. I was as one dead, Thou didst quicken me with the water of life. I was withered, Thou didst revive me with the heavenly stream of Thine utterance which hath flowed forth from the Pen of the All-Merciful.
我的上帝，我的崇拜者，我的王，我的愿望！什么舌头可以表达我的感谢你？我不顾，祢唤醒了我。我转身从你回来了，你倒慷慨地帮我把对你。我是为一人死亡，祢加快我与生命之水。我枯萎了，祢复活我同你话语的天上流，其从至高的全仁慈的笔流入等等。
O Divine Providence! All existence is begotten by Thy bounty; deprive it not of the waters of Thy generosity, neither do Thou withhold it from the ocean of Thy mercy. I beseech Thee to aid and assist me at all times and under all conditions, and seek from the heaven of Thy grace Thine ancient favor. Thou art, in truth, the Lord of bounty, and the Sovereign of the kingdom of eternity.
Ø天意！所有的存在是独生子用你的奖金;剥夺它不是你的慷慨的水域，你也不要从你的怜悯之洋隐瞒吧。我恳求你帮助，并帮助我在任何时候，任何条件下，并从你的亘古不息之恩宠的天堂求。你的艺术，说实话，赏金的主，和永恒的国度的主权。

O God, my God! I beg of Thee by the ocean of Thy healing, and by the...

O God, my God! I beg of Thee by the ocean of Thy healing, and by the splendors of the Daystar of Thy grace, and by Thy Name through which Thou didst subdue Thy servants, and by the pervasive power of Thy most exalted Word and the potency of Thy most august Pen, and by Thy mercy that hath preceded the creation of all who are in heaven and on earth, to purge me with the waters of Thy bounty from every affliction and disorder, and from all weakness and feebleness.
上帝啊，我的上帝！我求求祢由你的愈合的海洋，用你的恩典的启明星，并通过你的名字，通过它祢的辉煌征服你的仆人，凭你的力量无孔不入最崇高的Word和你的大部分效力八月笔，并通过你的怜悯是因耶和华之前创建的所有谁是天上地下的，清洗我，你的赏金从每一个苦难和混乱的海域，并从所有的弱点和软弱。
Thou seest, O my Lord, Thy suppliant waiting at the door of Thy bounty, and him who hath set his hopes on Thee clinging to the cord of Thy generosity. Deny him not, I beseech Thee, the things he seeketh from the ocean of Thy grace and the Daystar of Thy loving-kindness.
ああ，我的主啊，你的恳求守候在你的赏金的门，他谁曾在祢抱住你的慷慨的线设置了他的希望。否认他不要，我恳求你，他从你的恩典的海洋，你的慈爱的启明星自取的事。
Powerful art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee. There is none other God save Thee, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Generous.
强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。有没有其他的神拯救你，永远地赦，最慷慨的。

I have risen this morning by Thy grace, O my God, and left my home...

I have risen this morning by Thy grace, O my God, and left my home trusting wholly in Thee, and committing myself to Thy care. Send down, then, upon me, out of the heaven of Thy mercy, a blessing from Thy side, and enable me to return home in safety even as Thou didst enable me to set out under Thy protection with my thoughts fixed steadfastly upon Thee.
我今天早上已经上升了你的恩惠，我的神啊，并留下我的家全资信赖的你，并承诺自己要你的照顾。发下来，然后，在我身上，从你的怜悯，从你的一边祝福的天堂，使我安全返回家园，甚至像从前让我所载你的保护，我的想法坚定不移地在你身上固定。
There is none other God but Thee, the One, the Incomparable, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
有没有其他的上帝，但你，在一，无与伦比，全知，全明智的。

Praise be unto Thee, Who art my God and the God of all men, and my...

Praise be unto Thee, Who art my God and the God of all men, and my Desire and the Desire of all them that have recognized Thee, and my Beloved and the Beloved of such as have acknowledged Thy unity, and the Object of my adoration and of the adoration of them that have near access to Thee, and my Wish and the Wish of such as are wholly devoted to Thee, and my Hope and the Hope of them that have fixed their hearts upon Thee, and my Refuge and the Refuge of all such as have hastened towards Thee, and my Haven and the Haven of whosoever hath repaired unto Thee, and my Goal and the Goal of all them that have set themselves towards Thee, and my Object and the Object of those who have fixed their gaze upon Thee, and my Paradise and the Paradise of them that have ascended towards Thee, and my Lodestar and the Lodestar of all such as yearn after Thee, and my Joy and the Joy of all them that love Thee, and my Light and the Light of all such as have erred and asked to be forgiven by Thee, and my Exultation and the Exultation of all them that remember Thee, and my Stronghold and the Stronghold of all such as have fled to Thee, and my Sanctuary and the Sanctuary of all that dread Thee, and my Lord and the Lord of all such as dwell in the heavens and on the earth!
赞美是告诉你，谁是我的上帝和众人的神，我的欲望和所有的愿望已经认识你，和我心爱的宠儿，如承认你的团结，我崇拜的对象和他们的崇拜有近访问你，和我的愿望和如都完全致力于向你的愿望，我希望和他们的希望在你身上已经固定了的心，我的避难所，避难所一切如都很快地向你，和我的避风港和凡有的修理你面前避风港，我的目标和所有的目标已经为自己对你，我的目标和那些谁有固定对象的凝视着在你身上，我的天堂和他们的天堂已经跻身对你，我的指导思想与所有这些的北极星作为���祢渴望，我的喜悦和所有的人，爱你的喜悦，我的光与光所有的，如出现了偏差，并要求由祢被原谅，我的狂喜以及所有他们记念你的狂喜，我的要塞和所有如水中花逃到你，我的避难所和庇护所所有的恐惧你，我的主，所有这些主为住在天堂和地球上！
Unto Thee be praise for that Thou hast enraptured me by the sweetness of Thine utterances, and set me towards the horizon above which the splendors of the Daystar of Thy face have shone, and caused me to turn unto Thee at a time when most of Thy creatures had broken off from Thee.
照样向你赞美祢眉飞色舞我因你的话语的甜头，把我往地平线以上就是你脸上的启明星的辉煌已经照，并引起了我的归向祢的时候最祢动物已经从祢折断。
Thou art He, O my God, Who hath unlocked the gate of heaven with the key of Thy Name, the Ever-Blessed, the All-Powerful, the All-Glorious, the Most Great, and hast summoned all mankind to the ocean of Thy presence. No sooner had Thy most sweet voice been raised, than all the inmates of the Kingdom of Names and the Concourse on high were stirred up. By Thy call the fragrance of the raiment of Thy Revelation was wafted over such of Thy creatures as have loved Thee, and such of Thy people as have yearned towards Thee. They rose up and rushed forth to attain the Ocean of Thy meeting, and the Horizon of Thy beauty, and the Tabernacle of Thy Revelation and Thy majesty, and the Sanctuary of Thy Presence and Thy glory. They were so inebriated with the wine of their reunion with Thee, that they rid themselves of all attachment to whatever they themselves and others possessed.
你是他，哦，我的上帝，他已经解锁天的门用你的名字，永远地，祝福，全能，全光荣，最伟大的关键，竟召集所有人类的海洋你的存在。不早了你的最甜美的声音提高了，不是名称的王国和广场高的所有囚犯被激起了。通过你的调用你的启示的衣服上的香味飘荡了对此类祢生物作为已经爱你了，这样的你的人是有渴望走向你。他们站起身，冲上前去，达到你的会议的海洋，而你的美丽的地平线，和你的启示和威严的帐幕，和你的存在和你的荣耀的圣殿。他们是如此陶醉的与他们团聚跟你的酒，使他们摆脱所有附件的自己，不管他们自己和他人占有。
These are Thy servants whom the ascendancy of the oppressor hath failed to deter from fixing their eyes on the Tabernacle of Thy majesty, and whom the hosts of tyranny have been powerless to affright and divert their gaze from the Dayspring of Thy signs and the Dawning-Place of Thy testimonies.
这是你的仆人为之压迫者的优势祂所从失败修复他们的眼睛对你威严的帐幕威慑和人暴政的主机已经无力受到惊吓，并从你的迹象启端和Dawning-转移他们的视线地方你的法度。
I swear by Thy glory, O Thou the Lord of all being and the Enlightener of all things visible and invisible! Whoso hath quaffed from the hands of Thy bounteousness the living waters of Thy love will never allow the things pertaining to Thy creatures to keep him back from Thee, neither will he be dismayed at the refusal of all the dwellers of Thy realm to acknowledge Thee. Before all who are in heaven and on earth such a man will cry aloud, and announce unto the people the tumult of the Ocean of Thy bounty and the splendors of the Luminaries of the heaven of Thy bestowals.
我发誓，你的荣耀，你这一切存在的主，万物有形和无形的启蒙！但凡叫他从你的bounteousness祢爱生活水域的手一饮而尽，绝不允许属于你的动物的事情，让他回来的你，不将他在你的境界，所有的居民拒绝惊惶承认你。之前的所有谁在天堂和地球上这样的男人也会哭出声，并宣布对百姓你的恩惠的海洋和祢恩赐的天堂灯具的辉煌的纷扰。
Happy indeed is the man that hath turned towards the sanctuary of Thy presence, and rid himself of all attachment to any one except Thyself. He is truly exalted who hath confessed Thy glory, and fixed his eyes upon the Daystar of Thy loving-kindness. He is endued with understanding who is aware of Thy Revelation and hath acknowledged Thy manifold tokens, Thy signs, and Thy testimonies. He is a man of insight whose eyes have been illumined with the brightness of Thy face, and who, as soon as Thy call was raised, hath recognized Thee. He is a man of hearing who hath been led to hearken unto Thy speech, and to draw nigh unto the billowing ocean of Thine utterances.
快乐确实是祂所转向祢存在的避难所，并摆脱自己的所有附件，除了你自己任何一个人。他是真正的崇高谁作交代你的荣耀，并在你慈爱的启明星固定他的眼睛。他被赋予了了解谁是你的认识启示并且将这和承认你的多方面的令牌，你的迹象，你的法度。他的见解，其目光已经照亮了与你的脸的亮度，和谁，只要你的电话是提出了一个人，便叫认可你。他是听证谁作过导致听你讲话，以亲近起誓话语的滚滚大海的男人。
Behold Thou this stranger, O my Lord, who hath hastened to attain his most exalted Home in the shelter of Thy shadowing mercy, and this ailing soul who hath set his face towards the ocean of Thy healing.
看哪，你这个陌生人，我的主啊，谁曾赶紧获得自己最崇高的家在你的阴影怜悯的住房，而这个生病的灵魂，谁曾将他的脸转向你的愈合的海洋。
Look, then, O Thou my God Who settest my soul on fire, upon the tears I shed, and the sighs I utter, and the anguish that afflicteth my heart and the fire that consumeth my being. Thy glory beareth me witness, O Thou, the Light of the world! The fire of Thy love that burneth continually within me hath so inflamed me that whoever among Thy creatures approacheth me, and inclineth his inner ear towards me, cannot fail to hear its raging within each of my veins.
你看，那么，呵，我的上帝是谁settest我的灵魂就火了，在我流下眼泪，而我感叹说出，那afflicteth我的心脏的痛苦和consumeth我存在的火灾。你的荣耀，也是为我见证，呵，世界的光！对你的爱明灯不断在我因为火烧使发炎我，你的谁在芸芸众生中approacheth我，inclineth他对我的内耳，不能不听到它在我的每一个静脉肆虐。
I am so carried away by the sweetness of Thine utterances, and so inebriated with the wine of Thy tender mercies, that my voice can never be stilled, nor can my suppliant hands any longer desist from being stretched out towards Thee. Thou seest, O my Lord, how mine eyes are fixed in the direction of Thy grace, and mine ears inclined towards the kingdom of Thine utterance, and my tongue unloosed to celebrate Thy praise, and my face set towards Thy face that surviveth all that hath been created by Thy word, and my hands raised up towards the heaven of Thy bounty and favor.
我这么冲昏头脑祢话语的甜头，因此醉醺醺用你的慈悲了酒，说我的声音也从未停息，也不能我恳求的手不再被伸出朝祢停止。ああ，我的主啊，眼睛怎么我的固定在你的恩典，并倾向于祢话语的王国我的耳朵的方向，我的舌头unloosed庆祝你的赞美，我的脸朝着设置你的脸surviveth所有祂所已经创建了你的话，我的手举起你的走向富饶和青睐的天堂。
Wilt Thou keep back from Thee the stranger whom Thou didst call unto his most exalted Home beneath the shadow of the wings of Thy mercy, or cast away the wretched creature that hath hastened to attain the shores of the ocean of Thy wealth? Wilt Thou shut up the door of Thy grace to the face of Thy creatures after having opened it through the power of Thy might and of Thy sovereignty, or close the eyes of Thy people when Thou hast already commanded them to turn unto the Dayspring of Thy Beauty and the Dawning-Place of the splendors of Thy countenance?
祢保持回来从你的陌生人谁祢求告他最崇高的主页你的怜悯之翼的阴影之下，或抛弃是因耶和华赶紧实现你的财富的海洋沿岸的可怜的人？祢闭嘴你的恩典，你的生灵面前的门已经通过你的祢的主权和可能，或关闭你的人的眼睛，当你已经已经吩咐他们把祢的启端的电源打开后美女和你脸上的辉煌的曙光广场？
Nay, and to this Thy glory beareth me witness! Such is not my thought of Thee, nor the thought of those of Thy servants that have near access to Thyself, nor that of the sincere amongst Thy people.
不仅如此，并为此你的​​荣耀，也是为我见证！这样是不是我的思想祢的，也不是那些仆人有近访问你自己的思想，也不是真诚当中你的人。
Thou knowest, and seest, and hearest, O my Lord, that before every tree I am moved to lift up my voice to Thee, and before every stone I am impelled to sigh and lament. Hath it been Thy purpose in creating me, O my God, to touch me with tribulation, or to enable me to manifest Thy Cause in the kingdom of Thy creation?
你知道，和所看见的，和听信，我的主啊，每棵树前我搬到了我的声音抬起来见你，而且每一块石头之前，我是被迫叹息，感慨。岂有它是你的目的，创造了我，哦，我的上帝，以磨难碰我，或者让我去体现你的原因在你的创作的王国？
Thou hearest, O my God, my sighs and my groaning, and beholdest my powerlessness, and my poverty, and my misery, and my woes, and my wretchedness. I swear by Thy might! I have wept with such a weeping that I have been unable to make mention of Thee, or to extol Thee, and cried with such a bitter cry that every mother in her bereavement was bewildered at me, and forgot her own anguish and the sighs she had uttered.
你听见，我的神啊，我叹息我的叹息，并眼看着我无能为力，我的贫穷，我的痛苦，我的悲哀，我的可怜。我发誓，你的实力！我哭了与我已经无法补提祢的，或歌颂祢这样的哭泣，哭着这样的痛哭，在她的丧亲之痛每一个母亲却一脸茫然看着我，忘了自己的痛苦和她的感叹曾经闹过。
I implore Thee, O my Lord, by Thine Ark, through which the potency of Thy will was manifested and the energizing influences of Thy purpose were revealed, and which saileth on both land and sea through the power of Thy might, not to seize me in my mighty sins and great trespasses. I swear by Thy glory! The waters of Thy forgiveness and Thy mercy have emboldened me, as hath Thy dealing, in bygone ages, with the sincere among Thy chosen ones, and with such of Thy Messengers as have proclaimed Thy oneness.
我恳求你，我的主啊，因你的方舟，通过对你的意志的效​​力已经显现出来和你的目标激励的影响进行了披露，并通过saileth你的权力包括陆地和海洋上的可能，不要抓住我在我强大的罪和伟大的过犯。我发誓，你的荣耀！你的宽恕和你的慈悲海域有底气了我，因为你的哈斯交易，在过去的年龄，与你的中间选民的真诚，和这样的你使者为已经宣布你的统一性。
I am well aware, O my Lord, that I have been so carried away by the clear tokens of Thy loving-kindness, and so completely inebriated with the wine of Thine utterance, that whatever I behold I readily discover that it maketh Thee known unto me, and it remindeth me of Thy signs, and of Thy tokens, and of Thy testimonies. By Thy glory! Every time I lift up mine eyes unto Thy heaven, I call to mind Thy highness and Thy loftiness, and Thine incomparable glory and greatness; and every time I turn my gaze to Thine earth, I am made to recognize the evidences of Thy power and the tokens of Thy bounty. And when I behold the sea, I find that it speaketh to me of Thy majesty, and of the potency of Thy might, and of Thy sovereignty and Thy grandeur. And at whatever time I contemplate the mountains, I am led to discover the ensigns of Thy victory and the standards of Thine omnipotence.
我清楚地知道，我的主啊，我一​​直在等带走你的慈爱的清晰标记，等完全被陶醉与祢话语的酒，无论我看见我爽快地发现，它使你与你们知我，这remindeth我你的迹象，你的令牌，和你的证词。通过你的荣耀！每次我抬起我的眼睛告诉你的天堂，我打电话给你的心和殿下你的崇高，你的荣耀无比和伟大;每次我把我的目光投向地球祢，我向认识你的权力的证据，你的赏金的令牌。当我看见海，我发现它说话你威严的我，和你的实力和你的主权，你的宏伟，的效力。并在任何时候，我考虑了山区，导致我发现你的胜利的军旗和你无所不能的标准。
I swear by Thy might, O Thou in Whose grasp are the reins of all mankind, and the destinies of the nations! I am so inflamed by my love for Thee, and so inebriated with the wine of Thy oneness, that I can hear from the whisper of the winds the sound of Thy glorification and praise, and can recognize in the murmur of the waters the voice that proclaimeth Thy virtues and Thine attributes, and can apprehend from the rustling of the leaves the mysteries that have been irrevocably ordained by Thee in Thy realm.
我发誓，你的威力，你这在他们的把握是全人类的缰绳，和国家的命运！我让我的爱发炎为你，所以醉醺醺与祢合一的酒，我可以从你的风颂扬和赞美的声音耳语听，可以在水中声音的杂音承认彰显你的美德和你的属性，并可以从叶子已不可撤回地祢在你的领域受戒奥秘的沙沙声逮捕。
Glorified art Thou, O God of all names and Creator of the heavens! I render Thee thanks that Thou hast made known unto Thy servants this Day whereon the river that is life indeed hath flowed forth from the fingers of Thy bounty, and the springtime of Thy revelation and Thy presence hath appeared through Thy manifestation unto all who are in Thy heaven and all who are on Thy earth.
荣耀你的艺术，所有名字的神和造物主天上的！我使你，因为你使中向你的仆人本日其上的河流是生命确实岂有流出来，从你的赏金的手指的感谢，你的启示和你面前的春天废去，借着你的表现似乎对所有的谁是你的天堂，所有谁是你的地球。
This is the Day, O my Lord, whose brightness Thou hast exalted above the brightness of the sun and the splendors thereof. I testify that the light it sheddeth proceedeth out of the glory of the light of Thy countenance, and is begotten by the radiance of the morn of Thy Revelation. This is the Day whereon the hopeless have been clothed with the raiment of confidence, and the sick attired with the robe of healing, and the poor drawn nigh unto the ocean of Thy riches.
这是一天，我的主啊，他们的亮度祢太阳的亮度和辉煌及其上面的尊崇。我作证，光这流人proceedeth了你脸上的光的荣耀，而且是独生子用你的启示的黎明的光芒。此乃无望已经披上了信心的衣服，穿着和愈合的长袍病人，对你的丰富的海洋穷得出在附近的天。
I swear by Thy Beauty, O King of eternity Who sittest on Thy most glorious Throne! He Who is the Dayspring of Thy signs and the Revealer of Thy clear tokens hath, notwithstanding the immensity of His wisdom and the loftiness of His knowledge, confessed His powerlessness to comprehend the least of Thine utterances, in their relation to Thy most exalted Pen,—how much more is He incapable of apprehending the nature of Thine all-glorious Self and of Thy most august Essence!
我发誓，你的美，永恒的王对你的最辉煌的王座谁sittest！他谁是你的迹象启端及祢的启示明确标记有的，尽管他的智慧的广袤和他的知识崇高，交代他的无力感理解最少祢的话语，在他们的关系你的最崇高的笔， - 如何更是他不能逮捕和祢祢最威严的精华全光荣自我的性质！
I cannot think, O my God, of any words wherewith to make mention of Thee, and know not how to express or extol Thee. Were I to attempt to describe Thee by Thy names, I would readily recognize that the kingdom of these names is itself created through the movement of Thy fingers, and trembleth for fear of Thee. And were I to venture to extol Thine attributes, I would be forced to admit that these attributes are Thine own creation, and lie within Thy grasp. It behooveth not Them Who are the Manifestations of these names and attributes to stand before the gate of the city of Thy Revelation, how much less to scale the heights whereon Thou didst stablish the throne of Thy majesty.
我不认为，我的神啊，任何话用那个做提祢，以及不知道如何表达或赞美你。被我试图用你的名字来形容你，我会毫不迟疑地承认，这些名称的国本身，通过你的手指的运动，就发抖，怕祢的创造。而且是我要大胆地歌颂祢的属性，我将被迫承认，这些属性是你自己的创作，并在撒谎你的把握。它各区会不会他们谁是这些名字的表现和属性站在城市祢启示的门，少了多少扩展其上祢高度坚固你威严的宝座前。
I swear by Thy might, O Thou Who art the King of names and the Maker of the heavens! Whatsoever hath been adorned with the robe of words is but Thy creation which hath been generated in Thy realm and begotten through the operation of Thy will, and is wholly unworthy of Thy highness and falleth short of Thine excellence.
我发誓，你的威力，你这是谁的艺术名的国王和天上的设备！凡水里被饰以文字的长袍，但它已经在你的领域已经产生，并通过独生祢的操作，而且是完全不值得你的威严，归降短祢卓越祢创造。
And since it hath been demonstrated that Thy most august Self is immeasurably exalted above all that hath been created in the world of being, and is far above the reach and ken of the apprehension of Thy chosen Ones and Thy loved Ones, the splendors of the light of Thy unity are therefore manifested, and it becometh evident unto every one, whether free or bond, that Thou art One in Thine own Self, one in Thy Cause, and one in Thy Revelation. Great is the blessedness of the man who, in his love towards Thee, hath rid himself of all attachment from every one except Thyself, and hastened unto the horizon of Thy Revelation, and attained unto this Cup which Thou hast caused to excel all the seas of the earth.
而且，由于它hath被证明你的最威严的自我是没法比高于一切大胆在人类世界被创造尊贵，并远远高于你的选民的忧虑的影响力和肯和你的亲人，的的辉煌因此，光你的统一的体现，而且为人很明显对每个人，不论是免费或债券，即你是一个在你自己的自我，一个在你的事业，一个在你的启示。大是男人的福气谁，在他对祢爱的人就有摆脱所有的附件从每个人，除了你自己对自己，对你的启示地平线加速，并达到对这一杯你所造成的所有出类拔萃的海洋地球。
I beg of Thee, O my God, by Thy power, and Thy might, and Thy sovereignty, which have embraced all who are in Thy heaven and on Thy earth, to make known unto Thy servants this luminous Way and this straight Path, that they may acknowledge Thy unity and Thy oneness, with a certainty which the vain imaginations of the doubters will not impair, nor the idle fancies of the wayward obscure. Illumine, O my Lord, the eyes of Thy servants, and brighten their hearts with the splendors of the light of Thy knowledge, that they may apprehend the greatness of this most sublime station, and recognize this most luminous Horizon, that haply the clamor of men may fail to deter them from turning their gaze towards the effulgent light of Thy unity, and to hinder them from setting their faces toward the Horizon of detachment.
我求求祢，哦，我的上帝，用你的力量，你的可能，你的主权，它已经接受了所有谁在你的天上人间你的，要让人知道你仆人的这种发光的方式，这直接路径，即他们可能会承认你的团结，你​​的统一性，具有确定性使持怀疑态度的虚荣的想象，会不会影响，也没有任性的模糊空闲望梅止渴。照亮，我的主啊，仆人的眼睛，照亮他们的心与你的知识光的辉煌，使他们领悟此至高无尚的伟大，认识到这一点最明亮的地平线，是偶然的喧嚣男人可能无法转动他们的目光朝着灿烂的光明里的统一阻止他们，并从他们的设置面朝支队的地平线阻碍他们。
This is the Day, O my Lord, which Thou didst announce unto all mankind as the Day whereon Thou wouldst reveal Thy Self, and shed Thy radiance, and shine brightly over all Thy creatures. Thou hast, moreover, entered into a covenant with them, in Thy Books, and Thy Scriptures, and Thy Scrolls, and Thy Tablets, concerning Him Who is the Dayspring of Thy Revelation, and hast appointed the Bayán to be the Herald of this Most Great and all-glorious Manifestation, and this most resplendent and most sublime Appearance.
这是一天，我的主啊，这祢宣布对全人类是因为你所揭示斜射你的自我的日子，并流下你的光芒，而光芒在所有你的生物。你所有的，此外，公司与他们立约，在你的书，你的圣经，你的卷轴，你的片，关于他谁是你的启示启端，也曾任命巴彦成为这个最导报大和全光荣的表现，而这最辉煌和最崇高的外观。
And when the world’s horizon was illumined, and He Who is the Most Great Name was manifested, all disbelieved in Him and in His signs, except such as have been carried away by the sweetness of Thy glorification and praise. There befell Him what must remain inscrutable to everyone except Thee, Whose knowledge transcendeth all who are in Thy heaven and all who are on Thy earth.
当世界的视野被照亮，而他谁是最伟大的名字已经显现出来，不信都在他和他的迹象，但如被带走你的荣耀和赞誉的甜蜜。无独有偶，有什么他必须保持高深莫测给大家，除了你，谁的知识transcendeth所有谁是你的天堂，所有谁是你的地球。
Thou well knowest, O my God, that the Revealer of the Bayán (the Báb) hath commanded all mankind concerning Thy Cause, and Thy Revelation, and Thy Sovereignty. He hath said, and sweet is His speech: “Beware lest the Bayán and its Letters keep you back from Him Who is the Most Merciful and from His sovereignty.” He, moreover, hath written: “Were He to produce no more than one verse, ye must not deny Him. Haste ye towards Him, that haply He may cause to descend upon you what He pleaseth, as a token of His grace unto you. He truly is the Possessor of His servants, and the King of creation.”
你也晓得，哦，我的上帝，巴彦的启示（巴孛）所吩咐你的有关原因全人类，你的启示，你的主权。他曾说，和甜是他的讲话：“小心，以免巴彦和信件让你回来从他谁是最仁慈的，并从他的主权。”他，而且，写了信：“是他产生不超过一诗句，你们绝不能否认他。急速你们对他，大致上他可能会下降时，你是什么，他pleaseth，因为他对你的恩典的象征。他确实是他的仆人养着，和创造的国王。“
Thou seest, then, O Thou Who art the Beloved of the world and the Revealer of the Most Great Name, how He hath come down with the kingdom of His signs, and in a manner that hath caused the atoms of the earth to testify that the whole world hath been filled with these signs. And yet, notwithstanding this most manifest and all-glorious Revelation, and these signs which none can appraise except Thee, O Thou the King of names, Thou beholdest how they have broken off from Him Who is the Dayspring of Thine Essence, and have caviled at the One Who is the Fountainhead of Thy wisdom and of Thine utterance. They were so seized with thirst for fame, that they rejected Thy tokens, and Thy testimonies, and Thy signs, which every man of insight perceiveth in whatsoever declareth Thy greatness, and Thy sovereignty, and acknowledgeth Thy Revelation and Thy might. They have so traduced Him as to cause the inmates of the all-glorious Tabernacle and the Concourse on high to lament, and have uttered such calumnies against Him that the souls of Thy chosen Ones and the hearts of them that are dear to Thee have melted. They have erred so grievously that they cast away Thy most resplendent signs, and clung to their idle fancies, O Thou Who art the Possessor of Names and the Lord of the Throne on high and of earth below!
ああ，那么，你这是谁的艺术的宠儿世界和最伟大的名字，他所作下来与他的招牌王国的启示，并在怎样使地球的原子作证的方式整个世界又是充满了这些迹象。然而，尽管这最明显和全光荣的启示，而这些迹象而没有人可以评价，除了你，你这名字的国王，你眼看着他们如何从他断过谁，是你的本质的地方自治，并​​已caviled在一个谁是你的智慧和你的话语的源头。他们因此检与渴望名声，他们拒绝了你的令牌，和你的法度，和你的迹象，这洞察力perceiveth每个人在任何传扬你的伟大，你的���权，acknowledgeth你的启示和你的威力。他们有这么traduced他为使全光荣幕和广场高感叹的囚犯，并说出这样的诽谤对他说你的选民的灵魂，他们是亲爱的祢的心都融化。他们犯错让悲伤地说，他们抛弃你的最辉煌的标志，并死死抓住自己的闲置幻想，哦你这名字的拥有者和宝座的主地球上低于高！
Thou art, O my God and the Exultation of my heart, the One Who hath adorned Thy Tablet, of which none is aware except Thee, with the mention of this Day which Thou didst call after Thy name, that haply none may on that day be seen save Thy most august Self, and naught else be brought to mind except Thy most sweet remembrance.
你是，哦，我的上帝，我的心脏的欢欣，是谁作装饰你的平板电脑的一个，其中没有意识到，除了你，在提到这一天后，该你的名字你谤电话，说大致上没有可能在那一天可以看出救你最威严的自我，并虚无否则被带到心中除了你的最甜蜜的回忆。
No sooner had He revealed Himself than the foundations of the kindreds of the earth shook and trembled, and the learned swooned away, and the wise were bewildered, except such as have, through the power of Thy might, drawn nigh unto Thee, and received the choice wine of Thy Revelation from the hand of Thy grace, and have quaffed it in Thy name, and exclaimed: “Praise be unto Thee, O Thou the Desire of the worlds! and glory be to Thee, O Thou Who art the Exultation of the hearts that pant after Thee!”
还没等他透露自己比地球的万族的根基摇晃和颤动，和教训昏晕了，和聪明人一脸茫然，但如必须通过你的权力可能会，吸引近了告诉你，并获得选择你的酒的启示，从你的恩典之手，并一饮而尽它在你的名字，并大声说：“赞美告诉你，你这世界的欲望！和荣耀是你，呵，你是谁的艺术心中的裤子后，祢的大喜！“
My God, my Master, my Highest Hope, and the Goal of my desire! Thou seest and hearest the sighing of this wronged One, from this darksome well which the vain imaginations of Thine adversaries have built, and from this blind pit which the idle fancies of the wicked among Thy creatures have digged. By Thy Beauty, O Thou Whose glory is uncovered to the face of men! I am not impatient in the troubles that touch me in my love for Thee, neither in the adversities which I suffer in Thy path. Nay, I have, by Thy power, chosen them for mine own self, and I glory in them amongst such of Thy creatures as enjoy near access to Thee, and those of Thy servants that are wholly devoted to Thy Self.
我的上帝，我的主人，我最大的希望，我的欲望的目标！你看见与这个听信的叹息委屈的一个，从这个阴暗的还有就是你的敌人的徒劳的想象力已经建立，并从这种盲目的凹坑的恶人你的动物之间的空闲幻想已经挖。因为你的美，你这是谁的荣耀发现到男人的脸！我不躁的让我感动，我为你的爱情烦恼，无论是在我遭受你的路径中的逆境。不仅如此，我也有，用你的力量，他们选择了我自己的自我，我的荣耀在他们之间这样你的生物作为享受近访问你，那些仆人是完全致力于你的自我。
I beseech Thee, however, O Thou Who art the Enlightener of the world and the Lord of the nations, at this very moment when, with the hands of hope, I have clung to the hem of the raiment of Thy mercy and Thy bounty, to forgive Thy servants who have soared in the atmosphere of Thy nearness, and set their faces towards the splendors of the light of Thy countenance, and turned unto the horizon of Thy good pleasure, and approached the ocean of Thy mercy, and all their lives long have spoken forth Thy praise, and have been inflamed with the fire of their love for Thee. Do Thou ordain for them, O Lord my God, both before and after their death, what becometh the loftiness of Thy bounty and the excellence of Thy loving-kindness.
我恳求你，不过，你这是谁的艺术世界的启蒙者和国家的主，在这个非常时刻，有希望的手，我抱着你的怜悯和你的赏金的衣服下摆，原谅你的仆人谁已飙升你的亲近的氛围，并设定他们的脸往你脸上的光的辉煌，对祢的美意地平线转过身来，走近你的仁慈的海洋，他们的生活长已经讲出来你的赞美，并已发炎与他们为你的爱火。难道你注定他们，主啊，我的上帝，之前和他们死后，什么为人你的赏金的崇高和你的慈爱的精益求精。
Grant, O my Lord, that they who have ascended unto Thee may repair unto Him Who is the most exalted Companion, and abide beneath the shadow of the Tabernacle of Thy majesty and the Sanctuary of Thy glory. Sprinkle, O my Lord, upon them from the ocean of Thy forgiveness what will make them worthy to abide, so long as Thine own sovereignty endureth, within Thy most exalted kingdom and Thine all-highest dominion. Potent art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee.
格兰特，我的主啊，他们谁也登上祢可以修复祂谁是最崇高的伴侣，并遵守威严的帐幕和圣殿你的荣耀的阴影之下。撒，我的主啊，在他们身上，从你的宽恕的海洋什么会令他们值得遵守，只要你自己的主权长存，在你的最崇高的王国，和你所有的最高统治权。强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。
Deny not Thy loved ones, O my Lord, the sweet savors of this Day whereon the mysteries of Thy name, the Self-Subsisting, were unraveled, and all that had been enshrined within the treasuries of Thy wisdom was revealed. This is the Day, O my Lord, whereon every atom of the earth hath been made to vibrate and to cry out: “O Thou Who art the Revealer of signs and the King of creation! I, verily, perceive the fragrance of Thy presence. Methinks Thou hast revealed Thyself, and unlocked the door of reunion with Thee before all who are in Thy heaven and all who are on Thy earth. I am persuaded through the fragrance of Thy robe, O my Lord, that the world hath been honored through Thy presence, and hath inhaled the sweet smell of Thy meeting. I know not, however, O Thou the Beloved of the world and the Desire of the nations, the place wherein the throne of Thy majesty hath been established, nor the seat which hath been made Thy footstool, and been illumined with the splendors of the light of Thy face.”
不否认你的亲人，我的主啊，这一天的甜蜜品味其上的你的名字，自我存续的奥秘，解开了，所有已被祢智慧的宝库内供奉透露。这是一天，我的主啊，其上历代以来取得了地球的每一个原子的振动，并哭了出来：“啊，你这标志的启示和创造之王！我，众志成城，感知你的存在的清香。我认为你因你启示你自己，和之前的所有谁是你的天堂，所有谁是你的地球解锁团聚与你的门。我通过你的长袍，我的主啊的清香说服，认为世界又是通过你的存在荣幸，必吸入香味你的会议。我不知道，但是，你这被爱的世界和国家的欲望，其中历代以来成立威严的宝座的地方，也不是应当取得你的脚下，而被照亮用的辉煌的座位光你的脸。“
I swear by Thy glory, O Thou Who art the Lord of all being and the Possessor of all things visible and invisible! Every man of understanding hath been so bewildered at Thy knowledge, and every man endued with insight been so perplexed in his attempt to fathom the signs of Thy great glory, that all have recognized their powerlessness to visualize, and their impotence to soar into, the heaven wherefrom one of the Luminaries of the Manifestations of Thy knowledge and of the Daysprings of Thy wisdom hath shone forth. Who is he that shall befittingly describe this most sublime station and this most august seat—the seat which, as decreed by Thee, transcendeth the comprehension of Thy creatures and the testimonies of Thy servants, and which hath everlastingly been hid from the understanding and the knowledge of men, and been closed with the seal of Thy name, the Self-Subsisting.
我发誓，你的荣耀，哦你这一切存在的主，万物有形和无形的拥有！了解每个人在你们这样莫名其妙在你的知识，每个人都赋予了洞察力一直在他试图参透祢极大的荣耀迹象如此迷乱，所有已经认识到自己的无能想象，他们的阳痿飙升到时，从那天堂和祢智慧的Daysprings祢知识表现的灯具之一祂所焕发出来。谁是那要befittingly形容这个最崇高站，这最威严的座椅座位，正如颁布了你，你的transcendeth生物的理解和仆人的法度，是应当永恒地被隐瞒的理解和有学问的人，并关闭与你的名字，自我存续的密封。
I swear by Thy glory and Thy sovereignty which overshadow the kingdoms of earth and of heaven! Were any of Thy chosen Ones and Thy Messengers to meditate on the manifold evidences of Thy most exalted Pen—a Pen which is driven by the fingers of Thy will—and were he to muse on its mysteries, and its tokens, and all that it showeth forth, he would be so perplexed that his tongue would fail to extol and describe Thee, and his heart would be utterly unable to understand Thee. For he would, at one time, discover that from this Pen there floweth out unto all created things the water that is life indeed, and that the Pen itself hath been named by Thee the trumpet whereby the dead speed out of their sepulchers. At another time he would find that there proceedeth from this Pen such fire as Thine own Revelation can kindle, and as He Who conversed with Thee (Moses) on Sinai hath perceived.
我发誓，你的荣耀和你的主权，这掩盖了天上人间和的王国！任何人你的选民，你使者的默想你的最崇高的笔笔的这是由你的手指驱动将-并他沉思在它的奥秘，它的令牌歧管的证据，以及所有它指给出来，他会这么困惑，他的舌头就不能歌颂和描写你，他的心脏就完全无法理解你。对于他，在同一时间，发现从这个笔有floweth了对所有创造物的水是生命的确，那笔本身hath被命名为祢小号即死者的速度走出自己的坟墓中。在其他时间，他会发现，有此笔等消防proceedeth为你自己的启示可以点燃，而作为他谁跟你（摩西）转增对西奈悟。
How marvelous, then, are the manifold tokens of Thy might, and how great are the diverse evidences of Thy power! The learned have, without exception, admitted their ignorance when confronted with the radiance of the Luminary of Thy knowledge; and the mighty have all confessed their impotence in the face of the billowing Ocean of Thy power; and the rich have one and all acknowledged their poverty before the effusions of the Treasuries of Thy wealth; and the worldly wise have each recognized their nothingness beside the splendors of the Light of Thy beauty; and the exalted have all witnessed unto their abasement when face to face with the effulgence of the Daystar of Thy glory; and they who are in authority have borne witness to their own evanescence and to the evanescence of others, and discovered the eternity of Thy majesty, and of Thy sovereignty, and of Thy sublimity, and of Thy power.
如何神乎其神，那么，是你的可能歧管令牌，以及如何伟大的是你的权力的多元化证据！该学会已无一例外，当与你的知识的Luminary的光芒面对承认自己的无知;和强大的都交代了他们在你手中的滚滚海洋面对阳痿;和富人有一个和所有认识你的财富国债的积液前，他们的贫困;与世俗智慧各有其认可虚无你的美光的辉煌旁边;而高举都目睹了给他们的自卑，当面对面与你的荣耀了启明星的光芒;他们谁是权威已经见证了自己的幻灭和别人的幻灭，发现你的威严的永恒，和你的主权，你的崇高，你的权力。
My God, and the God of all things, and my King and the King of all things, and the Beloved of my soul, and the Goal of my desire! Thou knowest full well that I make mention of Thee, in this day, in the name of such of Thy creatures as have detached themselves from all except Thee, and I extol Thy virtues through the tongue of those of Thy people that have recognized Thy oneness, that haply there may pour out from the sighs which they utter in their love and their yearning for Thee what will melt away all that may hinder Thy servants from setting their faces towards the heaven of Thy knowledge and the kingdom of Thy signs.
我的神，万物的上帝，我的王和万物之王，和心爱的灵魂，我的欲望的目标！你知道得很清楚，我做祢提到的，在这一天，在你的这种生物的名称已经从所有除祢超脱自己，我通过你的那些人的舌头已经认识到你的单一性歌颂你的美德，那必有可能从他们在彼此的爱情，向往说出你用什么时间会融化掉所有可能妨碍你的仆人，从设置他们的脸朝着你的知识的天堂和你的迹象王国的叹息倒出来。
This, then, O my God and the God of all names, and the Creator of earth and heaven, is the Day whereon He Whose heart gloweth with the flaming fire of Thy presence is calling upon Thee. Where can separation from Thee be found, O my God, so that reunion with Thee may be clearly recognized at the appearance of the Light of Thy unity, and the revelation of the splendors of the Sun of Thy oneness? I ask pardon of Thee, O my God, for all that hath been said, and for whatsoever hath flowed out, and is now flowing out from my Pen in Thy days. I testify that Thou hast decreed that the offering of prayer should befit not me, but Him Who hath, at Thy bidding and in conformity with Thy pleasure, preceded me. Rather hast Thou ordained that the revelation of verses should be specially attributed unto this mighty Manifestation, and to This Announcement that hath adorned the Scrolls of Thy majesty and Thy Tablet in which account is kept.
这一点，那么，我的神啊，所有名的神，天地的创造者，是日其上，因为他的心脏gloweth与你面前的火焰正在呼吁你。在哪里可以从你的分离发现，哦，我的上帝，让团聚与你同在，可以清楚地认识到，在你的统一的光，你合一的太阳辉煌的启示的外观？我问你的原谅，我的神啊，为所有有话说，和凡水里流出，现在从我的笔流淌出你的天。我作证，你已经下令，祈祷的发行应该BEFIT不是我，而是他的人有的，在你的招投标并符合你的快感，在此之前我。而祢命定的经文的启示，应特别归功于对这个���大的表现，以及本公告是因耶和华装饰威严的卷轴和你的平板电脑中，占被保留。
I render Thee thanks, O Thou Who hast lighted Thy fire within my soul, and cast the beams of Thy light into my heart, that Thou hast taught Thy servants how to make mention of Thee, and revealed unto them the ways whereby they can supplicate Thee, through Thy most holy and exalted tongue, and Thy most august and precious speech. But for Thy leave, who is there that could venture to express Thy might and Thy grandeur; and were it not for Thine instruction, who is the man that could discover the ways of Thy pleasure in the kingdom of Thy creation?
我使祢感谢，呵，你是谁竟在我的灵魂点燃你的火，投你的一束光进入我的心脏，你竟教你的仆人如何让祢提到的，对他们透露的途径，由此他们可以哀告你，求祢最圣洁和崇高的舌头，你的最威严和珍贵的讲话。但对于你的离开，谁在那里，可以大胆地表达你的实力和你的宏伟;而如果不是因为你的指令，是谁的人，可以发现在你的创作的国度你的快感的方法是什么？
I beseech Thee, O God of bounty and King of all created things, to guard Thy servants from the imaginations which their hearts may devise. Raise them up, then, to such heights that their footsteps may slip not in the face of the evidences of Thy handiwork, which the manifold exigencies of Thy wisdom have ordained, and whose secrets Thou hast hid from the face of Thy people and Thy creatures. Withhold them not, O my Lord, from the ocean of Thy knowledge, neither do Thou deprive them of what Thou didst destine for such of Thy chosen ones as have near access to Thee, and those of Thy trusted ones as are wholly devoted to Thy Self. Supply them, then, from Thy sea of certainty with what will calm the agitation of their hearts. Turn, O Lord my God, the darkness of their fancies into the brightness of certitude, and cause them to arise, and to walk steadfastly in Thy straight Path, that haply Thy Book may not hinder them from recognizing Him Who is its Revealer, and Thy names from acknowledging the One Who is their Creator, and their Provider, and their Origin, and their King, and their Begetter, and their Destroyer, and their Glorifier, and their Abaser, and their Governor, and the Sovereign Protector of their Bearers.
我恳求你，赏金的神与所有创造物景，从中他们的心可以设计的想象力守护你的仆人。养起来，那么，这样的高度，他们的脚步可能会滑倒不是你的杰作的证据，其中有你的智慧歧管原故已经注定，而其秘密的脸上你从你的人和你的生灵面前藏。扣压他们不要，我的主啊，从你的知识海洋中，你也不要剥夺他们什么祢注定这样你的所选的人作为有近访问你，和你的那些值得信赖的人因为是完全致力于你的自我。供应他们的话，从确定性祢海什么会平静自己的内心的躁动。转，主啊，我的上帝，他们���想的黑暗到确定性的亮度，并导致他们出现，并坚定不移地走在你的正道，这大致上你的书可以不认识他是谁的探宝阻碍他们，从承认一个谁是他们的创造者，他们的供应商，他们的起源，以及他们的国王，他们的Begetter，他们的毁灭，以及他们Glorifier，他们Abaser，和他们的州长你的名字，他们承载的主权保护。
Thou art the One, O my God and my Ruler, Who hast sent down Thy Book that Thou mayest manifest my Cause, and glorify my Word. Through it Thou didst enter into a Covenant, concerning me, with all that hath been created in Thy realm. Thou seest, O Beloved of the world, how the rebellious among Thy creatures have made of that Covenant a bulwark for themselves, and through it have withdrawn from Thy Beauty, and repudiated Thy signs.
你是壹，哦，我的上帝，我的标尺，谁竟派下来你的书，叫你表现我的事业，我的荣耀字。通过它祢进入一个公约，关于我，与所有已经在你的领域中创建。ああ，哦亲爱的世界，如何叛逆你的动物中取得了该公约的堡垒为自己，并通过它从你的美撤出，并驳斥你的迹象。
Thou art He, O my God, Who hath commanded them in Thy great Book, and said: “Fear ye the Most Merciful, O people of the Bayán, and deny not Him for Whom I have ordained the Bayán to be one of the leaves of His Paradise. I, verily, esteem it as a gift from me unto Him. Were it His pleasure to accept it, He, truly, is the Most Bountiful; and if He cast it away and refuse to consider it, His verdict is just, and He, in very truth, is Praiseworthy in His acts, and meet to be obeyed in His behests. To none is given the right to cavil at Him.”
你是他，我的神啊，谁降旨他们你的伟大的书，说：“你们怕的最仁慈，哦人扬手，并且不否认他我为他已经注定了扬手是叶一祂的天堂。我，众志成城，推崇它作为我的礼物祂。要不是他高兴地接受它，他，真的，是最尊严的;如果他投它拿走，并拒绝考虑，他的判决是公正的，他，的的确确是值得赞扬他的行为，并满足他的遗志，以服从。要没有给予吹毛求疵了他的权利。“
Thou beholdest, therefore, O my God, how this wronged one hath fallen into the hands of such as have denied Thy right, and broken off from Thy sovereignty. He, round whose person circleth Thy proof, and in whose name and on behalf of whose sovereignty Thy testimony crieth out unto all created things, hath suffered more grievously in his days than any pen can recount, and been so harassed that He Who is Thy Spirit (Jesus) lamented, and all the denizens of Thy Kingdom and all the inmates of Thy Tabernacle in the realms above cried with a great and bitter lamentation.
你眼看着，因此，我的神啊，这怎么委屈所造陷入这样的手中否认你的权利，并从你的主权折断。他，圆他们的人circleth你的证明，并以其名义并代表其主权你的证词喊叫。对所有创造物，便叫受到了更多的悲伤地在他的日子比任何笔可以各显神通，和如此骚扰的他谁是你的灵（耶稣）感叹，和你的王国所有的居民们和你的帐幕所有的领域的犯人与一个伟大而痛痛哭上面哭。
Should any one incline his inner ear, he would hear the cry and the wailing of all created things over what hath befallen Him Whom the world hath wronged, at the hands of them with whom Thou hast covenanted in the Day of Separation. Where is that fair-minded soul, O my God, who will judge equitably Thy Cause, and where is the man of insight to be found who will behold Thee with Thine own eyes? Is there any man of hearing who will hear Thee with Thine ears, or one endued with eloquence who will speak the truth in Thy days?
如果任何一个倾斜他的内耳，他会听到哭声和所有创造物的尖啸在什么所遭遇他为谁而世界又委屈，在他们与谁祢就给在分离的日子手中。哪里是公正的灵魂，我的神啊，谁就会判断你的公平的原因，并在那里的有识之士来发现谁将会看见祢与你自己的眼睛？有没有人听谁都会听你与你耳朵的，或者一个赋予了口才谁都会讲的你的日子真相？
I swear by Thy glory, O Thou Who beholdest me from Thine all-glorious horizon, and hearest the voice of the Lote-Tree beyond which there is no passing! Should any one consider Thy Books which Thou didst name the Bayán, and ponder in his heart what hath been revealed therein, he would discover that each of these Books announceth my Revelation, and declareth my Name, and testifieth to my Self, and proclaimeth my Cause, and my Praise, and my Rising, and the radiance of my Glory. And yet, notwithstanding Thy proclamation, O my God, and in spite of the words Thou didst utter, O my Beloved, Thou hast seen and heard their calumnies against me, and their evil doings in my days.
我发誓，你的荣耀，你这是谁离你眼看着我的一切，光荣的视野，在卢特 - 树听信声音超过这个没有及格！如果任何一个考虑你的书而祢命名扬手，并思考在他的心脏是什么hath被透露其中，他会发现，这些书籍announceth我的启示，并传扬我的名，并当面见证我的自我，并彰显我因为，我的赞美，我的瑞星，我的荣耀的光芒。然而，尽管你的宣言，我的神啊，并不顾的话祢彻底，啊，我亲爱的，你所看到和听到他们的诽谤攻击我，他们的罪恶行为在我的天。
I testify in my present state, O my Lord, and against the will of him who hath turned his back to Thee (Mírzá Yaḥyá), that Thou art God, and that there is none other God beside Thee. This, verily, is the Day wherewith Thy Scriptures, and Thy Books, and Thy Tablets, have been adorned. And He Who now speaketh is, in truth, the Well-guarded Treasure, and the Hidden Secret, and the Preserved Tablet, and the Impenetrable Mystery, and the Sealed Book. He, truly, is to be obeyed in whatsoever He commandeth, and decreeth, and revealeth, and is to be loved in everything He, through His sovereignty, enjoineth, and, through His power, ordaineth. Whoso will hesitate for less than the twinkling of an eye, hath, verily, denied Thy right, and repudiated all that Thou hast revealed in Thy Books, and in Thy Scriptures, and sent down with Thy chosen Ones, and Thy Prophets, and Thy Messengers, and the Trustees of Thy Revelation.
我作证，我现在的状态，我的主啊，和对他谁作转身回到你（米尔扎·叶海亚），你是神，以及有没有其他的你以外神的旨意。这实实在在的，是用那个天你的圣经，你的书，你的牌子，已经被装饰。而他现在谁说话的，说实话，精心守护着宝藏，和不可告人的秘密，和腌制平板电脑，以及牢不可破的神秘，以及密封图书。他，真的，就是在任何他吩咐，decreeth，并显明要服从，而且是被人爱的一切他，通过他的主权，声色进去，并通过他的能力，ordaineth。无论谁都会犹豫不到一转眼，有的，众志成城，剥夺你的权利，并否认一切，因为你已经显露你的书，并在你的圣经，并派下来你的选民，和你的先知，你的使者，你的启示的受托人。
I beg of Thee, O Thou in Whose hands are the kingdoms of earth and heaven, and in Whose grasp lie all who dwell in the dominions of Thy Revelation and Thy creation, not to withhold the glance of Thy favors from such as have sustained tribulations in Thy path, and tasted of the cup of woe in their love towards Thee, and have been cast into prison in Thy name, and endured what none of Thy creatures and Thy people have endured. They are Thy servants, O my Lord, who have responded to Thee as soon as Thou didst send out Thy summons, and have set their faces towards Thee when the light of Thy countenance was lifted upon them, and turned unto Thee at the time when Thy most exalted horizon shone forth with the brightness of Thy name through which all who are in Thy heaven and on Thy earth swooned away. Ordain for them, O my Lord, what Thou didst ordain for Thy chosen ones who have welcomed the darts of the infidels in Thy Cause and for love of Thee, and hasted to attain the orient of tribulation with Thy name on their lips and Thy remembrance in their hearts. Thou art the One, O my God, Who hath promised in Thy perspicuous utterances to remember them in Thy Book as a recompense for their works in Thy days.
我求求祢的，你这在谁的手里有天地的王国，并在其掌握的所有的谎言在谁你的启示和你的创作领地居住，不扣你的的一瞥青睐来自诸如有持续的磨难在你的路径，并尝到了一杯悲哀的他们对祢的爱，并已投入狱中奉你的名，并忍受什么没有你的生物和你的人忍受。他们是你的仆人，我的主啊，谁在当时已作出回应祢只要祢发出传票你的，并且已经设置了他们的脸朝着祢当你脸上的光被在他们解除，转身对祢你最崇高的地平线焕发出来的与你的名字的亮度，使所有谁在你的天上人间你的离开昏倒。阿拉维对他们来说，我的主啊，有什么祢注定了你的选择的人谁也欢迎异教徒的飞镖在你的事业和爱你的，并且急忙达到磨难的东方有你的名字在他们的嘴唇和你的记忆在他们的心中。你是壹，哦，我的上帝，他已经答应在你的明晰话语记住它们在你的书作为补偿他们在你的天工作。
Bless them, O my God, and ascribe unto them such glory as hath shone forth above the horizon of Thy will, and hath shed its splendors from the kingdom of Thine utterance. Immerse them, O my Lord, beneath the ocean of Thy mercy, and illumine them with the dawning light of Thy Revelation. Forgive, then, O my God, their fathers and their mothers, by Thy favor, and Thy bounty, and Thy tender mercies. Send, then, upon them from the right hand of Thy most exalted Paradise the fragrance of the robe of Thine all-glorious Beauty. Potent art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee. Thou, verily, art the Governor, the Ordainer, the All-Bountiful, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Generous.
祝福他们，哦，我的上帝，归因于对他们这样的荣耀岂有焕发出来你的地平线上方会，并叫他从祢话语的国摆脱其辉煌。沉浸其中，我的主啊，你的慈悲的海洋之下，并与你的启示的曙光光照亮他们。请原谅，那么，我的神啊，他们的父亲和母亲，用你的青睐和你的奖金，和你的慈悲。发送，那么，在他们从你的最崇高天堂的右手祢的长袍全光荣美的芬芳。强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。你，众志成城，艺术总督，命定，全丰年祭时，曾经赦，最慷慨的。
Praise be unto Thee, O Thou the Beloved of the world, and the Adored of the hearts of them that have recognized Thee.
赞美是给你，呵，你的心爱的世界，和他们心中的崇拜者已经认可你。

I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy mighty Sign, and by the revelation...

I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy mighty Sign, and by the revelation of Thy grace amongst men, to cast me not away from the gate of the city of Thy presence, and to disappoint not the hopes I have set on the manifestations of Thy grace amidst Thy creatures. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，用你强大的标志，并通过你的恩典之中的人的启示，投我不是远离城市的你面前的门，并没有失望，我已经设置了表现的希望祢恩典之中你的生物。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy most sweet Voice and by Thy most exalted Word, to draw me ever nearer to the threshold of Thy door, and to suffer me not to be far removed from the shadow of Thy mercy and the canopy of Thy bounty. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，用你最甜美的声音和你的最崇高的话语，永远接近我画到你的门的门槛，挨我不能远离你怜悯的阴影和去除树冠祢赏金。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by the splendor of Thy luminous brow and the brightness of the light of Thy countenance, which shineth from the all-highest horizon, to attract me by the fragrance of Thy raiment, and make me drink of the choice wine of Thine utterance. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，通过你的光额头上的辉煌和你脸上的光，照耀在全视界最高的亮度，吸引了我用你的衣服上的香气，让我喝的选择葡萄酒祢话语。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
