I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy hair which moveth across Thy face, even as Thy most exalted pen moveth across the pages of Thy Tablets, shedding the musk of hidden meanings over the kingdom of Thy creation, so to raise me up to serve Thy Cause that I shall not fall back, nor be hindered by the suggestions of them who have caviled at Thy signs and turned away from Thy face. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，用你的发质跨越它摇动你的脸，即使你的最崇高的笔穿过它摇动你的片的网页，脱落了你的创作王国隐藏的意义的麝香，因此鼓舞了我来服务于你的事业，我不会回落，也不是由他们谁也caviled在你的标志，并从你的脸转身离开的建议受到阻碍。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy Name which Thou hast made the King of Names, by which all who are in heaven and all who are on earth have been enraptured, to enable me to gaze on the Daystar of Thy Beauty, and to supply me with the wine of Thine utterance. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，我的神啊，你名下的这你使名称的国王，对一切谁在天堂和所有谁是地球上已经眉飞色舞，让我凝视你的美丽的启明星，并提供我同你话语的酒。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by the Tabernacle of Thy majesty upon the loftiest summits, and the Canopy of Thy Revelation on the highest hills, to graciously aid me to do what Thy will hath desired and Thy purpose hath manifested. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，通过在最崇高的峰会威严的帐幕，以及你的启示最高山峰的雨棚，以帮助客客气气我做你的将祂所期望和你的目的祂所表现。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy Beauty that shineth forth above the horizon of eternity, a Beauty before which, as soon as it revealeth itself, the kingdom of beauty boweth down in worship, magnifying it in ringing tones, to grant that I may die to all that I possess and live to whatsoever belongeth unto Thee. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，因为你的美的照耀出来永恒的地平线上，一个美丽而之前，只要它显明自己，美容王国boweth下来崇拜，放大它的铃声，给予了我可能会死的一切，我拥有和生活，以任何属乎你。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by the Manifestation of Thy Name, the Well-Beloved, through Whom the hearts of Thy lovers were consumed and the souls of all that dwell on earth have soared aloft, to aid me to remember Thee amongst Thy creatures, and to extol Thee amidst Thy people. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，通过你的名字的表现形式，将所亲爱的，便叫你的恋人的心被消耗和所有住在地球上的灵魂已经飙升高高举起，帮助我记住祢祢之间生物，并颂扬祢之中你的人。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by the rustling of the Divine Lote-Tree and the murmur of the breezes of Thine utterance in the kingdom of Thy names, to remove me far from whatsoever Thy will abhorreth, and draw me nigh unto the station wherein He Who is the Dayspring of Thy signs hath shone forth. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，我的神啊，由神州卢特树的沙沙声和你的话语在你的名字王国的微风，的杂音，以远离凡你会憎恶删除我，我画你们站近了其中，他谁是你的标志地方自治祂所焕发出来。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by that Letter which, as soon as it proceeded out of the mouth of Thy will, hath caused the oceans to surge, and the winds to blow, and the fruits to be revealed, and the trees to spring forth, and all past traces to vanish, and all veils to be rent asunder, and them who are devoted to Thee to hasten unto the light of the countenance of their Lord, the Unconstrained, to make known unto me what lay hid in the treasuries of Thy knowledge and concealed within the repositories of Thy wisdom. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，我的神啊，由该信哪个，只要它接着从你的嘴里会，怎样使海洋激增，以及风吹，和水果被揭晓，树木春天出来，所有过去的痕迹消失，并且所有面纱被立刻四分五裂，其中谁是致力于祢加快对他们的主，无约束，对脸上的光，使你们知道我是什么在奠定HID祢的知识宝库和你的智慧的仓库内隐蔽。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by the fire of Thy love which drove sleep from the eyes of Thy chosen ones and Thy loved ones, and by their remembrance and praise of Thee at the hour of dawn, to number me with such as have attained unto that which Thou hast sent down in Thy Book and manifested through Thy will. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，通过你的爱心，驱车从睡眠祢选民的眼睛和你的亲人，并通过他们的回忆与你的赞美在黎明的时刻火，数点我这样的有实现对，你既然在你的书发下来，并通过你的意志的体现。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by the light of Thy countenance which impelled them who are nigh unto Thee to meet the darts of Thy decree, and such as are devoted to Thee to face the swords of Thine enemies in Thy path, to write down for me with Thy most exalted Pen what Thou hast written down for Thy trusted ones and Thy chosen ones. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，哦，我的上帝，通过你脸上的光，他们推动谁是亲近要对你满足你的法令的飞镖，以及诸如致力于向你要面对祢在你的路径敌人的剑，写下来我跟你的最崇高的笔将你所写下了你的信任的人与你的选择的。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。
I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy Name through which Thou hast hearkened unto the call of Thy lovers, and the sighs of them that long for Thee, and the cry of them that enjoy near access to Thee, and the groaning of them that are devoted to Thee, and through which Thou hast fulfilled the wishes of them that have set their hopes on Thee, and hast granted them their desires, through Thy grace and Thy favors, and by Thy Name through which the ocean of forgiveness surged before Thy face, and the clouds of Thy generosity rained upon Thy servants, to write down for everyone who hath turned unto Thee, and observed the Fast prescribed by Thee, the recompense decreed for such as speak not except by Thy leave, and who forsook all that they possessed in Thy path and for love of Thee.
我求求你，我的神啊，你名下的，通过它你既听从爱人的电话，并且他们的叹息那么久为你，他们是享受近访问祢的一声，他们的呻吟这是专门为你，并通过你所完成他们已经对你的，他们的希望的愿望，也曾给予他们自己的欲望，通过你的恩典和你的主张，并通过你的名字前，通过宽恕的洋激增你的脸，你的慷慨的云彩雨下在你的仆人，写下来给大家谁把原来给你，并观察了快速通过祢规定，颁布了诸如补偿不说话除非你的离开，谁抛弃了一切他们拥有在你的路径和爱你的。
I beseech Thee, O my Lord, by Thyself, and by Thy signs, and Thy clear tokens, and the shining light of the Daystar of Thy Beauty, and Thy Branches, to cancel the trespasses of those who have held fast to Thy laws, and have observed what Thou hast prescribed unto them in Thy Book. Thou seest me, O my God, holding to Thy Name, the Most Holy, the Most Luminous, the Most Mighty, the Most Great, the Most Exalted, the Most Glorious, and clinging to the hem of the robe to which have clung all in this world and in the world to come.
我求求你，我的主啊，你自己用，和你的迹象，你的清晰标记，和你的美丽的启明星的闪耀的光芒，你的分行，取消那些谁坚守你的法律的过犯，和观察，你作了什么规定对他们在你的书。你看见了我，我的神啊，抱着你的名，至圣，最明亮，最强大，最伟大，最尊贵，最光荣，并抱住长袍的下摆已抱定所有在这个世界和世界的到来。

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! I supplicate Thee by Him Whom Thou...

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! I supplicate Thee by Him Whom Thou hast called into being, Whose Revelation Thou hast ordained to be Thine own Revelation and His Concealment Thine own Concealment. Through His Firstness Thou hast confirmed Thine own Firstness, and through His Lastness Thou hast affirmed Thine own Lastness. Through the power of His might and the influence of His sovereignty the mighty have apprehended Thine omnipotence, and through His glory they who are endowed with authority have acknowledged Thy majesty and greatness. Through His supreme ascendancy Thy transcendent sovereignty and all-encompassing dominion have been recognized, and through His will Thine own will hath been revealed. Through the light of His countenance the splendors of Thine own face have shone forth, and through His Cause Thine own Cause hath been made manifest. Through the generative power of His utterance the whole earth hath been made the recipient of the wondrous signs and tokens of Thy sovereignty, and the heavens have been filled with the revelations of Thine incomparable majesty, and the seas have been enriched with the sacred pearls of Thine omniscience and wisdom, and the trees adorned with the fruits of Thy knowledge. Through Him all things have sung Thy praise, and all the eyes have been turned in the direction of Thy mercy. Through Him the faces of all have been set towards the splendors of the light of Thy countenance, and the souls of all have been inclined unto the revelations of Thy divine greatness.
赞美归于你，主啊，我的上帝！我祈求祢被他就是你所叫应运而生，谁的启示你派定是你自己的启示和他的隐藏你自己的隐蔽​​性。通过他的Firstness祢证实你自己Firstness，并通过他的Lastness祢肯定你自己Lastness。通过他的威力的力量，他的主权影响的强大已经逮捕祢无所不能，并通过他的荣耀，他们谁被赋予的权力已经承认你的威严和伟大。通过他的至高无上的统治地位超然你的主权和无所不包的统治已被确认，并通过他的意志。你自己的意志hath被透露。通过他脸上的光你自己脸上的辉煌已经焕发出来，并通过他的原因你自己的原因历代以来显明。通过他的话语的生成功率整个地球hath被做成你的主权奇妙的标志和标记收件人，天已经充满了祢无比威严的启示，而海洋已经富含的神圣珍珠祢无所不知和智慧，并饰以祢知识的果实的树木。通过他所有的东西都唱你的赞美，所有的眼睛已经变成你的慈爱的方向。通过他所有的面孔已经确定对你脸上的光的辉煌，所有的灵魂一直倾向于对祢神圣伟大的启示。
How great is Thy power! How exalted Thy sovereignty! How lofty Thy might! How excellent Thy majesty! How supreme is Thy grandeur—a grandeur which He Who is Thy Manifestation hath made known and wherewith Thou hast invested Him as a sign of Thy generosity and bountiful favor. I bear witness, O my God, that through Him Thy most resplendent signs have been uncovered, and Thy mercy hath encompassed the entire creation. But for Him, how could the Celestial Dove have uttered its songs or the Heavenly Nightingale, according to the decree of God, have warbled its melody?
多么伟大的是你的力量！如何高举你的主权！如何崇高你的实力！如何优秀的威严！如何至尊是你的宏伟，富丽堂皇一个他这是谁你的表现救了已知的和使你所投资的他，因为你的慷慨和丰富的青睐的标志。我作证，我的神啊，通过他为你最辉煌的标志已经被发现，你的怜悯祂所涵盖整个创作。但对他来说，怎么可能在天体鸽已经说出了歌曲或天上的南丁格尔，按照上帝的旨意，也啁啾它的旋律？
I testify that no sooner had the First Word proceeded, through the potency of Thy will and purpose, out of His mouth, and the First Call gone forth from His lips than the whole creation was revolutionized, and all that are in the heavens and all that are on earth were stirred to the depths. Through that Word the realities of all created things were shaken, were divided, separated, scattered, combined and reunited, disclosing, in both the contingent world and the heavenly kingdom, entities of a new creation, and revealing, in the unseen realms, the signs and tokens of Thy unity and oneness. Through that Call Thou didst announce unto all Thy servants the advent of Thy most great Revelation and the appearance of Thy most perfect Cause.
我作证，没有早过了第一个字出发，通过你的意志和目的，从他的嘴，并在第一次调用了出来，从他的嘴唇比整个创造了革命性的效力，以及所有那些在天上和所有这是地球上搅拌到深处。通过Word的所有创造物的实际情况进行了动摇，出现了分化，分离，分散，组合并统一，公开，同时在队伍世界和天国，一个新的创造的实体，并揭示，在看不见的领域中，标志和你的团结和统一性的令牌。通过呼叫祢宣布对众仆人祢最伟大的启示来临和你的最完美的事业的外观。
No sooner had that Revelation been unveiled to men’s eyes than the signs of universal discord appeared among the peoples of the world, and commotion seized the dwellers of earth and heaven, and the foundations of all things were shaken. The forces of dissension were released, the meaning of the Word was unfolded, and every several atom in all created things acquired its own distinct and separate character. Hell was made to blaze, and the delights of Paradise were uncovered to men’s eyes. Blessed is the man that turneth towards Thee, and woe betide him who standeth aloof from Thee, who denieth Thee and repudiateth Thy signs in this Revelation wherein the faces of the exponents of denial have turned black and the faces of the exponents of truthfulness have turned white, O Thou Who art the Possessor of all names and attributes, Who holdest in Thy grasp the empire of whatever hath been created in heaven and on earth!
不早了启示录已经推出了男性的眼睛比通用不和谐的迹象出现在世界各国人民之间的，和骚动检天地的居民，以及所有事物的基础被动摇。纠纷的力量被释放，该单词的意思是展开，每几个原子的所有创造物收购其独特的和独立的性格。地狱是为了杀出，和天堂的乐趣被揭露男人的眼睛。有福的是，若回头对祢的人，荣辱与共发生于他谁站着从你清高，谁不认你和你的repudiateth迹象在这个启示，其中否定的指数的面孔已经变成了黑色和真实性的指数的脸已经转向白色，哦你这所有的名字和属性，谁在你的holdest养着把握任何大胆在天上和地上被创建的帝国！
Praise be to Thee, therefore, O my God—such praise as Thou didst ascribe to Thine own Self, and which none except Thee can either comprehend or reckon. Thou art He, O my Lord, Who hath made known His own Self unto me, at a time when Thy servants have failed to recognize Thee—servants who, by virtue of the ties that bind them to Thee, have been ruling over all that dwell on earth and have been vaunting themselves over its peoples. Were I, O my God, to exercise from pole to pole supreme dominion over the earth, and were I to be offered all the treasures it containeth, and were I to expend them in Thy path, I would still be powerless to attain unto this station, unless I were assisted and strengthened by Thee. And were I to glorify Thee, O my God, so long as the glory of Thy majesty endureth and the influence of Thy sovereignty and power will last, such a glorification could never be compared with any of the praises which Thou, as a token of Thy grace, hast taught me, and wherewith Thou hast bidden me to extol Thy virtues. If such be the excellence of each one of the praises which Thou hast taught me, how immeasurably greater must be the excellence of the station of the One Who hath known Thee, Who hath entered Thy Presence, and pursued steadfastly the path of Thy Cause!
赞美是你，所以，我的神啊，这样的赞美像从前归于你自己的自我，并没有除祢可以理解或估计。你是他，我的主啊，谁造知他自己的自我对我说，在这个时候你的仆人都没有认识祢，仆人谁，凭借结合他们祢关系，已经统治了一切住在地球上已经吹嘘自己在它的人民。是我，我的神啊，行使从南极到北极的最高统治地球，并且是我要提供所有IT containeth的珍品，是我花费他们在你的路，我仍然会力不从心实现向这车站，除非我被协助和祢加强。而且是我荣耀你，哦，我的上帝，只要你的荣耀威严忍耐和你的主权和权力将持续的影响，这样的荣耀永远无法与任何赞美它你相比，作为信物你的恩典，你教训了我，并且使你所吩咐我要歌颂你的美德。如果是这样你所教给我的赞美每个人的精益求精，如何没法比更大的一定是谁知道祢的其中一个站的精益求精，他已经进入了你的存在，并坚定不移地追求你的事业之路！
I have clearly perceived, and I am wholly persuaded, that Thou hast from everlasting been immeasurably exalted above the mention of all beings, and wilt continue unto everlasting to remain far above the conception of Thy creatures. None can befittingly praise Thee except Thine own Self and such as are like unto Thee. Thou hast, verily, been at all times, and wilt everlastingly continue to remain, immensely exalted beyond and above all comparison and likeness, above all imagination of parity or resemblance. Having, thus, recognized Thee as One Who is incomparable, and Whose nature none can possess, it becometh incontrovertibly evident that whosoever may praise Thee, his praise can befit only such as are of his own nature, and are subject to his own limitations, and it can in no wise adequately describe the sublimity of Thy sovereignty, nor scale the heights of Thy majesty and holiness. How sweet, therefore, is the praise Thou givest to Thine own Self, and the description Thou givest of Thine own Being!
我已经清楚地感知到，而我完全说服了，那你从亘古提众生上面已经没法比尊贵事呢，和枯萎继续对亘古保持远高于你的生物的观念。没有人能够befittingly赞美你，除了你自己的自我和如都像你的。你所有的，实实在在的，是在任何时候，和枯萎永恒地继续保持，非常崇高的超越和高于一切比较相似，平价上方或相似的所有想象。有，因此，认可你，象一个人是无法比拟的，而其本质没有人能拥有，行事为人雄辩明显，凡可能会赞美你，赞美他可以BEFIT只能等都是他自己的性质，并受到他自身的局限性，它可以在任何明智充分说明你的主权的崇高，也不能扩展你的威严和神圣的高度。因此，如何甜蜜，是赞美你随时给到你自己的自我，并说明你随时给你自己存在的！
I testify, O my God, that Thou hast, from eternity, sent down upon Thy servants naught else except that which can cause them to soar up and be drawn near unto Thee, and to ascend into the heaven of Thy transcendent oneness. Thou hast established Thy bounds among them, and ordained them to stand among Thy creatures as evidences of Thy justice and as signs of Thy mercy, and to be the stronghold of Thy protection amongst Thy people, that no man may in Thy realm transgress against his neighbor. How great is the blessedness of him who, for love of Thy beauty and for the sake of Thy pleasure, hath curbed the desires of a corrupt inclination and observed the precepts laid down by Thy most exalted Pen! He, in truth, is to be numbered with them that have attained unto all good, and followed the way of guidance.
我作证，我的神啊，你所有的，从永恒，发下来后，你的仆人化为乌有别人不同之处在于这可能会导致他们飙升起来，可以拉近告诉你，并提升到了你的超然一体的天堂。你已经建立当中你的境界，并任命他们站中你的生物作为你的正义的证据，并为你的仁慈的迹象，并成为你的保护当中你的人的据点，没有人会在你的境界得罪他邻居。多么伟大的是他的福气谁，为爱你的美丽和为了你的快感，他已遏制腐败倾向的欲望和观察你的定下戒律最崇高的笔！他，说实话，是被编号与他们已经达到对一切都很好，并遵循的指导方法。
I beseech Thee, O my Lord, by Thy Name through which Thou hast enabled Thy servants and Thy people to know Thee, through which Thou hast drawn the hearts of those who have recognized Thee towards the resplendent court of Thy oneness, and the souls of Thy favored ones unto the Dayspring of Thy unity,—I beseech Thee to grant that I may be assisted to observe the fast wholly for Thy sake, O Thou Who art full of majesty and glory! Empower me, then, O my God, to be reckoned among them that have clung to Thy laws and precepts for the sake of Thee alone, their eyes fixed on Thy face. These, indeed, are they whose wine is all that hath proceeded out of the mouth of Thy primal will, whose pure beverage is Thine enthralling call, whose heavenly River is Thy love, whose Paradise is entrance into Thy presence and reunion with Thee. For Thou hast been their Beginning and their End, and their Highest Hope, and their Supreme Desire. Blinded be the eye that gazeth on whatsoever may displease Thee, and confounded be the soul that seeketh the things that are contrary to Thy will.
我求求你，我的主啊，你名下的，通过它祢使你的仆人，你的人知道你，通过你所绘制的那些谁认识祢对祢合一的宏伟法院的心，亡灵祢统一的地方自治你喜爱的人，-I恳求你给予我可协助观察快速完全为你的缘故，你这是谁的艺术充满威严和荣耀！授权我，那么，我的神啊，将其中已抱着你的法律和规则，为了祢单独估计，他们的眼睛盯在你的脸上。这些，事实上，是他们的酒是所有祂所进行出你的原始意愿，其纯净的饮料是祢迷人的电话，他的天堂河是你的爱，他的天堂是进入你的存在和团聚与你的嘴。对于你已经是他们的开始和结束的，他们最大的希望，他们最大的愿望。蒙蔽是，gazeth对任何可能得罪你，驳倒是，叩门是违背你的意志的事情灵魂的眼睛。
Deign, O my God, I implore Thee, by Thy Self and by them, to accept, through Thy grace and Thy loving-kindness, the works we have performed, however much they fall short of the loftiness of Thy state and the sublimity of Thy station, O Thou Who art most dear to the hearts that long for Thee, and the Healer of the souls that have recognized Thee! Rain down, therefore, upon us from the heaven of Thy mercy and the clouds of Thy gracious providence that which will cleanse us from the faintest trace of evil and corrupt desires, and will draw us nearer unto Him Who is the Manifestation of Thy most exalted and all-glorious Self. Thou art, verily, the Lord of this world and of the next, and art powerful to do all things.
不屑，我的神啊，我祈求你，用你的自我和他们，接受，通过你的恩典和你的慈爱，我们已经完成的作品，不管他们达不到你的状态和高尚的崇高你的站，你这是谁的艺术最亲爱的那么长的时间为你，灵魂的小灵已经承认祢的心！下雨了，因此，在我们从你的仁慈的天堂和祢亲切的天意的云层，将洗净我们的罪恶和腐败欲望的微弱痕迹，并会接近吸引我们问他谁是你的最崇高的表现和所有光荣自我。你的艺术，众志成城，这个世界的主宰下一个和艺术强大的做所有的事情。
Do Thou bless, O Lord my God, the Primal Point, through Whom the point of creation hath been made to revolve in both the visible and invisible worlds, Whom Thou hast designated as the One whereunto should return whatsoever must return unto Thee, and as the Revealer of whatsoever may be manifested by Thee. Do Thou also bless such of His Letters as have not turned away from Thee, who have been firmly established in Thy love, and clung steadfastly to Thy good-pleasure. Bless Thou, likewise, as long as Thine own Self endureth and Thine own Essence doth last, them that have suffered martyrdom in Thy path. Thou art, verily, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
难道你祝福，主啊，我的上帝，在原始点，通过他历代以来取得的创建点同时在有形和无形的世界旋转，就是你所指定为一个11:16应该返回任何必须返回给你，并作为任何的启示可以通过祢得到体现。难道你也祝福等他的信作为未离弃你，谁已经牢固地确立你的爱，并抱定坚定地祢好快乐。祝福你，同样的，只要你自己的自存和你自己的本质凸现最后，他们在你的路径已经殉道。你的艺术，众志成城，将永远赦的，最仁慈。
Moreover, I beseech Thee, O my God, by Him Whom Thou hast announced unto us in all Thy Tablets and Thy Books and Thy Scrolls and Thy Scriptures, through Whom the kingdom of names hath been convulsed, and all that lay hid in the breasts of them that have followed their evil and corrupt desires hath been revealed,—I beseech Thee to strengthen us in our love for Him, to make us steadfast in His Cause, to help us befriend His loved ones and challenge His enemies. Shield us, then, O my God, from the mischief wrought by them that have denied Thy presence, and turned away from Thy face, and resolved to put an end to the life of Him Who is the Manifestation of Thine own Self.
此外，我求求你，哦，我的上帝，被他就是你所所有你的片剂和你的书和你的卷轴和你的圣经宣布对我们来说，通过他们的名字王国hath被震撼，并在所有的乳房奠定藏他们已经跟随了他们的邪恶和腐败的欲望hath被发现，-I恳求你来加强我们在对他的爱，使我们在他的事业坚定不移，帮助我们亲近他的亲人和挑战他的敌人。保护我们的话，我的神啊，由他们造成的恶作剧已经否认了你的存在，并从你的脸转身离开，并决定结束他的生命谁是你自己的自我的表现。
O my God and my Master! Thou knowest how they have disgraced Thy Cause and dishonored Thee among Thy creatures, how they have joined Thine enemies, that they may undermine Thy Revelation and injure Thee. Lay hold on them with the power of Thy wrath and might, O my God, and expose their shameful acts and their wickedness, that whatever is hid in their breasts may be revealed unto the people that dwell within Thy land, O Thou Who art the Inflictor of trials, the Fashioner of nations, and the Bestower of favors! No God is there beside Thee, the All-Glorious, the Most Bountiful.
哦，我的上帝，我的主人！你知道他们是如何灰头土脸你的原因和羞辱你你的动物中，它们是如何加入你的敌人，他们可能会破坏你的启示和伤害你。拿住他们忿怒的力量和可能，我的神啊，揭露他们的可耻行径，他们的罪恶，这无论是藏在自己的乳房，可以对你的土地，你这住在该人的艺术透露加害者试验，国家的Fashioner和恩惠的赐！没有上帝是存在的你，全悠久，最尊严的旁边。

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! The tongues of all created things...

Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! The tongues of all created things testify to Thy sovereignty and Thine omnipotence, and proclaim mine own poverty and my wretchedness when face to face with the revelations of Thy wealth. Look, then, O my God, upon this sinner whose gaze hath, at all times, been fixed upon the source of Thy forgiveness, and whose eyes have been bent upon the horizon of Thy grace and Thy gifts.
赞美归于你，主啊，我的上帝！对所有创造物的舌头证明了你的主权和你无所不能，并宣布我自己的贫穷和我的不幸，当面对面与你的财富的启示。你看，那么，我的神啊，这对那些罪人目光有的，在任何时候，被固定在你的宽恕的来源，并且其眼睛一直在弯曲你的恩典和你的礼物的视野。
Ever since the day Thou didst create me at Thy bidding, O my God, and didst arouse me through the gentle winds of Thy tender mercies, I have refused to turn to any one except Thee, and have, through the power of Thy sovereignty and Thy might, arisen to face Thine enemies, and have summoned all mankind unto the shores of the ocean of Thy oneness and the heaven of Thine all-glorious unity. I have sought, all my days, not to guard myself from the mischief of the rebellious among Thy creatures, but rather to exalt Thy name amidst Thy people. I have, thereby, suffered what none of Thy creatures hath suffered.
自从在你的竞标当天祢创造了我，哦，我的上帝，复活，唤起我通过你的慈悲温柔的风，我已经拒绝转向祢以外的任何一个，并有通过你的主权的能力和你可能，出现面对你的敌人，并召唤全人类祢合一的海洋和你的天堂全光荣团结的海岸。我一直在努力，我所有的日子，而不是从叛逆的恶作剧守护自己你的动物中，而是要高举你的名字之中你的人。我，因此，遭遇了什么没有你的生物祂所遭遇。
How many the days, O my God, which I have spent in utter loneliness with the transgressors amongst Thy servants, and how many the nights, O my Best-Beloved, during which I lay a captive in the hands of the wayward amidst Thy creatures! In the midst of my troubles and tribulations I have continued to celebrate Thy praise before all who are in Thy heaven and on Thy earth, and have not ceased to extol Thy wondrous glory in the kingdoms of Thy Revelation and of Thy creation, though all that I have been capable of showing forth hath fallen short of the greatness and the majesty of Thy oneness, and is unworthy of Thine exaltation and of Thine omnipotence.
多少天，我的神啊，我已经花了彻底的孤独在罪犯之间仆人，多少夜晚，我的最佳宠儿，在此期间，我躺在任性手中的俘虏之中你的生物！在我的烦恼和苦难之中我继续之前的所有谁是你的天堂和你的地球，并没有停止歌颂在你的启示和你的创作的王国你奇妙的荣耀庆祝你的赞美，虽然所有我已经能够显示出来岂有未能达到的伟大和你的统一性的威严的，是不配祢全能祢提高和。
I swear by Thy glory, O Thou Who art the one alone Beloved! I find myself to be only nothing before the habitation of Thy great glory. Every time I attempt to extol any one of Thy virtues, my heart restraineth me, for naught but Thee is able to soar into the atmosphere of the kingdom of Thy nearness, or reach up to the heaven of Thy presence.
我发誓，你的荣耀，哦你这一个单独宠儿！我发现自己成为你的伟大的荣耀居所之前唯一没有。每次我试图歌颂你的美德中的任何一个，我的心脏restraineth我，白忙一场，但祢能飞上你的亲近的国度的气氛，或可达至你面前的天堂。
Thy might beareth me witness! I am well aware that were I to bow myself before a handful of dust, from now until the end that hath no end, in acknowledgment of its relationship to Thy name, the Fashioner, I would still find myself far removed from that dust, and incapable of approaching it, and would discover that such an adoration can in no wise befit it, nor transcend the limitations to which I myself have been subjected. And were I to arise to serve one of Thy servants, and to wait at his door so long as Thine own kingdom endureth and Thine omnipotence will last, as a sign of my acknowledgment of the tie that bindeth him to Thy name, the Creator, I would, likewise,—and to this Thy glory beareth me witness—have to confess my complete failure to do him adequate service, and my deprivation of what can truly befit his station. And this for the reason that I recognize in them naught else except the bond that bindeth them to Thy names and Thine attributes. How can, then, such a man succeed in befittingly extolling the One through a motion of Whose finger all the names and their kingdom were called into being, and all the attributes and their dominion were created, and Who, through yet another motion of that same finger, hath united the letters B and E (Be) and knit them together, manifesting thereby what the highest thoughts of Thy chosen ones who enjoy near access to Thee are unable to grasp, and what the profoundest wisdom of those of Thy loved ones that are wholly devoted to Thee are powerless to fathom.
你可能也是为我见证！我很清楚地知道，是我对自己低头了一把尘土之前，从现在到了他们身上没有结束，在其对你的名字，在Fashioner关系确认结束后，我仍然觉得自己远离灰尘去掉，不能接近它，并会发现，这样的崇拜可以在任何明智BEFIT它，也没有超越局限的，而我本人也受到。而且是我对出现的服务仆人之一，并等待他的门，只要你自己的王国存，和你的全能将持续，因为我认为裹好他到你的名字，造物主的领带确认的标志，我想，同样， - 和这个你的荣耀，也是为我见证，不得不承认我彻底失败做了他足够的服务，我的剥夺有什么可以真正BEFIT他站。这对于我在他们前功尽弃别人承认，除了裹好他们你的名字和你的属性债券的原因。如何才能，那么，这样的一个人成功befittingly歌颂通过一个手指谁所有的名字和他们的王国的运动被称为应运而生，并创造了所有的属性和他们的统治，而他们通过那另一个运动同一手指，施行统一的字母B和E（BE）和针织在一起，从而体现什么你的选民最高思念谁享受近访问祢无法把握，以及这些祢的深刻智慧的亲人这是完全致力于祢无力企及的。
I swear by Thy glory, O Beloved of my soul! I am bewildered when I contemplate the tokens of Thy handiwork, and the evidences of Thy might, and find myself completely unable to unravel the mystery of the least of Thy signs, how much more to apprehend Thine own Self. I beseech Thee, therefore, O my God, by Thy Name through which Thou hast caused all such as love Thee to soar in the atmosphere of Thy will, and hast guided all them that yearn after Thee into the Paradise of Thy nearness and Thy presence, to waft from the heaven of Thy loving-kindness the fragrance of certainty upon the needy among Thy loved ones, in these days when the tempests of trials have compassed them on every side, and so grievously assailed them that the souls of men have been troubled and the foundations of all beings have trembled at what hath been sent down unto them from the heaven of Thine irrevocable Purpose. They were so shaken that the lamp of their love for Thee and of their remembrance of Thee was ready to be extinguished in the recess of their hearts. Powerful art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee. Thou, in truth, art the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Generous.
我发誓，你的荣耀，哦亲爱的我的灵魂！当我注视你的手艺的令牌，和你的可能证据，我感到困惑，并发现自己完全无法解开的至少你的迹象谜，多少领悟你自己的自我。我恳求你，所以，我的神啊，你名下的，通过你所造成的一切如你的爱腾中你的气氛会，也曾指导所有的渴望后，你进入你的天堂的亲近和你的存在，从你的慈爱的天上飘荡确定性在有需要的芬芳之中你的亲人，在这些日子里，当审判的暴风雨围着他们在每一个方面，所以悲伤地抨击他们，人的灵魂已经困扰与众生的基础都在颤抖���么hath被发下来对他们从祢既定目的的天堂。他们过于悲伤，他们为你自己的怀念你和爱的灯准备在他们心中的凹部熄灭。强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。你，说实话，艺术的永赦，最慷慨的。
Thou givest ear, O my God and my Master, to the sighing of them that are dear to Thee, and hearest from all sides their cry, by reason of what hath befallen them at the hands of those whose hearts have been deprived of the sweet savors of Thy love. There is none either to befriend or to succor them, nor can anything deter their enemies from harming them. Unrestrained, they do what they wish, and deal with them as they please.
你随时给耳朵，哦，我的上帝，我的主人，他们的叹息是亲爱的你，并听信来自四面八方的一声，因在那些心中已经被剥夺了甜蜜的手里什么所遭遇他们对你的爱品味。有没有既交好或搭救，也可以从任何伤害他们阻止他们的敌人。奔放，他们做什么，他们希望，并处理他们，因为他们请。
Give, therefore, O my Lord, the wonders of Thine aid to Thy loved ones, who have sought no helper except Thee, and have turned to none save Thyself, and whose eyes have expectantly awaited to behold the wonders of Thy favors and Thy gifts. Have pity, then, upon them, O my God, through the incomparable tokens of Thy mercy, and shelter them within the stronghold of Thy protection and Thy loving-kindness. Thou art the One, O my Lord, Who from everlasting hath been the Refuge of the fearful, and the Haven of the needy. Withhold not, I beseech Thee, from these feeble creatures the matchless tokens of Thy bounteousness and generosity, and leave them not to the mercy of them whose essence hath been solely created of the fire of Thy wrath and of Thine anger, and who have never discovered the fragrance of compassion and equity, and who have been so deluded by the deceitfulness of the world that they have denied Thy proof, and joined partners with Thee, and repudiated Thy signs, and shed the blood of those who are dear to Thee, and have been trusted by Thee. I swear by Thy might, O my Beloved! They have committed what no man before them hath committed, and have thereby deserved Thy wrath and the scourge of Thine anger. Lay hold on them by the power of Thy sovereignty, and set over them such as will have no mercy upon them, unless they return unto Thee, and enter beneath the shadow of Thy loving-kindness, and are forgiven by Thee. Thou hast from everlasting been supreme over all things, and wilt unto everlasting remain the same. Thou, truly, art the Almighty, the Most Exalted, the Equitable, the All-Wise.
给，因此，我的主啊，祢援助祢的奇迹亲人，谁寻求帮助没有，除了你，并纷纷转向无救自己，和他的眼睛已经期待已久的，以看你的青睐和你的礼物的奇迹。可怜的话，在他们身上，我的神啊，求祢怜悯的无比令牌，并收留他们你的保护，你的慈爱的据点内。你是壹，我的主啊，是谁从亘古向来可怕的避难所，和有需要的人的避风港。扣压不，我恳求你，这些微弱的生灵你的bounteousness和慷慨的无比令牌，并让他们不要对他们的摆布其实质hath被单独创建你的愤怒和你的脑怒的火，谁从来没有发现同情和股权的清香，和谁已经因此受到了世界的迷惑迷惑，他们都否认你的证据，并加入合作伙伴与你和你的批判迹象，摆脱那些谁是亲爱的向你的血液，并已信赖你。我发誓，你的可能，啊，我亲爱的！他们犯了什么之前，他们从来没有人承诺，并因此当之无愧你的忿怒和你愤怒的祸害。拉住他们通过你的主权权力，并设置了它们，如将在他们身上有没���怜悯，除非他们归向你，你慈爱的阴影之下进入，并通过祢赦免了。你从亘古以来的最高万物事呢，和枯萎祂永恒不变的。你，真正的，艺术的全能，最尊贵的公平，所有明智。
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Look Thou upon this wronged one, who hath been sorely afflicted by the oppressors among Thy creatures and the infidels among Thine enemies, though he himself hath refused to breathe a single breath but by Thy leave and at Thy bidding. I lay asleep on my couch, O my God, when lo, the gentle winds of Thy grace and Thy loving-kindness passed over me, and wakened me through the power of Thy sovereignty and Thy gifts, and bade me arise before Thy servants, and speak forth Thy praise, and glorify Thy word. Thereupon most of Thy people reviled me. I swear by Thy glory, O my God! I never thought that they would show forth such deeds, aware as I am that Thou hast Thyself announced this Revelation unto them in the Scrolls of Thy commandment and the Tablets of Thy decree, and hast covenanted with them concerning this youth in every word sent down by Thee unto Thy creatures and Thy people.
荣耀的艺术你，主啊，我的上帝！看你在这个委屈的，谁指着你的生物之间的压迫者和你的敌人之间的异教徒已经缺阵困扰，虽然他自己既然拒绝喘一口气，而是由你的离开，在你的竞标。我躺在睡着了我的沙发上，我的神啊，卤味的时候，你的风度和你的慈爱过我的温柔风，并唤醒了我通过你的主权，你的礼物的力量，吩咐仆人在我面前出现，并讲出你的赞美和荣耀你的话。于是你的大多数人唾骂我。我发誓，你的荣耀，我的神啊！我从来没有想到，他们会表现出如此的事迹，知道因为我是祢己���布了这一启示对他们在你的命令的卷轴和你的法令片，竟就给了他们有关这个青年的每一个字都发下来通过你向你的生物和你的人。
I am bewildered, therefore, O my God, and know not how to act toward them. Every time I hold my peace, and cease to extol Thy wondrous virtues, Thy Spirit impelleth me to cry out before all who are in Thy heaven and on Thy earth; and every time I am still, the breaths wafted from the right hand of Thy will and purpose pass over me, and stir me up, and I find myself to be as a leaf which lieth at the mercy of the winds of Thy decree, and is carried away whithersoever Thou dost permit or command it. Every man of insight who considereth what hath been revealed by me, will be persuaded that Thy Cause is not in my hands, but in Thy hands, and will recognize that the reins of power are held not in my grasp but in Thy grasp, and are subject to Thy sovereign might. And yet, Thou seest, O my God, how the inhabitants of Thy realm have arrayed themselves against me, and inflict upon me every moment of my life what causeth the realities of Thy chosen ones and trusted ones to tremble.
我一脸茫然，所以，我的神啊，以及不知道如何对他们采取行动。每当我认为我的和平，并停止歌颂你奇妙的美德，你的灵impelleth我之前的所有谁在你的天上人间你的哭出来;每次我仍然时，呼吸从你的右手飘荡会和目的越过我，把我叫醒，我觉得自己像一片树叶而伏在你的法令之风的怜悯，被带走无论往哪你竟许可证或命令它。洞察每个人谁思量什么hath被透露了我，将说服你的原因是不是在我手中，但在你的手中，将认识到权力的缰绳都在我的掌握，但在你的掌握举行没有了，受你的主权威力。然而，你看，我的神啊，怎么你的境界的居民都摆着自己攻击我，造成我在每一刻我的生活是什么就是叫祢选民和值得信赖的人颤抖的现实。
I entreat Thee, therefore, O my God, by Thy Name through which Thou hast guided Thy lovers to the living waters of Thy grace and Thy favors, and attracted them that long for Thee to the Paradise of Thy nearness and Thy presence, to open the eyes of Thy people that they may recognize in this Revelation the manifestation of Thy transcendent unity, and the dawning of the lights of Thy countenance and Thy beauty. Cleanse them, then, O my God, from all idle fancies and vain imaginations, that they may inhale the fragrances of sanctity from the robe of Thy Revelation and Thy commandment, that haply they may cease to inflict upon me what will deprive their souls of the fragrances of the manifold tokens of Thy mercy, that are wafted in the days of Him Who is the Manifestation of Thyself, and the Dayspring of Thy Cause, and that they may not perpetrate what will call down Thy wrath and anger.
我求求你，所以，我的神啊，你名下的，通过它你已经引导你的恋人祢恩典的活水和你的主张，并吸引他们长期为你来你的亲近和你的存在的天堂，开你的人，他们可能会在这个启示你的超然统一的表现，和你脸上和你的美丽灯光的曙光认识的眼睛。洁净他们，那么，我的神啊，所有闲置的幻想和想象不着，他们可能吸入神圣的香水，从你的启示和你的命令的长袍，这大致上他们可能会停止造成在我身上究竟会剥夺他们的灵魂你的怜​​悯歧管令牌，这是飘荡在他的日子里谁是你自己的表现，���你的事业的黎明号，他们可能没有犯下什么叫下你的忿怒和愤怒的香水。
Thou well knowest, O my God, that I was regarded as one of the people of the Bayán, and consorted with them with love and fellowship, and summoned them to Thee in the daytime and in the night season, through the wonders of Thy Revelation and Thine inspiration, and sustained at their hands what the inmates of the cities of Thine invention are powerless to recount. I swear by Thy might, O my Beloved! Every morning I waken to find that I am made a target for the darts of their envy, and every night, when I lie down to rest, I discover that I have fallen a victim to the spears of their hate. Though Thou hast made known unto me the secrets of their hearts, and hast set me above them, I have refused to uncover their deeds, and have dealt patiently with them, mindful of the time which Thou hast fixed. And when Thy promise came to pass, and the set time was fulfilled, Thou didst lift, to an imperceptible degree, the veil of concealment, and lo, all the inmates of the kingdoms of Thy Revelation and of Thy creation shook and trembled, except those who were created by Thee, through the fire of Thy love, and the breath of Thine eagerness, and the water of Thy loving-kindness, and the clay of Thy grace. These are they who are glorified by the Concourse on high and the denizens of the Cities of eternity.
你也晓得，我的神啊，我被视为扬手的人之一，并与相会他们用爱和友谊，并将其传唤到祢在白天和夜晚的季节，通过你的启示的奇迹和你的灵感，并维持在他们手中有什么祢发明城市的犯人都无法一一讲述。我发誓，你的可能，啊，我亲爱的！每天早上我醒来发现，我做了一个目标，他们羡慕的飞镖，每天晚上，当我躺下来休息，我发现我已经下降被害人对自己的恨的矛。虽然你使知对我自己心中的秘密，竟让我在他们之上，我已经拒绝揭露他们的事迹，并耐心地处理他们，铭记你所定的时间。而当你的承诺来传递，并在设定的时间应验了，你倒电梯，一个潜移默化的程度，隐蔽的面纱，瞧，你的启示和你的创作的王国所有的犯人震撼和颤抖，除那些谁被祢创造，通过对你的爱火，和你渴望的气息，你的慈爱的水，你的恩典的粘土。这是他们谁被广场上的高，永恒的城市的居民们尊称。
I give praise to Thee, therefore, O my God, that Thou hast preserved them that have acknowledged Thy unity, and hast destroyed them that have joined partners with Thee, and hast divided the one from the other through yet another word that hath proceeded out of the mouth of Thy will, and flowed down from the pen of Thy purpose. Thereby have Thy servants, who were created through the word of Thy commandment, and were begotten by Thy will, caviled at me, and so fiercely opposed me that they repudiated Thee, and have rejected Thy signs, and have risen up against Thee.
我赞美你，所以，我的神啊，祢保持他们承认你的团结，败坏他们已经加入的合作伙伴与你，也曾通过另一个词是因耶和华进行了划分，从另外一个祢口会，并从你的目的笔流下。从而有仆人，谁是通过你的命令的Word中创建的，并且是由所生愿你的旨意，caviled我，所以强烈反对我，他们否定了你，并拒绝了你的迹象，并起来反对你。
Thy glory beareth me witness, O my Beloved! My pen is powerless to describe what their hands have wrought against Him Who is the Manifestation of Thy Cause, and the Dayspring of Thy Revelation, and the Dawning-Place of Thine inspiration. For all this I give praise to Thee. I swear by Thy glory, O my God! My heart yearneth after the things ordained by Thee in the heaven of Thy decree and the kingdom of Thine appointment. For whatsoever befalleth me in Thy path is the beloved of my soul and the goal of my desire. This, verily, is to be ascribed to naught except Thy power and Thy might.
你的荣耀，也是为我见证，我亲爱的！我的笔是无能为力来形容他们的手都造成对他谁是你的事业的表现，和你的启示启端，和你的灵感曙光广场。对于这一切我赞美你。我发誓，你的荣耀，我的神啊！后在祢祢法令的天堂和你约会的国受戒的事我的心脏yearneth。对于任何befalleth我在你的路径是心爱我的灵魂和我的愿望的目标。这实实在在是冲高无功而返，除了你的能力和你的威力。
I am the one, O my God, who, through the love I bear to Thee, hath been able to dispense with all who are in heaven and on earth. Armed with this love, I am afraid of no one, though all the peoples of the world unite to hurt me. Oh, that my blood could, this very moment, be shed on the face of the earth before Thee, and Thou wouldst behold me in the condition in which Thou didst behold such of Thy servants as have drawn nigh unto Thee, and those of Thy righteous creatures as have been chosen by Thee!
我一个，我的神啊，谁，通过爱我舍不得你，向来能够省掉所有谁是天上地下。有了这份爱，恐怕没有人，虽然世界各国人民团结起来，伤害我。哦，那我的血能，此时此刻，被洒在地球表面在你面前，你看见斜射我在祢看你的仆人，如​​已制定亲近祢条件，而那些祢正义的生物作为已经选择了祢！
I give Thee thanks, O my God, that Thou hast decided through the power of Thy decree, and wilt continue to decide through Thine irrevocable appointment and purpose. I entreat Thee, O my Beloved, by Thy Name through which Thou didst lift up the ensigns of Thy Cause, and shed the splendors of the light of Thy countenance, to send down upon me and upon such of Thy servants as are wholly devoted to Thee all the good Thou hast ordained in Thy Tablets. Establish us, then, upon the seats of truth in Thy presence, O Thou in Whose hands is the kingdom of all things!
我给你的感谢，我的神啊，你竟通过你的法令的力量决定，而必继续通过祢不可撤销任命和目的来决定。我求求你，我亲爱的，你名下的，通过它，你实在扬起事业的少尉，并流下了你脸上的光的辉煌，要在我身上的，对这样的你仆人因为是完全致力于派下来你所有的好你派定在你的片。建立我们，那么，在真理在你面前的座位，你这在谁的手里是万物的国度！
Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the All-Glorious, the Most Merciful.
你的艺术，众志成城，全能，全光荣，最仁慈。

The praise which hath dawned from Thy most august Self, and the glory...

The praise which hath dawned from Thy most august Self, and the glory which hath shone forth from Thy most effulgent Beauty, rest upon Thee, O Thou Who art the Manifestation of Grandeur, and the King of Eternity, and the Lord of all who are in heaven and on earth! I testify that through Thee the sovereignty of God and His dominion, and the majesty of God and His grandeur, were revealed, and the Daystars of ancient splendor have shed their radiance in the heaven of Thine irrevocable decree, and the Beauty of the Unseen hath shone forth above the horizon of creation. I testify, moreover, that with but a movement of Thy Pen Thine injunction “Be Thou” hath been enforced, and God’s hidden Secret hath been divulged, and all created things have been called into being, and all the Revelations have been sent down.
所有谁是主哪个叫他从你的最威严的自我领悟的一致好评，并在你身上，你这是谁的艺术尊驰的表现，和永恒的国王而叫他从你的最灿烂的美焕发出来的光彩，休息，天上人间！我作证，通过祢上帝和他的统治，并上帝和他的伟大的威严的主权，被揭穿后，和古代辉煌的诸晨星曾流在你不可撤销法令的天堂的光辉，而看不见岂有之美焕发出来的创造的地平线上。我作证，而且，随着但是你的笔一挥，“要你”历代以来执行，和上帝的隐秘得以披露，一切创造的东西都被称为应运而生，并且所有的启���已被送往下来。
I bear witness, moreover, that through Thy beauty the beauty of the Adored One hath been unveiled, and through Thy face the face of the Desired One hath shone forth, and that through a word from Thee Thou hast decided between all created things, causing them who are devoted to Thee to ascend unto the summit of glory, and the infidels to fall into the lowest abyss.
我作证，而且，通过你的美的崇拜者之圣美已经亮相，并通过你的脸所需的一个脸上祂所焕发出来，并通过从你祢一句话决定所有创造物之间，引起他们谁是致力于祢者晋升荣耀之巅，和异教徒落入最低深渊。
I bear witness that he who hath known Thee hath known God, and he who hath attained unto Thy presence hath attained unto the presence of God. Great, therefore, is the blessedness of him who hath believed in Thee, and in Thy signs, and hath humbled himself before Thy sovereignty, and hath been honored with meeting Thee, and hath attained the good pleasure of Thy will, and circled around Thee, and stood before Thy throne. Woe betide him that hath transgressed against Thee, and hath denied Thee, and repudiated Thy signs, and gainsaid Thy sovereignty, and risen up against Thee, and waxed proud before Thy face, and hath disputed Thy testimonies, and fled from Thy rule and Thy dominion, and been numbered with the infidels whose names have been inscribed by the fingers of Thy behest upon Thy holy Tablets.
我愿意承担他谁知道你的那人称为神的见证，和他谁曾达到对你的存在祂所达到对神的存在。大，因此，这是他的福气谁曾相信你，奉你的迹象，你的主权之前，玷污自己，必被授予见了你，必达到你的意志的美意，盘旋围绕祢和你的宝座前，站了起来。祸发生于他是因耶和华违背祢，必否认你，和你的批判迹象，gainsaid你的主权，起来反对你，你的面前打蜡自豪，必有争议你的法度，并从你的规则和你的出逃统治和被编号与名字对你的神圣片已被列入了你的遗志的手指异教徒。
Waft, then, unto me, O my God and my Beloved, from the right hand of Thy mercy and Thy loving-kindness, the holy breaths of Thy favors, that they may draw me away from myself and from the world unto the courts of Thy nearness and Thy presence. Potent art Thou to do what pleaseth Thee. Thou, truly, hast been supreme over all things.
飘荡的话，对我说，哦，我的上帝，我的亲爱的，你的从怜悯和你的慈爱的右手，神圣你的恩惠呼吸，他们可以借助我远离自己和世界对法院你的亲近和你的存在。强大的艺术你做什么pleaseth你。你，真的，竟都是至高无上的万物。
The remembrance of God and His praise, and the glory of God and His splendor, rest upon Thee, O Thou Who art His Beauty! I bear witness that the eye of creation hath never gazed upon one wronged like Thee. Thou wast immersed all the days of Thy life beneath an ocean of tribulations. At one time Thou wast in chains and fetters; at another Thou wast threatened by the sword of Thine enemies. Yet, despite all this, Thou didst enjoin upon all men to observe what had been prescribed unto Thee by Him Who is the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
上帝和他的赞誉在你身上的记忆，和神的荣耀和他的辉煌，休息，你这是谁是他的美丽！我作证，创造的眼睛也从来没有在一块委屈像你凝视着。你赤身浸入你的生活的日子磨难的海洋之下。有一段时间你赤身的链和脚镣;另一个你赤身威胁你的敌人的剑。然而，尽管这一切，祢咛对所有的人遵守了哪些规定对祢由他谁是全知，全明智的。
May my spirit be a sacrifice to the wrongs Thou didst suffer, and my soul be a ransom for the adversities Thou didst sustain. I beseech God, by Thee and by them whose faces have been illumined with the splendors of the light of Thy countenance, and who, for love of Thee, have observed all whereunto they were bidden, to remove the veils that have come in between Thee and Thy creatures, and to supply me with the good of this world and the world to come. Thou art, in truth, the Almighty, the Most Exalted, the All-Glorious, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Compassionate.
可能我的精神是牺牲祢遭受冤屈，和我的灵魂是赎金祢维持逆境。我恳求上帝，通过你和他们的面孔已经照亮了与你的面容，和谁，为爱你的光的辉煌，已经观察到的所有11:16，他们吩咐，以消除祢之间已经走在了面纱和你的生物，并为我提供这个世界的美好和世界的到来。你是，说实话，全能，最尊贵，全悠久，曾经赦，最值得同情。
Bless Thou, O Lord my God, the Divine Lote-Tree and its leaves, and its boughs, and its branches, and its stems, and its offshoots, as long as Thy most excellent titles will endure and Thy most august attributes will last. Protect it, then, from the mischief of the aggressor and the hosts of tyranny. Thou art, in truth, the Almighty, the Most Powerful. Bless Thou, also, O Lord my God, Thy servants and Thy handmaidens who have attained unto Thee. Thou, truly, art the All-Bountiful, Whose grace is infinite. No God is there save Thee, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Generous.
祝福你，主啊，我的上帝，神卢特树和它的叶子，其树枝，和分支机构，其茎，它的分支，只要你的最优秀的游戏会继续下去和你的最威严的属性将持续。保护它，然后从侵略者的恶作剧和暴政的主机。你的艺术，说实话，全能，最强大的。祝福你，也，主啊，我的上帝，你的仆人，你的婢女谁已经达到你的。你，真的，艺术全丰年祭，是谁的恩典是无限的。没有神的存在拯救你，永远地赦，最慷慨的。
The Tablet of Visitation.
探视的平板。

I bear witness, O my God, that Thou hast created me to know Thee and...

I bear witness, O my God, that Thou hast created me to know Thee and to worship Thee. I testify, at this moment, to my powerlessness and to Thy might, to my poverty and to Thy wealth.
我作证，我的神啊，祢造我知道你和崇拜你。我作证，在这一刻，我无能，祢至能;我贫穷，祢富有。
There is none other God but Thee, the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting.
有没有其他的上帝，但你的，在救苦救难，自我存续的帮助。
Short obligatory prayer, to be recited once in twenty-four hours, at noon.
总之强制性祈祷，将在24小时一次背诵，在中午。

Whoso wisheth to pray, let...

Whoso wisheth to pray, let him wash his hands, and while he washeth, let him say:
但凡wisheth祈祷，让他洗他的手，而他washeth，让他说：
Strengthen my hand, O my God, that it may take hold of Thy Book with such steadfastness that the hosts of the world shall have no power over it. Guard it, then, from meddling with whatsoever doth not belong unto it. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Powerful.
加强我的手，我的神啊，这可能把握你的书有这样的坚定，世界的主人应无权权。保护它，然后，从与任何插手岂不是属于你们的。你的艺术，众志成城，全能，最强大的。
And while washing his face, let him say:
虽然洗他的脸，让他说：
I have turned my face unto Thee, O my Lord! Illumine it with the light of Thy countenance. Protect it, then, from turning to anyone but Thee.
我已经把我的脸告诉你，我的主啊！与你脸上的光照亮了。保护它，然后，从转向任何人，但你。
Then let him stand up, and facing the Qiblih (Point of Adoration, i.e., Bahjí, ‘Akká), let him say:
然后让他站起来，对着Qiblih（崇拜点，即，巴吉，阿卡），让他说：
God testifieth that there is none other God but Him. His are the kingdoms of Revelation and of creation. He, in truth, hath manifested Him Who is the Dayspring of Revelation, Who conversed on Sinai, through Whom the Supreme Horizon hath been made to shine, and the Lote-Tree beyond which there is no passing hath spoken, and through Whom the call hath been proclaimed unto all who are in heaven and on earth: “Lo, the All-Possessing is come. Earth and heaven, glory and dominion are God’s, the Lord of all men, and the Possessor of the Throne on high and of earth below!”
神作见证的说，有没有其他的上帝，但他。他的创作启示的王国。他，说实话，便叫他表现出来是谁启示的黎明号，是谁在交谈西奈，通过他们的最高地平线取得了交在闪耀，和卢特树超越它没有传球已经说了，并通过他们的呼吁历代以来宣布对所有谁在天上和地上：“看哪，全藏有正在到来。天地，荣耀和权柄是上帝的，所有的人的主，宝座在地上低于高养着！“
Let him, then, bend down, with hands resting on the knees, and say:
让他，然后，弯腰，双手搭在膝盖，说：
Exalted art Thou above my praise and the praise of anyone beside me, above my description and the description of all who are in heaven and all who are on earth!
崇高的艺术你上面我所赞美的，任何人的好评我旁边，我上面的描述和所有谁在天堂，所有谁是地球上的说明！
Then, standing with open hands, palms upward toward the face, let him say:
然后向上站立，伸开双手，掌心朝的脸，让他说：
Disappoint not, O my God, him that hath, with beseeching fingers, clung to the hem of Thy mercy and Thy grace, O Thou Who of those who show mercy art the Most Merciful!
不失望，我的神啊，他说有的，用恳求的手指，紧紧抓住你的怜悯和你的恩典，你这的下摆那些谁表现出怜悯谁，最仁慈！
Let him, then, be seated and say:
让他，然后，坐下，说：
I bear witness to Thy unity and Thy oneness, and that Thou art God, and that there is none other God beside Thee. Thou hast, verily, revealed Thy Cause, fulfilled Thy Covenant, and opened wide the door of Thy grace to all that dwell in heaven and on earth. Blessing and peace, salutation and glory, rest upon Thy loved ones, whom the changes and chances of the world have not deterred from turning unto Thee, and who have given their all, in the hope of obtaining that which is with Thee. Thou art, in truth, the Ever-Forgiving, the All-Bountiful.
我见证你的团结与你的合一，那你是神，再没有别的神祢旁边。你所有的，实实在在的，你的透露原因，履行你的盟约，并睁大你的恩典的大门向所有住在天上和地上。对你的祝福与和平，称呼和荣耀，其余的亲人，其中世界的变化和机会没有从转身对祢却步了，谁给了自己的一切，在获得的是与你的希望。你是，说实话，在永赦，全丰年祭。
(If anyone choose to recite instead of the long verse these words: “God testifieth that there is none other God but Him, the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting,” it would be sufficient. And likewise, it would suffice were he, while seated, to choose to recite these words: “I bear witness to Thy unity and Thy oneness, and that Thou art God, and that there is none other God beside Thee.”)
（如果有人选择朗诵长诗，而不是这样的话：“上帝作见证的说，有没有其他的上帝，但他的，是救苦救难，自我存续的，” 这将是足够，同样，这就够了是他。 ，而坐，选择背诵这句话：“我见证你的团结与你的合一，那你是神，再没有别的神祢旁边。”）
Medium obligatory prayer, to be recited daily, in the morning, at noon, and in the evening.
中等强制性祈祷，为每天背诵，在早上，中午和傍晚。

Whoso wisheth to recite this...

Whoso wisheth to recite this prayer, let him stand up and turn unto God, and, as he standeth in his place, let him gaze to the right and to the left, as if awaiting the mercy of his Lord, the Most Merciful, the Compassionate. Then let him say:
但凡wisheth背诵这个祷告，让他站起来归向神，而且，正如他立在自己的位置，让他的目光向右和向左，仿佛在等待他的主的仁慈，最仁慈的富有同情心。然后让他说：
O Thou Who art the Lord of all names and the Maker of the heavens! I beseech Thee by them Who are the Daysprings of Thine invisible Essence, the Most Exalted, the All-Glorious, to make of my prayer a fire that will burn away the veils which have shut me out from Thy beauty, and a light that will lead me unto the ocean of Thy Presence.
呵，你是谁的艺术的所有名称的主，天上的制造者！我恳求你他们是谁祢无形本质的Daysprings，最尊贵，全光荣，让我的祈祷成为一把火，烧掉它已经把我从你的美的面纱，和光会导致我到你面前的海洋。
Let him then raise his hands in supplication toward God—blessed and exalted be He—and say:
让他再举起手恳求朝神祝福和崇高的是他，并说：
O Thou the Desire of the world and the Beloved of the nations! Thou seest me turning toward Thee, and rid of all attachment to anyone save Thee, and clinging to Thy cord, through whose movement the whole creation hath been stirred up. I am Thy servant, O my Lord, and the son of Thy servant. Behold me standing ready to do Thy will and Thy desire, and wishing naught else except Thy good pleasure. I implore Thee by the Ocean of Thy mercy and the Daystar of Thy grace to do with Thy servant as Thou willest and pleasest. By Thy might which is far above all mention and praise! Whatsoever is revealed by Thee is the desire of my heart and the beloved of my soul. O God, my God! Look not upon my hopes and my doings, nay rather look upon Thy will that hath encompassed the heavens and the earth. By Thy Most Great Name, O Thou Lord of all nations! I have desired only what Thou didst desire, and love only what Thou dost love.
呵，你在世界的欲望和心爱的国家！你看见我转身对着你，并且去掉所有附件的任何人拯救你，抱住你的线，通过其运动的整个创作hath被激起了。我是你的仆人，我的主啊，和你仆人的儿子。看哪，我站在准备做你的意志和你的愿望，并希望其他前功尽弃，除了你的美意。我恳求祢由你的怜悯的海洋和你的恩典的启明星与仆人做的你willest和pleasest。凭你的实力远远高于所有提及和好评！凡被祢透露是我的心脏的愿望和心爱我的灵魂。上帝啊，我的上帝！不看在我的希望和我的所作所为，不仅如此而���待你的意志那hath包含的天地。通过你的最伟大的名字，所有国家的啊，你的主！我只想要什么祢欲望，爱唯什么你爱。
Let him then kneel, and bowing his forehead to the ground, let him say:
那就让他跪下，并鞠躬额头在地上，让他说：
Exalted art Thou above the description of anyone save Thyself, and the comprehension of aught else except Thee.
崇高的艺术你的人的描述上面救自己吧，和其他任何事物的理解，除非你。
Let him then stand and say:
那就让他站说：
Make my prayer, O my Lord, a fountain of living waters whereby I may live as long as Thy sovereignty endureth, and may make mention of Thee in every world of Thy worlds.
让我的祈祷，我的主啊，活水因此我可以，只要你的主权永远长存生活的泉源，而且可能使提祢在你的世界的每一个世界。
Let him again raise his hands in supplication, and say:
让他再次提高恳求他的手，说：
O Thou in separation from Whom hearts and souls have melted, and by the fire of Whose love the whole world hath been set aflame! I implore Thee by Thy Name through which Thou hast subdued the whole creation, not to withhold from me that which is with Thee, O Thou Who rulest over all men! Thou seest, O my Lord, this stranger hastening to his most exalted home beneath the canopy of Thy majesty and within the precincts of Thy mercy; and this transgressor seeking the ocean of Thy forgiveness; and this lowly one the court of Thy glory; and this poor creature the orient of Thy wealth. Thine is the authority to command whatsoever Thou willest. I bear witness that Thou art to be praised in Thy doings, and to be obeyed in Thy behests, and to remain unconstrained in Thy bidding.
呵，你在分离谁的心和灵魂都融化了，和他的爱情之火，整个世界又被设置火熊熊！我恳求祢你名下的通过你所征服的整个创作，而不是从我隐瞒了这是与你同在，你这是谁在众人rulest！ああ，我的主啊，这个陌生人匆匆赶来，以自己最崇高的家威严的树冠下和你的慈悲的界域之内;这奸诈寻求你的宽恕的海洋;这卑微的一个你的荣耀法院;而这个可怜的家伙你的财富的东方。祢是有权命令你无论willest。我作证，你的艺术要称赞你的所作所为，并在你的遗志，以服从，并继续在无约束你的竞标。
Let him then raise his hands, and repeat three times the Greatest Name. Let him then bend down with hands resting on the knees before God—blessed and exalted be He—and say:
让他再养他的手，并重复最大名称三倍。那就让他弯下腰，双手搭在面前神赐福的膝盖和崇高是他，并说：
Thou seest, O my God, how my spirit hath been stirred up within my limbs and members, in its longing to worship Thee, and in its yearning to remember Thee and extol Thee; how it testifieth to that whereunto the Tongue of Thy Commandment hath testified in the kingdom of Thine utterance and the heaven of Thy knowledge. I love, in this state, O my Lord, to beg of Thee all that is with Thee, that I may demonstrate my poverty, and magnify Thy bounty and Thy riches, and may declare my powerlessness, and manifest Thy power and Thy might.
ああ，我的神啊，怎么我灵被激起了我的四肢和成员内，在其向往崇拜你，并在其向往记住你和赞美你。它是如何当面见证了11:16的你的命令的那人，舌作证在你话语的国度和你的知识的天堂。我的爱，在这种状态下，我的主啊，求祢一切与你同在的，我可以显示我的贫穷，称赞你的恩惠，你的财富，可以宣布我的无力感，以及体现你的能力和你的威力。
Let him then stand and raise his hands twice in supplication, and say:
那就让他站起来举起双手两次恳求，说：
There is no God but Thee, the Almighty, the All-Bountiful. There is no God but Thee, the Ordainer, both in the beginning and in the end. O God, my God! Thy forgiveness hath emboldened me, and Thy mercy hath strengthened me, and Thy call hath awakened me, and Thy grace hath raised me up and led me unto Thee. Who, otherwise, am I that I should dare to stand at the gate of the city of Thy nearness, or set my face toward the lights that are shining from the heaven of Thy will? Thou seest, O my Lord, this wretched creature knocking at the door of Thy grace, and this evanescent soul seeking the river of everlasting life from the hands of Thy bounty. Thine is the command at all times, O Thou Who art the Lord of all names; and mine is resignation and willing submission to Thy will, O Creator of the heavens!
有没有上帝，但你，全能，全丰年祭。有没有上帝，但你，在命定，无论是在开始和结束。上帝啊，我的上帝！你的宽恕祂所底气了我，你的慈悲坚固了我，你的电话惊醒祂所我，你的恩典叫他复活了我，导致我交给你的。谁，否则，我是说我要敢于站在城市你的亲近的门，或将我的脸往那从你的意志的天堂闪耀的灯光？ああ，我的主啊，这个可怜的人在敲你的恩典的门，这渐逝的灵魂追求永恒的生命从你的赏金手中的河流。祢是在任何时候，呵，你是谁的艺术的所有名称的主的命令;而我的辞职，并愿意服从你的意志，天阿的创造者！
Let him then raise his hands thrice, and say:
让他再举起双手三次，并说：
Greater is God than every great one!
更大的是神不是每一个伟大的！
Let him then kneel and, bowing his forehead to the ground, say:
那就让他跪下，低头额头在地上，说：
Too high art Thou for the praise of those who are nigh unto Thee to ascend unto the heaven of Thy nearness, or for the birds of the hearts of them who are devoted to Thee to attain to the door of Thy gate. I testify that Thou hast been sanctified above all attributes and holy above all names. No God is there but Thee, the Most Exalted, the All-Glorious.
过高的艺术你为那些谁亲近要对你提升祢亲近的天堂的一致好评，或为他们谁是致力于向你心中的鸟达到祢外门。我作证，你已经被圣洁上面所有的属性和神圣最重要的名字。没有上帝是存在的，但你，最尊贵，全光荣。
Let him then seat himself and say:
那就让他坐自己说：
I testify unto that whereunto have testified all created things, and the Concourse on high, and the inmates of the all-highest Paradise, and beyond them the Tongue of Grandeur itself from the all-glorious Horizon, that Thou art God, that there is no God but Thee, and that He Who hath been manifested is the Hidden Mystery, the Treasured Symbol, through Whom the letters B and E (Be) have been joined and knit together. I testify that it is He Whose name hath been set down by the Pen of the Most High, and Who hath been mentioned in the Books of God, the Lord of the Throne on high and of earth below.
我作证问那11:16作证所有创造物，和广场上的高，全最高天堂的囚犯，并超越他们从全光荣地平线尊驰本身的舌，你是神，有没有上帝，只有你，和他谁作过表现的是隐藏的神秘，珍贵的符号，通过他们的字母B和E（BE）已经加入和针织在一起。我作证，这是因为他的名字历代以来所订定的最高级的笔，和谁作过提及地球低于神的书籍，王座高主和。
Let him then stand erect and say:
那就让他直立，说：
O Lord of all being and Possessor of all things visible and invisible! Thou dost perceive my tears and the sighs I utter, and hearest my groaning, and my wailing, and the lamentation of my heart. By Thy might! My trespasses have kept me back from drawing nigh unto Thee; and my sins have held me far from the court of Thy holiness. Thy love, O my Lord, hath enriched me, and separation from Thee hath destroyed me, and remoteness from Thee hath consumed me. I entreat Thee by Thy footsteps in this wilderness, and by the words “Here am I. Here am I,” which Thy chosen Ones have uttered in this immensity, and by the breaths of Thy Revelation, and the gentle winds of the Dawn of Thy Manifestation, to ordain that I may gaze on Thy beauty and observe whatsoever is in Thy Book.
一切存在的主啊！所有的东西有形和无形的和养着！你又认为我的眼泪和叹息我说出，并听见我的呻吟，我的哭，和我的心脏悔恨。凭你的实力！我的过犯使我回从渐渐近交托你。和我的罪已经从你的圣洁的法院裁定我为止。你的爱，我的主啊，祂所丰富了我，从你分离的窝棚，毁坏了我，从你遥远火烧我。我央求你用你的脚步声在这旷野，并写着“我在这里。我在这里”，这你的选民已经说出这个广袤，凭你的启示的呼吸，和黎明的温柔风你的表现，要任命我可能凝视你的美丽和你的书观察所当。
Let him then repeat the Greatest Name thrice, and bend down with hands resting on the knees, and say:
那就让他重复了最伟大的名字三次，并用双手搭在膝盖弯了下来，说：
Praise be to Thee, O my God, that Thou hast aided me to remember Thee and to praise Thee, and hast made known unto me Him Who is the Dayspring of Thy signs, and hast caused me to bow down before Thy Lordship, and humble myself before Thy Godhead, and to acknowledge that which hath been uttered by the Tongue of Thy grandeur.
赞美是你，我的神啊，祢帮助过我记得你和赞美你，允准知道对我他是谁，是你的迹象启端，竟使我你的主权下拜，并谦虚我你的神面前，承认是应当被说出了你的庄严之舌。
Let him then rise and say:
那就让他站起来说：
O God, my God! My back is bowed by the burden of my sins, and my heedlessness hath destroyed me. Whenever I ponder my evil doings and Thy benevolence, my heart melteth within me, and my blood boileth in my veins. By Thy Beauty, O Thou the Desire of the world! I blush to lift up my face to Thee, and my longing hands are ashamed to stretch forth toward the heaven of Thy bounty. Thou seest, O my God, how my tears prevent me from remembering Thee and from extolling Thy virtues, O Thou the Lord of the Throne on high and of earth below! I implore Thee by the signs of Thy Kingdom and the mysteries of Thy Dominion to do with Thy loved ones as becometh Thy bounty, O Lord of all being, and is worthy of Thy grace, O King of the seen and the unseen!
上帝啊，我的上帝！我的背部是由我的罪的负担鞠了一躬，我放逸窝棚，毁坏了我。每当我思考我的邪恶行为和你的仁慈，我的心脏在我melteth，我的血boileth在我的血管。因为你的美，你这世界的欲望！我脸红到我的脸抬起来见你，我渴望的双手都羞于来回伸展向你的赏金的天堂。你看见我的神啊，我的眼泪怎么阻止我从地球上低于记住你和颂扬祢的美德，呵，你的宝座之主的高！我恳求祢由你的王国的标志和你的权柄的奥秘做你的是你的为人慷慨，一切存在的主啊爱的人，值得你的恩典，的看到王阿和看不见的！
Let him then repeat the Greatest Name thrice, and kneel with his forehead to the ground, and say:
那就让他重复了最伟大的名字三次，跪，他的额头在地上，说：
Praise be unto Thee, O our God, that Thou hast sent down unto us that which draweth us nigh unto Thee, and supplieth us with every good thing sent down by Thee in Thy Books and Thy Scriptures. Protect us, we beseech Thee, O my Lord, from the hosts of idle fancies and vain imaginations. Thou, in truth, art the Mighty, the All-Knowing.
赞美是给你，我们的神啊，你竟派下来对我们说，这深坑我们亲近告诉你，和supplieth我们每一个在你的书和你的圣经派下来祢好事。保护我们，我们恳求你，我的主啊，从怠速幻想和想象徒劳的主机。你，说实话，艺术全能，全知。
Let him then raise his head, and seat himself, and say:
让他再抬起头来，和座位自己，并说：
I testify, O my God, to that whereunto Thy chosen Ones have testified, and acknowledge that which the inmates of the all-highest Paradise and those who have circled round Thy mighty Throne have acknowledged. The kingdoms of earth and heaven are Thine, O Lord of the worlds!
我作证，我的神啊，到11:16你的选民都作证，并承认其全最高的天堂谁已经盘旋一轮你的勇士王座囚犯以及那些已经承认。天地的王国都是你的，世界的主啊！
Long obligatory prayer, to be recited once in twenty-four hours.
长强制性祈祷，将在24小时一次背诵。

Since Thou hast, O my God, established Thyself upon the throne of Thy...

Since Thou hast, O my God, established Thyself upon the throne of Thy transcendent unity, and ascended the mercy seat of Thy oneness, it befitteth Thee to blot out from the hearts of all beings whatsoever may keep them back from gaining admittance into the sanctuary of Thy Divine mysteries, and may shut them out from the tabernacle of Thy Divinity, that all hearts may mirror Thy beauty, and may reveal Thee, and speak of Thee, and that all created things may show forth the tokens of Thy most august sovereignty, and shed the splendors of the light of Thy most holy governance, and that all who are in heaven and on earth may laud and magnify Thy unity, and give Thee glory, for having manifested Thy Self unto them through Him Who is the Revealer of Thy oneness.
因为你所有的，我的神啊，你自己建立在祢超然统一的宝座，并登上你的统一性的施恩座，它befitteth祢从众生心中涂抹任何可能让他们回来，从获得准入圣域祢神圣的奥秘，并可能关闭它们从你的神的帐幕，所有的心可能会反映出你的美丽，可以揭示你，并说祢，所有创造的东西可能会显示出来的你的最威严的主权令牌和棚你的最圣洁的治理之光的辉煌，所有谁在天堂和地球上可以赞美和放大你的团结，并给你的荣耀，对于具有表现你的自我对他们借着他是谁的启示你的统一性。
Divest, then, Thy servants, O my God, of the garments of self and desire, or grant that the eyes of Thy people may be lifted up to such heights that they will discern in their desires naught except the stirring of the gentle winds of Thine eternal glory, and may recognize in their own selves nothing but the revelation of Thine own merciful Self, that the earth and all that is therein may be cleansed of whatever is alien to Thee, or anything that manifesteth aught save Thy Self. All this can be fulfilled throughout Thy dominion by Thy word of command, “Be,” and it is! Nay, even swifter than this, and yet the people understand not.
剥离，那么，你的仆人，我的神啊，自我和欲望的服装，或授予的你的人的眼睛能上升到这样的高度，他们将在自己的愿望化为泡影看出，除了温柔的风的搅动祢永恒的荣耀，并可能认识到自己的自我只不过是你自己的自我怜悯的启示，即地球和其中所有的都可以被清洗的一切是陌生的你，或任何manifesteth奥特拯救你的自我。所有这一切都可以在整个你的权柄满足了命令，对你的话“要”，它是！不仅如此，比这还要更快，但人们不知道。
Glorified, immeasurably glorified art Thou, O my Beloved! I swear by Thy glory! I recognize this very moment that Thou hast granted all for which I have supplicated Thee, in this blessed night which, as decreed by Thee, calleth to remembrance Him Who was the Companion of Thy beauty and the Beholder of Thy face, ere I had been mentioned by Thee, or called into being within the court of Thy holiness. I perceive that Thou hast made all things to be the manifestations of Thy behest, and the revelations of Thy handiwork, and the repositories of Thy knowledge, and the treasuries of Thy wisdom. I recognize, moreover, that were any of the revelations of Thy names and Thine attributes to be withheld, though it be the weight of a grain of mustard seed, from whatsoever hath been created by Thy power and begotten by Thy might, the foundations of Thine everlasting handiwork would thereby be made incomplete, and the gems of Thy Divine wisdom would become imperfect. For the letters of negation, no matter how far they may be removed from the holy fragrances of Thy knowledge, and however forgetful they may become of the wondrous splendors of the dawning light of Thy beauty, which are shed from the heaven of Thy majesty, must needs exist in Thy realm, so that the words which affirm Thee may thereby be exalted.
荣耀，荣耀没法比，你是我亲爱的！我发誓，你的荣耀！我认识到这一点，因为你已经授予所有我所恳求你，在这个幸福的夜，正如颁布了你，召来追念他的人是你的美的伴侣和你的脸的旁观者那一刻，我还没有过由祢所提到的，或者叫成是你的神圣的法庭内。我看你使所有的东西是你的授意下的表现，和你的手艺的启示，以及你的知识仓库，和你的智慧宝库。我承认，而且，那是你的任何名称的启示和你的属性是功不可没，但它是一粒芥菜种一粒的重量，从任何向来以创建你的权力和独生用你的可能，的根基你永远的手工会因而作出不完整，和你的神圣智慧的宝石将成为不完善。对于否定的信件，不管多远，他们可以从神圣的知识，你的香水移除，但健忘他们可能会成为你的美的曙光光的奇妙的辉煌，这是从你的威严的天棚，必须存在于你的领域需求，使其中确认祢的话可能会因此被尊崇。
Thy might beareth me witness, O my Well-Beloved! The entire creation hath been called into being to exalt Thy triumph and to establish Thine ascendancy, and all the bounds that have been set by Thee are but the signs of Thy sovereignty, and proclaim the power of Thy might. How great, how very great, are the revelations of Thy wondrous power in all things! They are such that the lowliest among Thy creatures hath been made by Thee a manifestation of Thy most august attribute, and the most contemptible token of Thy handiwork hath been chosen as a recipient of Thy most mighty name. Poverty, as decreed by Thee, hath been made the means for the revelation of Thy riches, and abasement a path leading to Thy glory, and sinfulness a cause for the exercise of Thy forgiveness. By them Thou hast demonstrated that to Thee belong Thy most excellent titles, and unto Thee pertain the wonders of Thy most exalted attributes.
你可能也是为我见证，我的好了，亲爱的！整个创作hath被称为应运而生高抬你的胜利，建立祢的优势，所有已设置了祢的范围是，但你的主权的迹象，并宣布你的力量的威力。多么伟大，多么伟大的，是你的奇妙力量万物的启示！他们是这样的，你的生物中最卑微历代以来由你你的最威严的属性的体现，而你的手艺最可鄙的令牌hath被选为祢最威猛的名字收件人。贫穷，因为颁布了你，历代以来所做的手段你的财富的启示，屈辱导致你的荣耀的路径，和罪的原因行使你的宽恕。他们祢表明，就你属于你的最优秀的冠军，且对你属于祢最崇高的属性的奇迹。
Since Thou hast purposed, O my God, to cause all created things to enter into the tabernacle of Thy transcendent grace and favor, and to waft over the entire creation the fragrances of the raiment of Thy glorious unity, and to look upon all things with the eyes of Thy bounty and Thy oneness, I beseech Thee, therefore, by Thy love, which Thou hast made to be the mainspring of the revelations of Thine eternal holiness, and the flame that gloweth within the hearts of such of Thy creatures as yearn towards Thee, to create, this very moment, for those of Thy people who are wholly devoted to Thee, and for such of Thy loved ones as love Thee, out of the essence of Thy bounty and Thy generosity, and from the inmost spirit of Thy grace and Thy glory, Thy Paradise of transcendent holiness, and to exalt it above everything except Thee, and to sanctify it from aught else save Thyself. Create, moreover, within it, O my God, out of the lights shed by Thy throne, handmaidens who will intone the melodies of Thy wondrous and most sweet invention, that they may magnify Thy name with such words as have not been heard by any of Thy creatures, be they the inmates of Thy heaven or the dwellers of Thine earth, nor been comprehended by any of Thy people. Unlock, then, the gates of this Paradise to the faces of Thy loved ones, that haply they may enter them in Thy name, and by the power of Thy sovereignty, that thereby the sovereign bounties vouchsafed by Thee unto Thy chosen ones and the transcendent gifts granted unto Thy trusted ones be perfected, that they may extol Thy virtues with such melodies as none can either intone or describe, and that none of Thy people may conceive the design of appearing in the guise of any of Thy chosen ones, or of emulating the example of Thy loved ones, and that none may fail to discern between Thy friends and Thine enemies, or to distinguish them that are devoted to Thee from such as stubbornly oppose Thee. Potent art Thou to do what Thou willest, and powerful and supreme art Thou over all things.
既然你已经定意，我的神啊，导致所有创造物进入祢的超然风度和青睐的帐幕，以及飘荡在整个创建你的光荣统一衣服的香水，并视所有东西你的恩惠，你的统一性的眼睛，我恳求你，因此，你的爱，你所做出成为你永恒的圣洁的启示的发条，火焰等祢生物作为渴望的心内gloweth的对你，创造，此时此刻，对于那些你的人谁是完全致力于祢，并为你的这种为爱你，出了你的恩惠，你的慷慨的本质，并从内心深处的精神的亲人你的恩典和你的荣耀，超越的圣洁祢天堂，并发扬它上面的一切，除了你，并从其他任何事物拯救你自己成圣。创建，而且，在它，我的神啊，出了你的宝座棚灯，使女谁都会吟诵祢的旋律美妙，最甜蜜的发明，他们可能会放大你的名字有这样的句子还没有听到任何你的生物，无论是你的天堂的囚犯或祢地球的居民，也被理解任何你的人。解锁，那么，这个天堂祢的面门的亲人，这大致上他们奉你的名进入其中，并通过你的主权���力，这使主权恩泽赐予了你向你的选民和超然授予对你的信任的人的礼物完善，使他们歌颂你的美德，这样的旋律为none可以吟诵或描述，并且没有你的人可以设想出现在任何你的选民为幌子的设计，或模仿你的的例子亲人，并且没有可能会失败，你的朋友和你的敌人之间的辨别，或区分他们从这种专门为祢顽固反对你。强大的艺术你做什么，你willest，和强大的和最高的艺术你在所有的事情。
Exalted, immeasurably exalted art Thou, O my Beloved, above the strivings of any of Thy creatures, however learned, to know Thee; exalted, immensely exalted art Thou above every human attempt, no matter how searching, to describe Thee! For the highest thought of men, however deep their contemplation, can never hope to outsoar the limitations imposed upon Thy creation, nor ascend beyond the state of the contingent world, nor break the bounds irrevocably set for it by Thee. How can, then, a thing that hath been created by Thy will that overruleth the whole of creation, a thing that is itself a part of the contingent world, have the power to soar into the holy atmosphere of Thy knowledge, or reach unto the seat of Thy transcendent power?
崇高，崇高没法比，你是我亲爱的，上面的任何祢生物的奋斗，但是学会了，要知道你。崇高，崇高无比祢上面每个人的努力，无论怎样搜索，来形容你哩！最高思想的人，但是他们深深的沉思，不能希望outsoar在你创作本身的限制，也没有超出提升队伍世界的状态，也打破了它不可撤销地设置你的左右边界。哪有，那么，历代以来创建的你的东西会是overruleth整个创作的，事情本身就是队伍世界的一部分，必须要飞上圣洁祢知识氛围的权力，或直到到达座椅你的超然的力量？
High, immeasurably high art Thou above the endeavors of the evanescent creature to soar unto the throne of Thine eternity, or of the poor and wretched to attain the summit of Thine all-sufficing glory! From eternity Thou didst Thyself describe Thine own Self unto Thy Self, and extol, in Thine own Essence, Thine Essence unto Thine Essence. I swear by Thy glory, O my Best-Beloved! Who is there besides Thee that can claim to know Thee, and who save Thyself can make fitting mention of Thee? Thou art He Who, from eternity, abode in His realm, in the glory of His transcendent unity, and the splendors of His holy grandeur. Were any one except Thee to be deemed worthy of mention, in all the kingdoms of Thy creation, from the highest realms of immortality down to the level of this nether world, how could it, then, be demonstrated that Thou art established upon the throne of Thy unity, and how could the wondrous virtues of Thy oneness and Thy singleness be glorified?
高，高没法比祢以上消逝生物的努力飙升对祢永恒的宝座，或穷人和不幸的达到祢的峰会全sufficing荣耀！从永恒祢你自己形容你自己的自我对你的自我，和歌颂，在你自己的本质，祢精华起誓本质。我发誓，你的荣耀，我的最佳宠儿！谁在那里，除了你，这可算得上认识你，谁救自己可以装修提到祢？你是谁，他从永恒的，住在他的境界，在他的超然统一的荣耀，他的圣洁庄严的辉煌。除了被祢任何一个被视为值得一提的，在你的创作中所有的王国，从不死的最高境界下降到这个幽冥世界的水平，怎么会呢，那么，可以证明你的艺术宝座成立你的团结，以及如何你的单一性和你的单一的奇妙的美德得荣耀？
I bear witness, this very moment, to what Thou hast testified for Thine own Self, ere Thou hadst created the heavens and the earth, that Thou art God, and that there is none other God besides Thee. Thou hast from everlasting been potent, through the Manifestations of Thy might, to reveal the signs of Thy power, and Thou hast ever made known, through the Daysprings of Thy knowledge, the words of Thy wisdom. No one besides Thee hath ever been found worthy to be mentioned before the Tabernacle of Thy unity, and none except Thyself hath proved himself capable of being praised within the hallowed court of Thy oneness.
我作证，这一刻，什么祢作证你自己的自我，ERE你未曾创造了天地，那你是神，有没有其他的神，除了你。你从亘古以来烈性，求祢的表现可能，露出你的权力的迹象事呢，你又做过称，通过你的知识Daysprings，祢智慧的话。除了祢没有人祂所曾经发现值得幕祢的统一之前提到的，没有你自己以外祂所证明了自己能够祢合一的神圣的法庭内所推崇。
Praise be to Thee, O my God, that Thou hast revealed Thy favors and Thy bounties; and glory be to Thee, O my Beloved, that Thou hast manifested the Daystar of Thy loving-kindness and Thy tender mercies. I yield Thee such thanks as can direct the steps of the wayward towards the splendors of the morning light of Thy guidance, and enable those who yearn towards Thee to attain the seat of the revelation of the effulgence of Thy beauty. I yield Thee such thanks as can cause the sick to draw nigh unto the waters of Thy healing, and can help those who are far from Thee to approach the living fountain of Thy presence. I yield Thee such thanks as can divest the bodies of Thy servants of the garments of mortality and abasement, and attire them in the robes of Thine eternity and Thy glory, and lead the poor unto the shores of Thy holiness and all sufficient riches. I yield Thee such thanks as can enable the Heavenly Dove to warble forth, upon the branches of the Lote-Tree of Immortality, her song: “Verily, Thou art God. No God is there besides Thee. From eternity Thou hast been exalted above the praise of aught else but Thee, and been high above the description of any one except Thyself.” I yield Thee such thanks as can cause the Nightingale of Glory to pour forth its melody in the highest heaven: “‘Alí (the Báb), in truth, is Thy servant, Whom Thou hast singled out from among Thy Messengers and Thy chosen Ones, and made Him to be the Manifestation of Thyself in all that pertaineth unto Thee, and that concerneth the revelation of Thine attributes and the evidences of Thy names.” I yield Thee such thanks as can stir up all things to extol Thee, and to glorify Thine Essence, and can unloose the tongues of all beings to magnify the sovereignty of Thy beauty. I yield Thee such thanks as can fill the heavens and the earth with the signs of Thy transcendent Essence, and assist all created things to enter the Tabernacle of Thy nearness and Thy presence. I yield Thee such thanks as can make every created thing to be a book that shall speak of Thee, and a scroll that shall unfold Thy praise. I yield Thee such thanks as can establish the Manifestations of Thy sovereignty upon the throne of Thy governance, and set up the Exponents of Thy glory upon the seat of Thy Divinity. I yield Thee such thanks as can make the corrupt tree to bring forth good fruit through the holy breaths of Thy favors, and revive the bodies of all beings with the gentle winds of Thy transcendent grace. I yield Thee such thanks as can cause the signs of Thine exalted singleness to be sent down out of the heaven of Thy holy unity. I yield Thee such thanks as can teach all things the realities of Thy knowledge and the essence of Thy wisdom, and will not withhold the wretched creatures from the doors of Thy mercy and Thy bountiful favor. I yield Thee such thanks as can enable all who are in heaven and on earth to dispense with all created things, through the treasuries of Thine all-sufficing riches, and can aid all created things to reach unto the summit of Thine almighty favors. I yield Thee such thanks as can assist the hearts of Thine ardent lovers to soar into the atmosphere of nearness to Thee, and of longing for Thee, and kindle the Light of Lights within the land of ‘Iráq. I yield Thee such thanks as can detach them that are nigh unto Thee from all created things, and draw them to the throne of Thy names and Thine attributes. I yield Thee such thanks as can cause Thee to forgive all sins and trespasses, and to fulfill the needs of the peoples of all religions, and to waft the fragrances of pardon over the entire creation. I yield Thee such thanks as can enable them that recognize Thy unity to scale the heights of Thy love, and cause such as are devoted to Thee to ascend unto the Paradise of Thy presence. I yield Thee such thanks as can satisfy the wants of all such as seek Thee, and realize the aims of them that have recognized Thee. I yield Thee such thanks as can blot out from the hearts of men all suggestions of limitations, and inscribe the signs of Thy unity. I yield Thee such thanks as that with which Thou didst from eternity glorify Thine own Self, and didst exalt it above all peers, rivals, and comparisons, O Thou in Whose hands are the heavens of grace and of bounty, and the kingdoms of glory and of majesty!
赞美是你，我的神啊，你竟发现你的青睐和你的恩泽;和荣耀是你，我亲爱的，你竟表现祢的启明星慈爱和你的慈悲。我得到你如此的感谢可以直接向任性你的指导，晨光的辉煌的步骤，使那些谁对祢渴望达到的你的美的光辉的启示的座位。我得到你如此的感谢会导致生病亲近祢愈合水域，并能帮助那些谁是远离祢接近祢存在生活喷泉。我屈服你如此感谢的可剥离死亡率和屈辱的服装仆人的尸体，并装于你永恒和你的荣耀，带领穷人祢圣洁的海岸和所有足够的财富的长袍。我屈服你如此感谢这可以使天工鸽子吟哦出来，在仙道，她的歌的卢特树的分支：“诚然，你是神。没有上帝是存在的，除了你。从永恒你已经被捧得高于其他任何事物，但祢的好评，并得到高的，除了你自己任何一个上面的描述：“我得到你如此感谢的会导致荣耀的南丁格尔滔滔不绝其在九霄的旋律： “阿里（巴孛），说实话，是你的仆人，你从你的使者和你的选民中挑出，使���成为你自己的一切对本属祢的表现，而且关乎启示祢属性和你的名字的证据。“我得到你如此的感谢能挑起所有的东西歌颂你，要歌颂祢的本质，并能放开一切众生的舌头放大了你的美主权。我屈服你如此感谢这可以补苍天，并与你的超然精华迹象地球，并协助所有创造物，进入你的亲近和你的存在会幕。我得到你如此的感谢可以让每一个创造出来的东西是一本书，能谈论祢，并滚动的应展开你的赞美。我屈服你如此感谢这可以在你治理的宝座建立你的主权的表现，并在你的神所在地设立你的荣耀的指数。我得到你如此的感谢可以让坏树通过你的神圣恩惠的呼吸，以结好果子，并恢复与祢超然风度的温柔风众生的尸体。我屈服你如此感谢的会导致祢崇高单一的标志可向下发送出你神圣的统一的天堂。我屈服你如此感谢的可以教所有的东西你的知识的现实和你的智慧精华，而且不会隐瞒你的怜悯和你的富饶赞成门猥琐的生物。我屈服你如此感谢这可以使所有谁在天上和地上免除所有创造物，���过祢全sufficing财富的国债，而且可以帮助所有创造物达到对祢那全能青睐峰会。我屈服你如此感谢这可以协助祢热心爱好者心中飙升到亲近的氛围，你，和向往祢，并点燃灯的光“伊拉克土地范围内。我屈服你如此感谢的可以分离他们是临近你们祢所有创造的东西，并把它们画到你的名字和你的属性的宝座。我屈服你如此感谢这可以使你原谅所有的罪孽和过犯，并履行所有宗教的人民的需要，并赦免飘荡的香气在整个创作。我屈服你如此感谢这可以使他们认识到你的单位规模的你的爱的高度，并导致诸如致力于祢提升对你的天堂的存在。我得到你如此的感谢能够满足所有这些的需要看成来找你，并实现他们的目标已经认可你。我得到你如此的感谢这可以从男人的局限性所有建议心中涂抹，并铭刻你的统一标志。我得到你如此的感谢作为与你从永恒祢美化你自己的自我，和复活，尊崇它上面的所有的同行，竞争对手，和比较，呵，你在谁的手里有赏金的恩典和的天堂，和荣耀的王国和威严！
Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God, and my Master! Thou bearest witness, and seest, and knowest the things that have befallen Thy loved ones in Thy days, and the continual trials, and the successive tribulations, and the incessant afflictions, which have been sent down upon Thine elect. Such hath been their plight that the earth became too strait for them, and they were encompassed by the evidences of Thy wrath and the signs of Thy fear in every land, and the doors of Thy mercy and Thy loving-kindness were shut against them, and the garden of their hearts was deprived of the overflowing showers of Thy grace and Thy bountiful favors. Wilt Thou withhold, O my God, from such as love Thee the wonders of Thine ascendancy and triumph? Wilt Thou shatter, O my Beloved, the hopes which they who are devoted to Thee have fixed on Thy manifold bounties and gifts? Wilt Thou keep back, O my Master, those that have recognized Thee from the shores of Thy sanctified knowledge, or wilt Thou cease to rain down upon the hearts of such as desire Thee the showers of Thy transcendent grace? No, no, and to this Thy glory beareth me witness! I testify this very moment that Thy mercy hath surpassed all created things, and Thy loving-kindness encompassed all that are in heaven and all that are on earth. From everlasting the doors of Thy generosity were open to the faces of Thy servants, and the gentle winds of Thy grace were wafted over the hearts of Thy creatures, and the overflowing rains of Thy bounty were showered upon Thy people and the dwellers of Thy realm.
赞美是你的名字，主啊，我的上帝，我的主人！你bearest见证，所看见的，却不知道已经降临在你的天你的亲人的事，不断的试验，并相继磨难和不断苦难，已经发下来后，祢选。这样作过他们的困境，地球变得过于窄小，他们，他们也因你的忿怒的证据和你的恐惧在每一块土地的迹象，你的怜悯和你的慈爱的门被包围被关闭对他们，和他们心中的花园被剥夺你的恩典和你的丰富的恩惠满溢阵雨。祢隐瞒，我的神啊，来自诸如爱你祢崛起的奇迹，胜利？祢粉碎，啊，我亲爱的，在他们谁是致力于祢已经固定在你的歧管的恩泽和礼物的希望？祢保持回来，哦，我的主人，那些从你的圣洁知识岸边认可你，岂可停止后，如要求你对你的超然风度的淋浴心中下雨了吗？不，不，并为此你的​​荣耀，也是为我见证！我见证这个时刻，你的慈悲祂所超越了所有创造的东西，你的慈爱涵盖所有在天堂和所有在地球上。从亘古你的慷慨之门被打开，以仆人���脸，你的恩典的温柔风中飘荡在你的生物的心，在你的人你的恩惠满溢降雨洗澡和你的境界居民。
I know full well Thou hast delayed to manifest Thy triumph in the kingdom of creation by reason of Thy knowledge which embraceth both the mysteries of Thy decree, and the hidden things ordained behind the veils of Thine irrevocable purpose, that thereby those who have entered beneath the shadow of Thy transcendent mercy may be separated from those who have dealt disdainfully with Thee, and turned back from Thy presence at the time when Thou didst manifest Thy most exalted Beauty.
我清楚地知道你已经推迟的原因你的知识，你的embraceth判令双方的奥秘，并任命了祢既定目的的面纱背后隐藏的东西来体现你的创作王国的胜利，这使那些谁下进入祢超然仁慈的影子可以从那些谁轻蔑地处理与你分开，转身从你面前的时候回来时，祢体现你的大半江山美。
Exalted, immeasurably exalted art Thou, therefore, O my Beloved! Forasmuch as Thou hast divided, in Thy realm, Thy loved ones from Thine enemies, and hast perfected Thy most weighty testimony and Thy most infallible Proof unto all who are in heaven and on earth, have mercy, then, upon those who were brought low in Thy land, by reason of what hath befallen them in Thy path. Exalt them, then, O my God, through the power of Thy might and the potency of Thy will, and raise them up to proclaim Thy Cause through Thine omnipotent sovereignty and purpose.
崇高，崇高没法比你的艺术，所以，我亲爱的！你既划分，在你的境界，你的从你的敌人所爱的人，也曾完善你的最有分量的证词和你的最万无一失的证明对所有谁是天上地下，怜悯，那么，在那些谁被拉低在你的土地，因什么所遭遇他们在你的路径。高举他们的话，我的神啊，求祢威力的力量，你的意志的潜能，提高他们透过祢无所不能的主权和目的，宣告你的原因。
I swear by Thy glory! My sole purpose in showing forth Thine ascendancy hath been to glorify Thy Cause, and to magnify Thy word. I am persuaded that if Thou wert to delay to send down Thy victory and to demonstrate Thy power, the signs of Thy sovereignty would assuredly perish in Thy land, and the tokens of Thy rule would be blotted out throughout Thy dominion.
我发誓，你的荣耀！在展示伸手加害优势我唯一的目的向来美化你的原因，并放大你的话。我深信，如果巴不得你耽误送下来你的胜利，来证明你的能力，你的主权的迹象无疑会灭亡在你的土地，你的规则令牌将你的整个统治涂抹。
My breast is straitened, O my God, and sorrows and vexations have compassed me round, for I hear among Thy servants every praise except Thy wondrous praise, and behold amidst Thy people the evidences of all things save the evidences of what Thou hast prescribed unto them by Thy behest, and destined for them through Thy sovereign will, and ordained unto them by Thine overruling decree. They have strayed so far from Thee that should any of Thy loved ones deliver unto them the wondrous tokens of Thy unity, and the gem-like utterances that attest Thy transcendent oneness, they would thrust their fingers into their ears, and would cavil at him and mock him. All this hast Thou set down through Thine all-encompassing sovereignty, and apprehended through Thine omnipotent supremacy.
